IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The haint can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The haint doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The haint makes two Sorrowful Touch attacks.

SorrowfulTouch.name: SorrowfulTouch
SorrowfulTouch.description: ms 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) psychic damage.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: The haint magically assumes the appearance of the Humanoid it was in life, while retaining its game statistics. The assumed appearance ends if the haint is reduced to 0 hit points or uses an action to end it.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The pari has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The pari doesn't require food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The pari makes three Mace attacks.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage.

DisorientingFutures.name: DisorientingFutures
DisorientingFutures.description: The pari attempts to flood the mind of one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself with visions of the future. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or take 27 (5d10) psychic damage and have disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of the pari's next turn.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The riverine can breathe air and water.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the riverine fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The riverine makes two Flood Strike attacks.

FloodStrike.name: FloodStrike
FloodStrike.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.

EnthralledLure(1/Day).name: Enthralled Lure
EnthralledLure(1/Day).description: The soul shaker can cast the geas spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12).

Reconstruction.name: Reconstruction
Reconstruction.description: When the soul shaker is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes into 7 (1d4 + 5) crawling claws. After 6 (1d12) days, if at least two of those crawling claws are alive, they teleport to the location of the soul shaker's death and merge together, whereupon the soul shaker reforms and regains all its hit points.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The soul shaker doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

CrushingGrasp.name: CrushingGrasp
CrushingGrasp.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). The soul shaker can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The tlacatecolo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tlacatecolo makes two Talon attacks.

Talon.name: Talon
Talon.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (3d8) poison damage.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: The tlacatecolo magically transforms into a Medium owl, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the tlacatecolo is reduced to 0 hit points or if it uses its action to end it.

PlagueWinds(FiendFormOnly;Recharge5-6).name: PlagueWinds(FiendFormOnly;Recharge5-6)
PlagueWinds(FiendFormOnly;Recharge5-6).description: The tlacatecolo emits a chilling, disease-ridden wind in a 60-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 26 (4d12) cold damage and become poisoned.

FireAura.name: Fire Aura
FireAura.description: At the start of each of the tlexolotl's turns, each creature within 10 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in that aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the tlexolotl or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The tlexolotl sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The tlexolotl regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the tlexolotl takes cold damage or is immersed in water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the tlexolotl's next turn. The tlexolotl dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tlexolotl makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (1d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) fire damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the tlexolotl and knocked prone.

Pyroclasm{@recharge5}.name: Pyroclasm{@recharge5}
Pyroclasm{@recharge5}.description: Gouts of molten lava erupt from the tlexolotl's body. Each creature in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the tlexolotl must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 21 (6d6) fire damage and 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage. On a successful saving throw, a creature takes half as much damage.

BlurredForm.name: Blurred Form
BlurredForm.description: Attack rolls against the whistler are made with disadvantage unless the whistler is incapacitated.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The whistler doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The whistler makes three Psychic Swipe attacks.

PsychicSwipe.name: PsychicSwipe
PsychicSwipe.description: ms 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage.

OtherworldlyMelody{@recharge5}.name: OtherworldlyMelody{@recharge5}
OtherworldlyMelody{@recharge5}.description: The whistler telepathically whistles an otherworldly melody into the minds of up to two creatures it can see within range of its telepathy. Each target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or take 33 (6d10) psychic damage and become frightened of the whistler for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

CloakoftheMountain{@recharge4}.name: CloakoftheMountain{@recharge4}
CloakoftheMountain{@recharge4}.description: The wynling magically turns invisible, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, for 1 minute or until it makes an attack roll.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Charmayne fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Charmayne makes three Ashen Burst attacks. She can replace one of these attacks with one use of Spellcasting.

AshenBurst.name: AshenBurst
AshenBurst.description: ms,rs 9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (5d6) fire damage.

CinderSpite{@recharge5}.name: CinderSpite{@recharge5}
CinderSpite{@recharge5}.description: Charmayne creates a magical explosion of fire centered on a point she can see within 120 feet of herself. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A Humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies and is transformed into a Tiny charcoal figurine.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The defender doesn't need air, food, drink, or sleep.

ElectrifiedBite.name: ElectrifiedBite
ElectrifiedBite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be grappled (escape DC 13). A creature grappled by the defender takes the damage again at the start of each of the defender's turns. The defender can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time, and the defender can't make Electrified Bite attacks while grappling.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The observer doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

TelepathicBond.name: Telepathic Bond
TelepathicBond.description: While the observer is within 1 mile of its creator, it can magically convey what it sees to its creator, and the two can communicate telepathically.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The observer doesn't need air, food, drink, or sleep.

Shriek.name: Shriek
Shriek.description: The observer emits a mechanical shriek until the start of its next turn or until it drops to 0 hit points. This shriek can be heard within a range of 300 feet.

PsionicRevitalization.name: PsionicRevitalization
PsionicRevitalization.description: The fragment touches one creature that has 0 hit points in the fragment's space. The target regains 10 hit points, and each creature within 10 feet of the healed creature takes 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

SquirmingDodge.name: SquirmingDodge
SquirmingDodge.description: Until the start of the fragment's next turn, any attack roll made against the fragment has disadvantage, and the fragment makes saving throws with advantage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Markos makes two Ceremonial Blade attacks, two Psychic Orb attacks, or one of each.

CeremonialBlade.name: CeremonialBlade
CeremonialBlade.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

PsychicOrb.name: PsychicOrb
PsychicOrb.description: rs 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) psychic damage.

AntimagicSusceptibility.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
AntimagicSusceptibility.description: In an area of antimagic, Prisoner 13's tattoos and reactions don't function, and she suffers the following modifications to her statistics: her AC becomes 13, she loses her immunity to psychic damage and the charmed condition, and her Tattooed Strike becomes a melee attack that deals 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage on a hit.

MindlinkTattoos.name: Mindlink Tattoos
MindlinkTattoos.description: Prisoner 13 has telepathic links with dozens of agents operating throughout the land. The links allow Prisoner 13 to communicate telepathically with each of these agents while they are both on the same plane of existence.

MountainTattoo.name: Mountain Tattoo
MountainTattoo.description: Prisoner 13's AC includes her Constitution modifier.

ShroudTattoo.name: Shroud Tattoo
ShroudTattoo.description: Prisoner 13 can't be targeted by divination spells or any feature that would read her thoughts, and she can't be perceived through magical scrying sensors. She can't be contacted telepathically unless she allows such contact.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Prisoner 13 makes two Tattooed Strike attacks.

TattooedStrike.name: TattooedStrike
TattooedStrike.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) force damage.

FirestormTattoo{@recharge5}.name: FirestormTattoo{@recharge5}
FirestormTattoo{@recharge5}.description: Prisoner 13 magically unleashes flame from the tattoo across her back, filling a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on her. Each other creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 13 (3d8) fire damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

RiverTattoo.name: RiverTattoo
RiverTattoo.description: Prisoner 13 magically ends any effects causing the grappled or restrained conditions on herself. If she is bound with nonmagical restraints, she slips out of them.

FearofFrogsandToads.name: Fear of Frogs and Toads
FearofFrogsandToads.description: Sythian is frightened while he is within 20 feet of a frog or a toad (of any size) that he can see.

Graz'zt'sGift.name: Graz'zt's Gift
Graz'zt'sGift.description: Sythian's AC includes his Charisma modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Sythian makes two Poisoned Shortsword or Poisoned Dart attacks and uses Whispers of Azzagrat.

PoisonedShortsword.name: PoisonedShortsword
PoisonedShortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

PoisonedDart.name: PoisonedDart
PoisonedDart.description: rw 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

WhispersofAzzagrat.name: WhispersofAzzagrat
WhispersofAzzagrat.description: Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from Sythian must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) psychic damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated.

ForceField.name: Force Field
ForceField.description: Tockworth generates a magical force field around herself. This force field has 15 hit points and regains all its hit points at the start of each of Tockworth's turns, but it ceases to function if Tockworth drops to 0 hit points. Any damage Tockworth takes is subtracted from the force field's hit points first. Each time the force field regains hit points, the following conditions end on Tockworth: grappled, restrained, and stunned.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Tockworth makes three Shortsword or Lightning Discharge attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) force damage.

LightningDischarge.name: LightningDischarge
LightningDischarge.description: rs 6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 16 (3d10) lightning damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Garret wears a Ring of Warmth (included in his statistics) and wields a Gambler's Blade longsword|LLK.

BardicInspiration(3/Day).name: Bardic Inspiration
BardicInspiration(3/Day).description: As a bonus action, Garret can give one chosen creature (other than him) a d6 inspiration die. The chosen creature must be within 60 feet of Garret and able to hear him. Once within the next 10 minutes, the creature can roll the die and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes. The creature can use the inspiration die after the roll is made but before the DM says whether it succeeds or fails. Once the inspiration die is rolled, it is lost. A creature can have only one inspiration die at a time.

CunningAction.name: Cunning Action
CunningAction.description: On each of his turns, Garret can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

SneakAttack(1/Turn).name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
SneakAttack(1/Turn).description: Garret deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Garret that isn't incapacitated and Garret doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Mary wears Bracers of Defense and a Ring of Protection, and carries a Deck of Several Things|LLK

FeyPresence(RechargesafteraShortRest).name: Fey Presence (Recharges after a Short Rest)
FeyPresence(RechargesafteraShortRest).description: Mary can cause each creature within 10 feet of her to succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or become charmed or frightened by her (Mary's choice) until the end of her next turn.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Mary has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

Transparent.name: Transparent
Transparent.description: Even when an ooze-folk is in plain sight, it takes a DC 12 Wisdom (Perception) check to spot an ooze-folk that has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter the ooze-folk's space while unaware of the ooze-folk is surprised by the ooze-folk.

FragileBones.name: Fragile Bones
FragileBones.description: For each 5 damage it takes, the ooze-folk's walking speed is reduced by 5 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ooze folk makes one glass longsword attack and one pseudopod attack.

GlassLongsword.name: GlassLongsword
GlassLongsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage. If a 1 is rolled on an attack roll with a glass longsword, it shatters and can no longer be used.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) acid damage.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The wraith can move through an object or another creature, but can't stop there.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

LifeDrain.name: LifeDrain
LifeDrain.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 16 (3d8 + 3) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. If this attack reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Sildar makes two Longsword attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: While it has at least 1 hit point, the astral blight sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The blight doesn't require air or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The blight makes two Heat-Draining Vine attacks.

Heat-DrainingVine.name: Heat-DrainingVine
Heat-DrainingVine.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) radiant damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 3 (1d6) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. The blight has two vines, each of which can grapple one creature.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Gar can breathe air and water.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If Gar fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

WaterWalk.name: Water Walk
WaterWalk.description: Gar can stand and move on liquid surfaces as if they were solid ground.

WateryFall.name: Watery Fall
WateryFall.description: When Gar drops to 0 hit points, his body collapses into a pool of inky water that rapidly disperses. Anything he was wearing or carrying is left behind.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Gar makes two melee attacks, one with his claw and one with Drown|PotA.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until the grapple ends, Gar can't attack other creatures with his claw.

Drown.name: Drown
Drown.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Shoalar can breathe air and water.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The kraken can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kraken makes two tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 20). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description: One Medium or smaller object held or creature grappled by the kraken is thrown up to 40 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

LightningStrike.name: LightningStrike
LightningStrike.description: The kraken magically create a bolt of lightning, which can strike a target the kraken can see within 90 feet of it. The target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The spiderfrog can breathe air and water.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The spiderfrog can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: Spiderfrog's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage. Target is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and spiderfrog can't bite another target.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hoplite makes three weapon attacks. It can replace one weapon attack with ray of frost.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

ShieldBash.name: ShieldBash
ShieldBash.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

RayofFrost(Cantrip).name: RayofFrost(Cantrip)
RayofFrost(Cantrip).description: rs 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d8) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the hoplite's next turn.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The naiad can breathe air and water.

InvisibleinWater.name: Invisible in Water
InvisibleinWater.description: The naiad is invisible while fully immersed in water.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The naiad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The naiad makes two psychic touch attacks.

PsychicTouch.name: PsychicTouch
PsychicTouch.description: ms 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) psychic damage.

AuraofNightmares.name: Aura of Nightmares
AuraofNightmares.description: Undead creatures within 30 feet of the shepherd gain a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls. When any other creature that isn't undead or a construct starts its turn within 30 feet of the shepherd, that creature must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The shepherd has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shepherd makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its staff.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

Staff.name: Staff
Staff.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 26 (4d12) psychic damage.

HerdtheUnderworld(RechargesafteraShortor.name: HerdtheUnderworld(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Herd the Underworld (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

HerdtheUnderworld(RechargesafteraShortor.description: The shepherd pulls twisted souls from the Underworld; 1d6 shadow||shadows (without Sunlight Weakness) arise in unoccupied spaces within 20 feet of the shepherd. The shadows act right after the shepherd on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear when the shepherd dies.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the ram moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The ram has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Sure-Footed.name: Sure-Footed
Sure-Footed.description: The ram has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws against effects that would knock it prone.

Ram.name: Ram
Ram.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

BlessingsoftheGods.name: Blessings of the Gods
BlessingsoftheGods.description: While the oracle is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier. In addition, a creature that hits the oracle with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 9 (2d8) force damage.

EldritchTouch.name: EldritchTouch
EldritchTouch.description: ms 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) force damage.

InvisibleinFire.name: Invisible in Fire
InvisibleinFire.description: The oread is invisible while fully immersed in fire.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The oread has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The oread attacks twice with its fiery touch or fire bolt.

FieryTouch.name: FieryTouch
FieryTouch.description: ms 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) fire damage.

FireBolt(Cantrip).name: FireBolt(Cantrip)
FireBolt(Cantrip).description: rs 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d10) fire damage.

Gatekeeper'sAura.name: Gatekeeper's Aura
Gatekeeper'sAura.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the phylaskia must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage on saving throws and its speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the phylaskia to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the phylaskia drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The phylaskia makes two longsword attacks and uses its Strength Drain once.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.

StrengthDrain.name: StrengthDrain
StrengthDrain.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) necrotic damage. Unless the target is immune to necrotic damage, its Strength score is reduced by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

AcidicBlood.name: Acidic Blood
AcidicBlood.description: When Polukranos takes piercing or slashing damage, each creature within 5 feet of Polukranos takes 10 (3d6) acid damage.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: Polukranos can hold its breath for 1 hour.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Polukranos fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MultipleHeads.name: Multiple Heads
MultipleHeads.description: Polukranos has five heads. While it has more than one head, Polukranos has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious. Whenever Polukranos takes 40 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, Polukranos dies. At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken 40 or more fire damage since its last turn. Polukranos regains 20 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

ReactiveHeads.name: Reactive Heads
ReactiveHeads.description: For each head Polukranos has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only to make opportunity attacks.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: Polukranos deals double damage to objects and structures.

Wakeful.name: Wakeful
Wakeful.description: While Polukranos sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Polukranos makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away from Polukranos.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The Returned has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

UnreadableFace.name: Unreadable Face
UnreadableFace.description: The Returned is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. Wisdom (Insight) checks to ascertain the Returned's intentions or sincerity are made with disadvantage.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

Sling.name: Sling
Sling.description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

FleetingAnger.name: Fleeting Anger
FleetingAnger.description: If another creature deals damage to the Returned, the Returned makes attack rolls with advantage until the end of its next turn.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The Returned has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

UnreadableFace.name: Unreadable Face
UnreadableFace.description: The Returned is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. Wisdom (Insight) checks to ascertain the Returned's intentions or sincerity are made with disadvantage.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

UnderworldBolt.name: UnderworldBolt
UnderworldBolt.description: rs 4 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 2) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the Returned's next turn. If the target is missing any of its hit points, it instead takes 17 (2d12 + 2) necrotic damage.

FleetingAnger.name: Fleeting Anger
FleetingAnger.description: If another creature deals damage to the Returned, the Returned makes attack rolls with advantage until the end of its next turn.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The Returned has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

UnreadableFace.name: Unreadable Face
UnreadableFace.description: The Returned is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. Wisdom (Insight) checks to ascertain the Returned's intentions or sincerity are made with disadvantage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Returned makes two shortsword attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The Returned has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the Returned's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The Returned has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

UnreadableFace.name: Unreadable Face
UnreadableFace.description: The Returned is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. Wisdom (Insight) checks to ascertain the Returned's intentions or sincerity are made with disadvantage.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

Sling.name: Sling
Sling.description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

EnthrallingPerformance.name: Enthralling Performance
EnthrallingPerformance.description: If the satyr performs for at least 1 minute, it chooses up to four humanoids within 60 feet of it who watched or listened to the entire performance. Each target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed. While charmed in this way, the target idolizes the satyr and will take part in the satyr's revels. The charmed condition ends for the creature after 1 hour, if it takes any damage, if the satyr attacks the target, or if the target witnesses the satyr attacking or damaging any of the target's allies.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SleeplessReveler.name: Sleepless Reveler
SleeplessReveler.description: Magic can't put the satyr to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The satyr makes two ram attacks or two shortbow attacks.

Ram.name: Ram
Ram.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SleeplessReveler.name: Sleepless Reveler
SleeplessReveler.description: Magic can't put the satyr to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The satyr makes three ram attacks or three shortbow attacks.

Ram.name: Ram
Ram.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

HailofArrows(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.name: HailofArrows(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Hail of Arrows (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

HailofArrows(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.description: The satyr fires an arrow that magically transforms into a flurry of missiles in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The hoplite has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hoplite's allies is within 5 feet of the hoplite and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hoplite makes two scimitar attacks or two longbow attacks.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

SpellTurning.name: Spell Turning
SpellTurning.description: The chimera has advantage on a saving throw against any spell that targets only the chimera (not an area). If the chimera's saving throw is successful and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the chimera and instead targets the caster.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its claws, one with its head, and one with its tail. When its breath weapon is available, it can use the breath in place of its head or its claws.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

Head.name: Head
Head.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.name: BreathWeapon{@recharge5}
BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.description: The chimera exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 32 (5d12) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The triton can breathe air and water.

SummonWaterWeird(RechargesafteraShortorL.name: Summon Water Weird (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
SummonWaterWeird(RechargesafteraShortorL.description: As a bonus action, the triton magically summons 1d4 water weird||water weirds. The summoned weirds appear in unoccupied spaces in water within 60 feet of the triton. The water weirds act immediately after the triton on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear if the triton dies.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The triton makes two attacks using Wave Touch and casts ray of frost.

WaveTouch.name: WaveTouch
WaveTouch.description: ms 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (4d10) cold damage.

RayofFrost(Cantrip).name: RayofFrost(Cantrip)
RayofFrost(Cantrip).description: rs 7 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (3d8) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the triton's next turn.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The triton can breathe air and water.

NimbleEscape.name: Nimble Escape
NimbleEscape.description: The triton can take the Disengage or Hide actions as a bonus action on each of its turns.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The triton makes two urchin-spine shortsword attacks.

Urchin-SpineShortsword.name: Urchin-SpineShortsword
Urchin-SpineShortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, that creature is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

PoisonedSpine.name: PoisonedSpine
PoisonedSpine.description: rw 5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Tromokratis can breathe air and water.

HeartsoftheKraken(MythicTrait;Rechargesa.name: Hearts of the Kraken (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
HeartsoftheKraken(MythicTrait;Rechargesa.description: When Tromokratis is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, the damage creates cracks in its carapace, revealing its hearts. Tromokratis has four hearts: two on its chest, one on its back, and one at the base of its tail. A heart has an AC of 22 and 100 hit points. It is immune to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks, and it is immune to all conditions. If it is forced to make a saving throw, treat its ability scores as 10 (+0). If it finishes a short or long rest, the carapace heals, any destroyed hearts regenerate, and the hearts are covered again. Tromokratis dies when all the hearts are destroyed.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Tromokratis fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: Tromokratis deals double damage to objects and structures.

Spell-ResistantCarapace.name: Spell-Resistant Carapace
Spell-ResistantCarapace.description: Tromokratis has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature that makes a spell attack against Tromokratis has disadvantage on the attack roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Tromokratis makes three attacks: one with its pincer, one with its tail, and one with its tentacle grasp.

Pincer.name: Pincer
Pincer.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 26). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Tromokratis can't use this attack on anyone else.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is knocked prone.

TentacleGrasp.name: TentacleGrasp
TentacleGrasp.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. on hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 26). If the target doesn't escape by the end of its next turn, Tromokratis throws the target up to 60 feet in a straight line. The target lands prone and takes 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 29 (3d12 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature grappled by Tromokratis, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside Tromokratis, and it takes 42 (12d6) acid damage at the start of each of Tromokratis's turns. If Tromokratis takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, Tromokratis must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of Tromokratis. If Tromokratis dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: As a bonus action, the cerberus can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

Multiheaded.name: Multiheaded
Multiheaded.description: The cerberus can't be surprised, and it has advantage on saving throws against being knocked unconscious.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The cerberus has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the cerberus's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cerberus makes two bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.name: BreathWeapon{@recharge5}
BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.description: The cerberus exhales a 15-foot cone of molten rock. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, a creature is also restrained by the hardening rock. A creature can make a DC 12 Strength (Athletics) check as an action, freeing itself or a creature within reach from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 10 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The typhon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The typhon regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The typhon dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The typhon makes three attacks: one with its Flurry of Bites, one to constrict, and one with its maw.

FlurryofBites.name: FlurryofBites
FlurryofBites.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 35 (8d6 + 7) piercing damage.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The typhon can have up to two creatures constricted.

Maw.name: Maw
Maw.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) piercing damage plus 19 (3d12) acid damage.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: As a bonus action, the cerberus can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

Multiheaded.name: Multiheaded
Multiheaded.description: The cerberus can't be surprised, and it has advantage on saving throws against being knocked unconscious.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The cerberus has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the cerberus's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cerberus makes three bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.name: BreathWeapon{@recharge5}
BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.description: The cerberus exhales a 30-foot cone of molten rock. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, a creature is also restrained by the hardening rock. A creature can make a DC 15 Strength (Athletics) check as an action, freeing itself or a creature within reach from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 20 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the bull moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 19 (3d12) piercing damage.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage.

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.description: If the lion moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the lion can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

AntimagicCone.name: Antimagic Cone
AntimagicCone.description: The woe strider's open mouth creates an area of antimagic, as in the antimagic field spell, in a 60-foot cone. At the start of each of its turns, the woe strider decides which way the cone faces and whether its mouth is open or closed.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The woe strider makes two claw attacks and one bite attack. If both claws hit the same creature, the target is grappled (escape DC 14).

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature that is grappled, incapacitated, or restrained. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) psychic damage. In addition, each magic item the creature is carrying that isn't an artifact has its magical properties suppressed for 1 minute.

LimitedAmphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
LimitedAmphibiousness.description: The sea spawn can breathe air and water, but needs to be submerged in the sea at least once a day for 1 minute to avoid suffocating.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sea spawn makes three attacks: two unarmed strikes and one with its Piscine Anatomy.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

PiscineAnatomy.name: PiscineAnatomy
PiscineAnatomy.description: The sea spawn has one or more of the following attack options, provided it has the appropriate anatomy:

BurdenofTime.name: Burden of Time
BurdenofTime.description: Beasts and Humanoids (except elves) have disadvantage on saving throws while within 10 feet of the shadar-kai.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The shadar-kai has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shadar-kai makes three Shadow Spear attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

ShadowSpear.name: ShadowSpear
ShadowSpear.description: mw,rw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120, one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 26 (4d12) necrotic damage. {@hom}The spear magically returns to the shadar-kai's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The shadar-kai has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shadar-kai makes three Spiked Chain attacks.

SpikedChain.name: SpikedChain
SpikedChain.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or suffer one of the following effects (choose one or roll a d6):

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The shadar-kai has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The shadar-kai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SoulThirst.name: Soul Thirst
SoulThirst.description: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the shadar-kai can gain temporary hit points equal to half the creature's hit point maximum. While the shadar-kai has temporary hit points from this trait, it has advantage on attack rolls.

WeightofAges.name: Weight of Ages
WeightofAges.description: Any Beast or Humanoid (except an elf) that starts its turn within 5 feet of the shadar-kai has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shadar-kai makes two Shadow Dagger attacks.

ShadowDagger.name: ShadowDagger
ShadowDagger.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (4d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 19 (3d12) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on saving throws until the end of the shadar-kai's next turn. {@hom}The dagger magically returns to the shadar-kai's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

WaveofWeariness{@recharge4}.name: WaveofWeariness{@recharge4}
WaveofWeariness{@recharge4}.description: The shadar-kai emits weariness in a 60-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 (10d8) psychic damage and suffers 1 level of exhaustion. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and doesn't gain a level of exhaustion.

EtherealAwareness.name: Ethereal Awareness
EtherealAwareness.description: The shadow mastiff can see ethereal creatures and objects.

KeenHearingandSmell.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
KeenHearingandSmell.description: The shadow mastiff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

ShadowBlend.name: Shadow Blend
ShadowBlend.description: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow mastiff can use a bonus action to become invisible, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. The invisibility lasts until the shadow mastiff uses a bonus action to end it or until the shadow mastiff attacks, is in bright light, or is incapacitated.

SunlightWeakness.name: Sunlight Weakness
SunlightWeakness.description: While in bright light created by sunlight, the shadow mastiff has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattackswhileind.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks while in dim light or darkness

piercingfromnonmagicalattackswhileindiml.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks while in dim light or darkness

slashingfromnonmagicalattackswhileindiml.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks while in dim light or darkness

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

EtherealAwareness.name: Ethereal Awareness
EtherealAwareness.description: The shadow mastiff can see ethereal creatures and objects.

SunlightWeakness.name: Sunlight Weakness
SunlightWeakness.description: While in bright light created by sunlight, the shadow mastiff has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattackswhileind.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks while in dim light or darkness

piercingfromnonmagicalattackswhileindiml.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks while in dim light or darkness

slashingfromnonmagicalattackswhileindiml.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks while in dim light or darkness

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

TerrifyingHowl{@recharge}.name: TerrifyingHowl{@recharge}
TerrifyingHowl{@recharge}.description: The shadow mastiff howls. Any Beast or Humanoid within 300 feet of it must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of it for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's save is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to any shadow mastiff's Terrifying Howl for the next 24 hours.

Rampage.name: Rampage
Rampage.description: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the shoosuva can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shoosuva makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail stinger.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (4d10 + 4) piercing damage.

TailStinger.name: TailStinger
TailStinger.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned, the target is also paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Contamination.name: Contamination
Contamination.description: The sibriex emits an aura of corruption 30 feet in every direction. Plants that aren't creatures wither in the aura, and the ground in it is difficult terrain||3 for other creatures. Any creature that starts its turn in the aura must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or take 14 (4d6) poison damage. A creature that succeeds on the save is immune to this sibriex's Contamination for 24 hours.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the sibriex fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The sibriex has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sibriex uses Squirt Bile once and makes three attacks using its chain, bite, or both.

Chain.name: Chain
Chain.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (2d12 + 7) piercing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

SquirtBile.name: SquirtBile
SquirtBile.description: The sibriex targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 35 (10d6) acid damage.

WarpCreature.name: WarpCreature
WarpCreature.description: The sibriex targets up to three creatures it can see within 120 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, a creature becomes immune to this sibriex's Warp Creature. On a failed save, the target is poisoned, which causes it to also gain 1 level of exhaustion. While poisoned in this way, the target must repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns. Three successful saves against the poison end it, and ending the poison removes any levels of exhaustion caused by it. Each failed save causes the target to suffer another level of exhaustion. Once the target reaches 6 levels of exhaustion, it dies and instantly transforms into a living abyssal wretch|mtf under the sibriex's control. The transformation of the body can be undone only by a wish spell.

FallibleInvisibility.name: Fallible Invisibility
FallibleInvisibility.description: The skulk is invisible. This invisibility can be circumvented by three things:

Trackless.name: Trackless
Trackless.description: The skulk leaves no tracks to indicate where it has been or where it's headed.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage. If the skulk has advantage on the attack roll, the target also takes 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the skull lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MasteroftheGrave.name: Master of the Grave
MasteroftheGrave.description: While within 30 feet of the skull lord, any undead ally of the skull lord makes saving throws with advantage, and that ally regains 1d6 hit points whenever it starts its turn there.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If the skull lord is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half the damage, the skull lord instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The skull lord makes three bone staff attacks.

BoneStaff.name: BoneStaff
BoneStaff.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage.

Ambusher.name: Ambusher
Ambusher.description: In the first round of a combat, the slithering tracker has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

DamageTransfer.name: Damage Transfer
DamageTransfer.description: While grappling a creature, the slithering tracker takes only haIf the damage dealt to it, and the creature it is grappling takes the other half.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the slithering tracker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a puddle, unless an observer succeeds on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check.

KeenTracker.name: Keen Tracker
KeenTracker.description: The slithering tracker has advantage on Wisdom checks to track prey.

LiquidForm.name: Liquid Form
LiquidForm.description: The slithering tracker can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can also move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The slithering tracker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WateryStealth.name: Watery Stealth
WateryStealth.description: While underwater, the slithering tracker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, and it can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

LifeLeech.name: LifeLeech
LifeLeech.description: One Large or smaller creature that the slithering tracker can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. In addition, the grappled target takes 16 (3d10) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. The slithering tracker can grapple only one target at a time.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The spawn of Kyuss regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or a body of running water. If the spawn takes acid, fire, or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the spawn's next turn. The spawn is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Worms.name: Worms
Worms.description: If the spawn of Kyuss is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away, and it loses its Burrowing Worm action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The spawn of Kyuss makes two attacks with its claws and uses Burrowing Worm.

BurrowingWorm.name: BurrowingWorm
BurrowingWorm.description: A worm launches from the spawn of Kyuss at one humanoid that the spawn can see within 10 feet of it. The worm latches onto the target's skin unless the target succeeds on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw. The worm is a Tiny undead with AC 6, 1 hit point, a 2 (-4) in every ability score, and a speed of 1 foot. While on the target's skin, the worm can be killed by normal means or scraped off using an action (the spawn can use this action to launch a scraped-off worm at a humanoid it can see within 10 feet of the worm). Otherwise, the worm burrows under the target's skin at the end of the target's next turn, dealing 1 piercing damage to it. At the end of each of its turns thereafter, the target takes 7 (2d6) necrotic damage per worm infesting it (maximum of 10d6). A worm-infested target dies if it drops to 0 hit points, then rises 10 minutes later as a spawn of Kyuss. If a worm-infested creature is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The troll can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes psychic or force damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) psychic damage.

FeyStep{@recharge4}.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
FeyStep{@recharge4}.description: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

JoyfulPresence.name: Joyful Presence
JoyfulPresence.description: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is charmed for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Joyful Presence for 24 hours.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks. The eladrin can cast one spell in place of one of these attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage if used with two hands.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage.

AuraofMadness.name: Aura of Madness
AuraofMadness.description: Creatures within 20 feet of the grue that aren't aberrations have disadvantage on saving throws, as well as on attack rolls against creatures other than a star spawn grue.

ConfoundingBite.name: ConfoundingBite
ConfoundingBite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw or attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of the grue's next turn.

PsychicMirror.name: Psychic Mirror
PsychicMirror.description: If the hulk takes psychic damage, each creature within 10 feet of the hulk takes that damage instead; the hulk takes none of the damage. In addition, the hulk's thoughts and location can't be discerned by magic.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hulk makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, the target also takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage and must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the target's next turn.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

ReapingArms{@recharge5}.name: ReapingArms{@recharge5}
ReapingArms{@recharge5}.description: The hulk makes a separate slam attack against each creature within 10 feet of it. Each creature that is hit must also succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

ReturntoWorms.name: Return to Worms
ReturntoWorms.description: When the larva mage is reduced to 0 hit points, it breaks apart into a swarm of insects in the same space. Unless the swarm is destroyed, the larva mage reforms from it 24 hours later.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

PlagueofWorms{@recharge}.name: PlagueofWorms{@recharge}
PlagueofWorms{@recharge}.description: Each creature other than a star spawn within 10 feet of the larva mage must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure the target takes 22 (5d8) necrotic damage and is blinded and restrained by masses of swarming worms. The affected creature takes 22 (5d8) necrotic damage at the start of each of the larva mage's turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Ambusher.name: Ambusher
Ambusher.description: On the first round of each combat, the mangler has advantage on attack rolls against a creature that hasn't taken a turn yet.

ShadowStealth.name: Shadow Stealth
ShadowStealth.description: While in dim light or darkness, the mangler can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mangler makes two claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage. If the attack roll has advantage, the target also takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

FlurryofClaws{@recharge4}.name: FlurryofClaws{@recharge4}
FlurryofClaws{@recharge4}.description: The mangler makes six claw attacks against one target. Either before or after these attacks, it can move up to its speed as a bonus action without provoking opportunity attacks.

Out-of-PhaseMovement.name: Out-of-Phase Movement
Out-of-PhaseMovement.description: The seer can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. Each creature it moves through takes 5 (1d10) psychic damage; no creature can take this damage more than once per turn. The seer takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The seer makes two comet staff attacks or uses Psychic Orb twice.

CometStaff.name: CometStaff
CometStaff.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage, or 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage, if used with two hands, and the target must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

PsychicOrb.name: PsychicOrb
PsychicOrb.description: rs 11 to hit, range 120 feet, one target. on hit: 27 (5d10) psychic damage.

CollapseDistance{@recharge}.name: CollapseDistance{@recharge}
CollapseDistance{@recharge}.description: The seer warps space around a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. That creature must make a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, is magically teleported up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space the seer can see, and all other creatures within 10 feet of the target's original space each takes 39 (6d12) psychic damage. On a successful save, the target takes 19 (3d12) psychic damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The steel predator has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The steel predator's weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The steel predator makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claw.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) slashing damage.

StunningRoar{@recharge5}.name: StunningRoar{@recharge5}
StunningRoar{@recharge5}.description: The steel predator emits a roar in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 (5d10) thunder damage, drops everything it's holding, and is stunned for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (6d6 + 5) piercing damage.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the kow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.description: Any creature other than a stench kow that starts its turn within 5 feet of the stench kow must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all stench kows for 1 hour.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

CunningOpportunist.name: Cunning Opportunist
CunningOpportunist.description: The stone cursed has advantage on the attack rolls of opportunity attacks.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the stone cursed remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

PetrifyingClaws.name: PetrifyingClaws
PetrifyingClaws.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage, or 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage if the attack roll had advantage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, or it begins to turn to stone and is restrained until the end of its next turn, when it must repeat the saving throw. The effect ends if the second save is successful; otherwise the target is petrified for 24 hours.

Dreamwalker'sCharm.name: Dreamwalker's Charm
Dreamwalker'sCharm.description: An enemy that starts its turn within 30 feet of the giant must make a DC 13 Charisma saving throw, provided that the giant isn't incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the giant. A creature charmed in this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the saving throw, the creature is immune to this giant's Dreamwalker's Charm for 24 hours.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two attacks with its greatclub.

Greatclub.name: Greatclub
Greatclub.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

PetrifyingTouch.name: PetrifyingTouch
PetrifyingTouch.description: The giant touches one Medium or smaller creature within 10 feet of it that is charmed by it. The target must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes petrified, and the giant can adhere the target to its stony body. Greater restoration spells and other magic that can undo petrification have no effect on a petrified creature on the giant unless the giant is dead, in which case the magic works normally, freeing the petrified creature as well as ending the petrified condition on it.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The giant can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two Lightning Sword attacks or uses Wind Javelin twice.

LightningSword.name: LightningSword
LightningSword.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 40 (9d6 + 9) lightning damage.

Windjavelin.name: Windjavelin
Windjavelin.description: The giant coalesces wind into a javelin-like form and hurls it at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The javelin is considered a magic weapon and deals 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage to the target, striking unerringly. The javelin disappears after it hits.

FearsomePresence.name: Fearsome Presence
FearsomePresence.description: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Fearsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

FeyStep{@recharge4}.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
FeyStep{@recharge4}.description: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage if used with two hands.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 9 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: As a bonus action, the swarm can shed dim light from its brains in a 5-foot radius, increase the illumination to bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius (and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius), or extinguish the light.
