Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

TelepathicShroud.name: Telepathic Shroud
TelepathicShroud.description: The swarm is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. as well as to all divination spells.

Bites.name: Bites
Bites.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. on hit: 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny maggot. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

Bites.name: Bites
Bites.description: mw 0 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. on hit: The target is infested by 1d4 rot grubs. At the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes 1d6 piercing damage per rot grub infesting it. Applying fire to the bite wound before the end of the target's next turn deals 1 fire damage to the target and kills these rot grubs. After this time, these rot grubs are too far under the skin to be burned. If a target infested by rot grubs ends its turn with 0 hit points, it dies as the rot grubs burrow into its heart and kill it. Any effect that cures disease kills all rot grubs infesting the target.

Lightfooted.name: Lightfooted
Lightfooted.description: The swashbuckler can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

SuaveDefense.name: Suave Defense
SuaveDefense.description: While the swashbuckler is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Charisma modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The swashbuckler makes three attacks: one with a dagger and two with its rapier.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

MartialFury.name: Martial Fury
MartialFury.description: As a bonus action, the sword wraith can make one weapon attack, which deals an extra 9 (2d8) necrotic damage on a hit. If it does so, attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

TurningDefiance.name: Turning Defiance
TurningDefiance.description: The sword wraith and any other sword wraiths within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sword wraith makes two weapon attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

CalltoHonor(1/Day).name: CalltoHonor(1/Day)
CalltoHonor(1/Day).description: To use this action, the sword wraith must have taken damage during the current combat. If the sword wraith can use this action, it gives itself advantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn, and 1d4 + 1 sword wraith warrior|mtf|sword wraith warriors appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of it. The warriors last until they drop to 0 hit points, and they take their turns immediately after the commander's turn on the same initiative count.

MartialFury.name: Martial Fury
MartialFury.description: As a bonus action, the sword wraith can make one weapon attack. If it does so, attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: As a bonus action, the tanarukk can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The tanarukk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tanarukk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its greatsword.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

PlantCamouflage.name: Plant Camouflage
PlantCamouflage.description: The thorny has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring vegetation.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The thorny regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the thorny's next turn. The thorny dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

ThornyBody.name: Thorny Body
ThornyBody.description: At the start of its turn, the thorny deals 2 (1d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) piercing damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Titivilus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Titivilus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Titivilus regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Titivilus dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Ventriloquism.name: Ventriloquism
Ventriloquism.description: Whenever Titivilus speaks, he can choose a point within 60 feet; his voice emanates from that point.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Titivilus makes one sword attack and uses his Frightful Word once.

SilverSword.name: SilverSword
SilverSword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage if used with two hands. If the target is a creature, its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to half the necrotic damage it takes.

FrightfulWord.name: FrightfulWord
FrightfulWord.description: Titivilus targets one creature he can see within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, the target must take the Dash action and move away from Titivilus by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the Dash action. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: Titivilus magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

TwistingWords.name: TwistingWords
TwistingWords.description: Titivilus targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a DC 21 Charisma saving throw. On a failure the target is charmed for 1 minute. The charmed target can repeat the saving throw if Titivilus deals any damage to it. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to Titivilus's Twisting Words for 24 hours.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tlincalli makes two attacks: one with its longsword or spiked chain, and one with its sting.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

SpikedChain.name: SpikedChain
SpikedChain.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tlincalli can't use the spiked chain against another target.

Sting.name: Sting
Sting.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If it fails the saving throw by 5 or more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

LightCrossbow.name: LightCrossbow
LightCrossbow.description: rw 2 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

ShellDefense.name: ShellDefense
ShellDefense.description: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is prone, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

ShellDefense.name: ShellDefense
ShellDefense.description: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is prone, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

Transmuter'sStone.name: Transmuter's Stone
Transmuter'sStone.description: The transmuter carries a magic stone it crafted. The stone grants it one of the following benefits while bearing the stone; the transmuter chooses the benefit at the end of each long rest:

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The transmuter makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

ArcaneBurst.name: ArcaneBurst
ArcaneBurst.description: ms,rs 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) acid damage.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the trapper is attached to a ceiling, floor, or wall and remains motionless, it is almost indistinguishable from an ordinary section of ceiling, floor, or wall. A creature that can see it and succeeds on a DC 20 Intelligence (Investigation) or Intelligence (Nature) check can discern its presence.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The trapper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Smother.name: Smother
Smother.description: One Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of the trapper must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape DC 14). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 17 (4d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. While grappled in this way, the target is restrained, blinded, and at risk of suffocating. The trapper can smother only one creature at a time.

CreatureSense.name: Creature Sense
CreatureSense.description: The ulitharid is aware of the presence of creatures within 2 miles of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The ulitharid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

PsionicHub.name: Psionic Hub
PsionicHub.description: If an elder brain establishes a psychic link with the ulitharid, the elder brain can form a psychic link with any other creature the ulitharid can detect using its Creature Sense. Any such link ends if the creature falls outside the telepathy ranges of both the ulitharid and the elder brain. The ulitharid can maintain its psychic link with the elder brain regardless of the distance between them, so long as they are both on the same plane of existence. If the ulitharid is more than 5 miles away from the elder brain, it can end the psychic link at any time (no action required).

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 14) and must succeed on a 17 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

ExtractBrain.name: ExtractBrain
ExtractBrain.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the ulitharid. on hit: 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ulitharid kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

MindBlast{@recharge5}.name: MindBlast{@recharge5}
MindBlast{@recharge5}.description: The ulitharid magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or take 31 (4d12 + 5) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

LifeSense.name: Life Sense
LifeSense.description: The mist can sense the location of any creature within 60 feet of it, unless that creature's type is construct or undead.

Forbiddance.name: Forbiddance
Forbiddance.description: The mist can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

MistyForm.name: Misty Form
MistyForm.description: The mist can occupy another creature's space and vice versa. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can pass through it without squeezing. Each foot of movement in water costs it 2 extra feet, rather than 1 extra foot. The mist can't manipulate objects in any way that requires fingers or manual dexterity.

SunlightHypersensitivity.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
SunlightHypersensitivity.description: The mist takes 10 radiant damage whenever it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, the mist has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

LifeDrain.name: LifeDrain
LifeDrain.description: The mist touches one creature in its space. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw (undead and constructs automatically succeed), or it takes 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage, the mist regains 10 hit points, and the target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

Kiss.name: Kiss
Kiss.description: The vargouille kisses one incapacitated humanoid within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or become cursed. The cursed target loses 1 point of Charisma after each hour, as its head takes on fiendish aspects. The curse doesn't advance while the target is in sunlight or the area of a daylight spell; don't count that time. When the cursed target's Charisma becomes 2, it dies, and its head tears from its body and becomes a new vargouille. Casting remove curse, greater restoration, or a similar spell on the target before the transformation is complete can end the curse. Doing so undoes the changes made to the target by the curse.

StunningShriek.name: StunningShriek
StunningShriek.description: The vargouille shrieks. Each humanoid and beast within 30 feet of the vargouille and able to hear it must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the vargouille's next turn. While frightened in this way, a target is stunned. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the Stunning Shriek of all vargouilles for 1 hour.

PlantCamouflage.name: Plant Camouflage
PlantCamouflage.description: The vegepygmy has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The vegepygmy regains 3 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vegepygmy's next turn. The vegepygmy dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

Sling.name: Sling
Sling.description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

PlantCamouflage.name: Plant Camouflage
PlantCamouflage.description: The vegepygmy has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The vegepygmy regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vegepygmy's next turn. The vegepygmy dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The vegepygmy makes two attacks with its claws or two melee attacks with its spear.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Spores(1/Day).name: Spores(1/Day)
Spores(1/Day).description: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vegepygmy. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area that isn't a plant must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a target takes 9 (2d8) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The velociraptor has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the velociraptor's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The velociraptor makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

PoisonSplash.name: Poison Splash
PoisonSplash.description: When the troll takes damage of any type but psychic, each creature within 5 feet of the troll takes 9 (2d8) poison damage.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage, and the creature is poisoned until the start of the troll's next turn.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

VenomSpray{@recharge}.name: VenomSpray{@recharge}
VenomSpray{@recharge}.description: The troll slices itself with a claw, releasing a spray of poison in a 15-foot cube. The troll takes 7 (2d6) slashing damage (this damage can't be reduced in any way). Each creature in the area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned. A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The priest makes two melee attacks.

Maul.name: Maul
Maul.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

DarkOne'sOwnLuck(RechargesafteraShortorL.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
DarkOne'sOwnLuck(RechargesafteraShortorL.description: When the warlock makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadewith.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

WarlockoftheGreatOldOne.name: Warlock of the Great Old One
Warlock of the Great Old One

WhisperingAura.name: Whispering Aura
WhisperingAura.description: At the start of each of the warlock's turns, each creature of its choice within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage, provided that the warlock isn't incapacitated.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Indomitable(3/Day).name: Indomitable
Indomitable(3/Day).description: The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

Survivor.name: Survivor
Survivor.description: The warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point but fewer hit points than half its hit point maximum.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The warlord makes two weapon attacks.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The wastrilith can breathe air and water.

CorruptWater.name: Corrupt Water
CorruptWater.description: At the start of each of the wastrilith's turns, exposed water within 30 feet of it is befouled. Underwater, this effect lightly obscures the area until a current clears it away. Water in containers remains corrupted until it evaporates.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The wastrilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Undertow.name: Undertow
Undertow.description: As a bonus action when the wastrilith is underwater, it can cause all water within 60 feet of it to be difficult terrain||3 for other creatures until the start of its next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The wastrilith uses Grasping Spout and makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (4d12 + 4) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.

GraspingSpout.name: GraspingSpout
GraspingSpout.description: The wastrilith magically launches a spout of water at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a DC 17 Strength saving throw, and it has disadvantage if it's underwater. On a failed save, it takes 22 (4d8 + 4) acid damage and is pulled up to 60 feet toward the wastrilith. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't pulled.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The myrmidon makes three trident attacks.

Trident.name: Trident
Trident.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

FreezingStrikes{@recharge}.name: FreezingStrikes{@recharge}
FreezingStrikes{@recharge}.description: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10) cold damage. A target that is hit by one or more of these attacks has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: At the start of its turn, the abishai can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The abishai makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its claw.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

FeyStep{@recharge4}.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
FeyStep{@recharge4}.description: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SorrowfulPresence.name: Sorrowful Presence
SorrowfulPresence.description: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is charmed for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the creature has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Sorrowful Presence for the next 24 hours.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d8) slashing damage, or 5 (1d10) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

MagicClub.name: Magic Club
MagicClub.description: In the wood woad's hand, its club is magical and deals 7 (3d4) extra damage (included in its attacks).

PlantCamouflage.name: Plant Camouflage
PlantCamouflage.description: The wood woad has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The wood woad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it is in contact with the ground. If the wood woad takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the wood woad's next turn. The wood woad dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

TreeStride.name: Tree Stride
TreeStride.description: Once on each of its turns, the wood woad can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one living tree within 5 feet of it and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of it that it can see, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The wood woad makes two attacks with its club.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (4d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

WretchedPackTactics.name: Wretched Pack Tactics
WretchedPackTactics.description: The sorrowsworn has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sorrowsworn's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated. The sorrowsworn otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

bludgeoningwhileindimlightordarkness.name: bludgeoning while in dim light or darkness

piercingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: piercing while in dim light or darkness

slashingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: slashing while in dim light or darkness

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage, and the sorrowsworn attaches to the target. While attached, the sorrowsworn can't attack, and at the start of each of the sorrowsworn's turns, the target takes 6 (1d10 + 1) necrotic damage.

LowCunning.name: Low Cunning
LowCunning.description: The xvart can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

OverbearingPack.name: Overbearing Pack
OverbearingPack.description: The xvart has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Raxivort'sTongue.name: Raxivort's Tongue
Raxivort'sTongue.description: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Sling.name: Sling
Sling.description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

LowCunning.name: Low Cunning
LowCunning.description: The xvart can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

OverbearingPack.name: Overbearing Pack
OverbearingPack.description: The xvart has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Raxivort'sTongue.name: Raxivort's Tongue
Raxivort'sTongue.description: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The yagnoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The yagnoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The yagnoloth makes one massive arm attack and one electrified touch attack, or it makes one massive arm attack and teleports before or after the attack.

ElectrifiedTouch.name: ElectrifiedTouch
ElectrifiedTouch.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (6d8) lightning damage.

MassiveArm.name: MassiveArm
MassiveArm.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (3d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or is stunned until the end of the yagnoloth's next turn.

LifeLeech.name: LifeLeech
LifeLeech.description: The yagnoloth touches one incapacitated creature within 15 feet of it. The target takes 36 (7d8 + 4) necrotic damage, and the yagnoloth gains temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest, and the target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

BattlefieldCunning{@recharge4}.name: BattlefieldCunning{@recharge4}
BattlefieldCunning{@recharge4}.description: Up to two allied yugoloths within 60 feet of the yagnoloth that can hear it can use their reactions to make one melee attack each.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The yagnoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Yeenoghu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Yeenoghu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Rampage.name: Rampage
Rampage.description: When Yeenoghu reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on his turn, Yeenoghu can take a bonus action to move up to half his speed and make a bite attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Yeenoghu makes three flail attacks. If an attack hits, he can cause it to create an additional effect of his choice or at random (each effect can be used only once per Multiattack):

Flail.name: Flail
Flail.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (1d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (1d10 + 9) piercing damage.

KeenHearingandSmell.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
KeenHearingandSmell.description: The yeth hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

SunlightBanishment.name: Sunlight Banishment
SunlightBanishment.description: If the yeth hound starts its turn in sunlight, it is transported to the Ethereal Plane. While sunlight shines on the spot from which it vanished, the hound must remain in the Deep Ethereal. After sunset, it returns to the Border Ethereal at the same spot, whereupon it typically sets out to find its pack or its master. The hound is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, but it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane. Once it is adjacent to its master or a pack mate that is on the Material Plane, a yeth hound in the Border Ethereal can return to the Material Plane as an action.

TelepathicBond.name: Telepathic Bond
TelepathicBond.description: While the yeth hound is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadew.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadewith.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadewith.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage if the target is frightened.

BalefulBaying.name: BalefulBaying
BalefulBaying.description: The yeth hound bays magically. Every enemy within 300 feet of the hound that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the hound's next turn or until the hound is incapacitated. A frightened target that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hound must use all its movement on that turn to get as far from the hound as possible, must finish the move before taking an action, and must take the most direct route, even if hazards lie that way. A target that successfully saves is immune to the baying of all yeth hounds for the next 24 hours.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The kruthik has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 2-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Stab.name: Stab
Stab.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The anathema has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

OphidiophobiaAura.name: Ophidiophobia Aura
OphidiophobiaAura.description: Any creature of the anathema's choice, other than a snake or a yuan-ti, that starts its turn within 30 feet of the anathema and can see or hear it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of snakes and yuan-ti. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The anathema can use its action to polymorph into a Huge giant constrictor snake, or back into its true form. its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

SixHeads.name: Six Heads
SixHeads.description: The anathema has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded. charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

Multiattack(AnathemaFormOnly).name: Multiattack(AnathemaFormOnly)
Multiattack(AnathemaFormOnly).description: The anathema makes two claw attacks, one constrict attack, and one Flurry of Bites attack.

Claw(AnathemaFormOnly).name: Claw(AnathemaFormOnly)
Claw(AnathemaFormOnly).description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns, and the anathema can't constrict another target.

FlurryofBites.name: FlurryofBites
FlurryofBites.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 27 (6d6 + 6) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.

MentalResistance.name: Mental Resistance
MentalResistance.description: The broodguard has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't paralyze it.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: At the start of its turn, the broodguard can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The broodguard makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. If it dies, it stays in its current form.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MindFangs(2/Day).name: Mind Fangs
MindFangs(2/Day).description: The first time the yuan-ti hits with a melee attack on its turn, it can deal an extra 16 (3d10) psychic damage to the target.

Sseth'sBlessing.name: Sseth's Blessing
Sseth'sBlessing.description: When the yuan-ti reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, the yuan-ti gains 9 temporary hit points.

Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly).name: Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly)
Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly).description: The yuan-ti makes one bite attack and one scimitar attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

Scimitar(Yuan-tiFormOnly).name: Scimitar(Yuan-tiFormOnly)
Scimitar(Yuan-tiFormOnly).description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. If it dies, it stays in its current form.

DeathFangs(2/Day).name: Death Fangs
DeathFangs(2/Day).description: The first time the yuan-ti hits with a melee attack on its turn, it can deal an extra 16 (3d10) necrotic damage to the target.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly).name: Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly)
Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly).description: The yuan-ti makes one constrict attack and one scimitar attack.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the yuan-ti can't constrict another target.

Scimitar(Yuan-tiFormOnly).name: Scimitar(Yuan-tiFormOnly)
Scimitar(Yuan-tiFormOnly).description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

InvokeNightmare(RechargesafteraShortorLo.name: InvokeNightmare(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Invoke Nightmare (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

InvokeNightmare(RechargesafteraShortorLo.description: The yuan-ti taps into the nightmares of a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and creates an illusory, immobile manifestation of the creature's deepest fears, visible only to that creature. The target must make a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 11 (2d10) psychic damage and is frightened of the manifestation, believing it to be real. The yuan-ti must concentrate to maintain the illusion (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell), which lasts for up to 1 minute and can't be harmed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the illusion on a success, or taking 11 (2d10) psychic damage on a failure.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Poison'sDisciple(2/Day).name: Poison's Disciple
Poison'sDisciple(2/Day).description: The first time the yuan-ti hits with a melee attack on its turn, it can deal an extra 16 (3d10) poison damage to the target.

Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly).name: Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly)
Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly).description: The yuan-ti makes two bite attacks using its snake arms.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

Merrshaulk'sSlumber(1/Day).name: Merrshaulk'sSlumber(1/Day)
Merrshaulk'sSlumber(1/Day).description: The yuan-ti targets up to five creatures that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or fall into a magical sleep and be unconscious for 10 minutes. A sleeping target awakens if it takes damage or if someone uses an action to shake or slap it awake. This magical sleep has no effect on a creature immune to being charmed.

Earth-ShakingMovement.name: Earth-Shaking Movement
Earth-ShakingMovement.description: As a bonus action after moving at least 10 feet on the ground, the zaratan can send a shock wave through the ground in a 120-foot-radius circle centered on itself. That area becomes difficult terrain||3 for 1 minute. Each creature on the ground that is concentration||concentrating must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw or the creature's concentration is broken.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the zaratan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The zaratan's weapon attacks are magical.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Earth-Shaking Movement).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The zaratan makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stomp.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) piercing damage.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (3d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

SpitRock.name: SpitRock
SpitRock.description: rw 17 to hit, range 120/240 ft., one target. on hit: 31 (6d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

SpewDebris{@recharge5}.name: SpewDebris{@recharge5}
SpewDebris{@recharge5}.description: The zaratan exhales rocky debris in a 90-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails the save by 5 or more is knocked prone.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Zuggtmoy fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Zuggtmoy has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Zuggtmoy makes three pseudopod attacks.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

InfestationSpores(3/Day).name: InfestationSpores(3/Day)
InfestationSpores(3/Day).description: Zuggtmoy releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on her, and it lingers for 1 minute. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy and also gains a random form of madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of Zuggtmoy table) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a type of creature that can be (see the "Myconids" entry in the Monster Manual).

MindControlSpores{@recharge5}.name: MindControlSpores{@recharge5}
MindControlSpores{@recharge5}.description: Zuggtmoy releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on her, and it lingers for 1 minute. Humanoids and beasts in the cloud when it appears, or that enter it later, must make a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the influence of Zuggtmoy for 24 hours. While infected in this way, the creature is charmed by her and can't be reinfected by these spores.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The shadow dancer has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

ShadowJump.name: Shadow Jump
ShadowJump.description: As a bonus action, the shadow dancer can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it teleports from and the space it teleports to must be in dim light or darkness. The shadow dancer can use this ability between the weapon attacks of another action it takes.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shadow dancer makes three spiked chain attacks.

SpikedChain.name: SpikedChain
SpikedChain.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or suffer one additional effect of the shadow dancer's choice:

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The soul monger has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The soul monger has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SoulThirst.name: Soul Thirst
SoulThirst.description: When the soul monger reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the soul monger can gain temporary hit points equal to half the creature's hit point maximum. While the soul monger has temporary hit points from this ability, it has advantage on attack rolls.

WeightofAges.name: Weight of Ages
WeightofAges.description: Any beast or humanoid, other than a shadar-kai, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the soul monger has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The soul monger makes two phantasmal dagger attacks.

PhantasmalDagger.name: PhantasmalDagger
PhantasmalDagger.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (4d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 19 (3d12) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on saving throws until the start of the soul monger's next turn.

WaveofWeariness{@recharge4}.name: WaveofWeariness{@recharge4}
WaveofWeariness{@recharge4}.description: The soul monger emits weariness in a 60-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 (10d8) psychic damage and suffers 1 level of exhaustion. On a successful save, it takes 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the stone defender remains motionless against an uneven earthen or stone surface, it is indistinguishable from that surface.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The stone defender has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it is knocked prone.

TwoHeads.name: Two Heads
TwoHeads.description: The Angry has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

RisingAnger.name: Rising Anger
RisingAnger.description: If another creature deals damage to the Angry, the Angry's attack rolls have advantage until the end of its next turn, and the first time it hits with a hook attack on its next turn, the attack's target takes an extra 19 (3d12) psychic damage.

bludgeoningwhileindimlightordarkness.name: bludgeoning while in dim light or darkness

piercingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: piercing while in dim light or darkness

slashingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: slashing while in dim light or darkness

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Angry makes two hook attacks.

Hook.name: Hook
Hook.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage.

LifeHunger.name: Life Hunger
LifeHunger.description: If a creature the Hungry can see regains hit points, the Hungry gains two benefits until the end of its next turn: it has advantage on attack rolls, and its bite deals an extra 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a hit.

bludgeoningwhileindimlightordarkness.name: bludgeoning while in dim light or darkness

piercingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: piercing while in dim light or darkness

slashingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: slashing while in dim light or darkness

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Hungry makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 16) and is restrained until the grapple ends. While grappling a creature, the Hungry can't attack with its claws.

PsychicLeech.name: Psychic Leech
PsychicLeech.description: At the start of each of the Lonely's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

ThrivesonCompany.name: Thrives on Company
ThrivesonCompany.description: The Lonely has advantage on attack rolls while it is within 30 feet of at least two other creatures. It otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

bludgeoningwhileindimlightordarkness.name: bludgeoning while in dim light or darkness

piercingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: piercing while in dim light or darkness

slashingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: slashing while in dim light or darkness

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Lonely makes one harpoon arm attack and uses Sorrowful Embrace.

HarpoonArm.name: HarpoonArm
HarpoonArm.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature.

SorrowfulEmbrace.name: SorrowfulEmbrace
SorrowfulEmbrace.description: Each creature grappled by the Lonely must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. A creature takes 18 (4d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In either case, the Lonely pulls each creature grappled by it up to 30 feet straight toward it.

bludgeoningwhileindimlightordarkness.name: bludgeoning while in dim light or darkness

piercingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: piercing while in dim light or darkness

slashingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: slashing while in dim light or darkness

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Lost makes two arm spike attacks.

ArmSpike.name: ArmSpike
ArmSpike.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage.

Embrace.name: Embrace
Embrace.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (4d10 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target is frightened, and it takes 27 (6d8) psychic damage at the end of each of its turns. The Lost can embrace only one creature at a time.

WretchedPackTactics.name: Wretched Pack Tactics
WretchedPackTactics.description: The Wretched has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the Wretched's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated. The Wretched otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

bludgeoningwhileindimlightordarkness.name: bludgeoning while in dim light or darkness

piercingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: piercing while in dim light or darkness

slashingwhileindimlightordarkness.name: slashing while in dim light or darkness

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage, and the Wretched attaches to the target. While attached, the Wretched can't attack, and at the start of each of the Wretched's turns, the target takes 6 (1d10 + 1) necrotic damage.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: Mr. Greystone has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Brute.name: Brute
Brute.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Mr. Greystone hits with it (included in the attack).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Mr. Greystone makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

NimbleEscape.name: Nimble Escape
NimbleEscape.description: Slurmy can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of their turns.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal zurkhwood mushroom.

Mute.name: Mute
Mute.description: If the awakened zurkhwood was created by a myconid sovereign, it can't speak.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

FungusStride.name: Fungus Stride
FungusStride.description: Once on its turn, the bridesmaid can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one living mushroom or fungus patch within 5 feet and emerge from another within 60 feet of the first one, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second mushroom or fungus patch. The mushrooms and patches must be large or bigger.

HallucinationSpores.name: HallucinationSpores
HallucinationSpores.description: The bridesmaid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target is incapacitated. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

InfestationSpores(1/Day).name: InfestationSpores(1/Day)
InfestationSpores(1/Day).description: The bridesmaid releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on it, and the cloud lingers for 1 minute. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy and also gains a random form of indefinite madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of Zuggtmoy table in appendix D) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must be repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a type of creature that can be (see the "Myconids" entry in the Monster Manual).

MushroomPortal.name: Mushroom Portal
MushroomPortal.description: The chamberlain counts as a mushroom for the Fungus Stride feature of the bridesmaid of Zuggtmoy.

PoisonSpores.name: Poison Spores
PoisonSpores.description: Whenever the chamberlain takes damage, it releases a cloud of spores. Creatures within 5 feet of the chamberlain when this happens must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The chamberlain makes two slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

InfestationSpores(1/Day).name: InfestationSpores(1/Day)
InfestationSpores(1/Day).description: The chamberlain releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on it, and the cloud lingers for 1 minute. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy and also gains a random form of indefinite madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of Zuggtmoy table in appendix D) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must be repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a type of creature that can be (see the "Myconids" entry in the Monster Manual).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The spore servant makes two pincer attacks.

Pincer.name: Pincer
Pincer.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (Escape DC 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature and the spore servant doesn't have two other creatures grappled.

DuergarResilience.name: Duergar Resilience

value.value: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: For 1 minute, Horgar magically increases in size, along with anything he is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, Horgar is Large, doubles his damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If Horgar lacks the room to become Large, he attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand Horgar. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if Horgar is incapacitated.

StoneCamouflage.description: The Pudding King has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

Insanity.name: Insanity
Insanity.description: The Pudding King has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

WarPick.name: WarPick

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: The Pudding King magically transforms into an ooze|bestiary|type=ooze, or back into his true form. He reverts to his true form if he dies. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying is absorbed by the new form. In ooze form, the Pudding King retains his alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. His statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form.

value.value: Create Green Slime (Recharges after a Long Rest)

CreateGreenSlime(RechargesafteraLongRest.description: The Pudding King creates a patch of green slime (see "Dungeon Hazards" in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide). The slime appears on a section of wall, ceiling, or floor within 30 feet of the Pudding King.

ChameleonSkin.name: Chameleon Skin
ChameleonSkin.description: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.description: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The troglodyte makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with either its claws or its greatclub.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage.

Greatclub.name: Greatclub
Greatclub.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

AcidSpray{@recharge}.name: AcidSpray{@recharge}
AcidSpray{@recharge}.description: The troglodyte spits acid in a line 15 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

VampiricBite.name: VampiricBite
VampiricBite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken, and the ixitxachitl regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

VampiricBite.name: VampiricBite
VampiricBite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

LegendaryResistance(1/Day).description: If Yestabrod fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (3d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (3d4) poison damage.

CausticSpores(1/Day).name: CausticSpores(1/Day)
CausticSpores(1/Day).description: Yestabrod releases spores in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage at the start of each of Yestabrod's turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success.

InfestationSpores(1/Day).name: InfestationSpores(1/Day)
InfestationSpores(1/Day).description: Yestabrod releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on it, and the cloud lingers for 1 minute. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy and also gains a random form of indefinite madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of Zuggtmoy table in appendix D) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must be repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a type of creature that can be (see the "Myconids" entry in the Monster Manual).

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The thug has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The thug makes two melee attacks

Avoidance.description: If the mutate is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

LightSensitivity.name: Light Sensitivity
LightSensitivity.description: While in bright light, the mutate has disadvantage on attack rolls.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mutate makes one Corpse Swipe attack and two Tail attacks, or it makes four Tail attacks.

CorpseSwipe.name: CorpseSwipe
CorpseSwipe.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, a creature can't regain hit points.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

Sure-Footed.name: Sure-Footed
Sure-Footed.description: The skeleton has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that make it have the prone condition.

Battleaxe.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cluster makes two Slam attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Spawn Progeny if available.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and if the target is a creature, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. If this attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target immediately dies and is consumed by the cluster.

SpawnProgeny(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.name: SpawnProgeny(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Spawn Progeny (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

SpawnProgeny(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.description: The cluster bulges and spews 1d4 mature eggs. Each egg lands in an unoccupied space of the cluster's choice within 30 feet of itself and immediately transforms into an encephalon gemmule|PaBTSO. The gemmules obey the cluster's commands and take their turns immediately after it.

EncephalonProgeny.name: Encephalon Progeny
EncephalonProgeny.description: The gemmule matures into an encephalon cluster if not killed within 30 (4d12 + 4) days of its creation.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The gemmule has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

PsychicSlam.name: PsychicSlam
PsychicSlam.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d10) psychic damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ashenwight makes two Necrotic Shard attacks.

NecroticShard.name: NecroticShard
NecroticShard.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The auger deals double damage to objects and structures.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The auger can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

FlamingDrill.name: FlamingDrill
FlamingDrill.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage. If the auger moves at least 20 feet in a straight line toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an additional 11 (2d10) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The flesh meld can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

AuraofDeath.name: Aura of Death
AuraofDeath.description: At the start of each of the flesh meld's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 3 (1d6) necrotic damage and have the poisoned condition until the start of the flesh meld's next turn.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The flesh meld has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The flesh meld can climb difficult surfaces, including ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The flesh meld makes two Bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 15) and is pulled up to 15 feet toward the flesh meld.

MentalBurst.name: Mental Burst
MentalBurst.description: When the goblin dies, its pent-up mental energy explodes in a psychic blast. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw or take 5 (2d4) psychic damage.

MentalFortitude.name: Mental Fortitude
MentalFortitude.description: The goblin has advantage on saving throws against effects that would make it have the charmed or frightened condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The goblin makes two Unarmed Strike attacks.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

MentalBurst.name: Mental Burst
MentalBurst.description: When the goblin dies, its pent-up mental energy explodes in a psychic blast. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw or take 10 (4d4) psychic damage.

MentalFortitude.name: Mental Fortitude
MentalFortitude.description: The goblin has advantage on saving throws against effects that would make it have the charmed or frightened conditions.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The goblin makes three Psychic Blade attacks.

PsychicBlade.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) psychic damage, and the target must subtract 1d4 from the next attack roll or saving throw it makes before the end of the goblin's next turn.

SynapticRend{@recharge5}.name: SynapticRend{@recharge5}
SynapticRend{@recharge5}.description: The goblin unleashes a 30-foot-radius sphere of psychic energy, centered on a point the goblin can see within 60 feet of itself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 (4d6) psychic damage and has the incapacitated condition until the end of the goblin's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The grell psychic makes one Tentacle attack and one Beak attack.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d4 + 3) piercing damage.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition for 1 minute. While the target is poisoned, it also has the paralyzed condition. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The target also has the grappled condition (escape 16). While grappling the target, the grell can't make Tentacle attacks against other targets. When the grell moves, any Medium or smaller target it is grappling moves with it.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the mutate has disadvantage on attack rolls.

Multiattack.description: The mutate makes two Unarmed Strike or Nightmare Blast attacks.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

NightmareBlast.name: NightmareBlast
NightmareBlast.description: rw 6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 7 (2d6) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or have the frightened condition until the start of the mutate's next turn.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Glasstaff wields a staff of defense|PaBTSO (see appendix B). With the staff in hand, he can use an action to cast the mage armor spell and use his reaction to cast the shield spell.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
