Multiattack.description: Glasstaff makes two Shocking Burst attacks.

ShockingBurst.name: ShockingBurst
ShockingBurst.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) lightning damage.

CreatureSense.name: Creature Sense
CreatureSense.description: The elder brain is aware of creatures within 1 mile of itself that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each one's Intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The elder brain has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

TelepathicHub.name: Telepathic Hub
TelepathicHub.description: The elder brain can use its telepathy to initiate and maintain telepathic conversations with up to ten creatures at a time. The elder brain can let those creatures telepathically hear each other while connected in this way.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The elder brain makes two Tentacle attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (3d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14) and takes 9 (1d8 + 5) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns until the grapple ends. The elder brain can have up to four targets grappled at a time.

MindBlast{@recharge5}.name: MindBlast{@recharge5}
MindBlast{@recharge5}.description: Creatures of the elder brain's choice within 60 feet of itself must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or take 32 (5d10 + 5) psychic damage and have the stunned condition for 1 minute. A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

CacophonyofMinds.name: Cacophony of Minds
CacophonyofMinds.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the intellect snare must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or have the incapacitated condition for 1 minute. An incapacitated creature can repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this intellect snare's Cacophony of Minds for 24 hours.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The intellect snare has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The intellect snare makes two Tentacle attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) force damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 17).

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Lowarnizel can breathe both air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Lowarnizel makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) force damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

SingularityBreath{@recharge5}.name: SingularityBreath{@recharge5}
SingularityBreath{@recharge5}.description: Lowarnizel creates a shining bead of gravitational force, then releases the energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 36 (8d8) force damage, and its speed becomes 0 until the start of the dragon's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the mind flayer fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mind flayer makes two Tentacle attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 17) and must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or have the incapacitated condition until the grapple ends.

ExtractBrain.name: ExtractBrain
ExtractBrain.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated Humanoid grappled by the mind flayer. on hit: 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills it by extracting and devouring its brain.

UnleashVoid{@recharge5}.name: UnleashVoid{@recharge5}
UnleashVoid{@recharge5}.description: The mind flayer opens a rift into the Far Realm, centered on a point the mind flayer can see within 60 feet of itself, and a tentacle lashes across creatures near the rift. Each creature other than mind flayers within 30 feet of the rift must make a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw, after which the tentacle disappears and the rift closes. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) cold damage from the rift plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage from the tentacle and has the stunned condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Awareness.name: Awareness
Awareness.description: The mind flayer has advantage on initiative rolls and can't be surprised as long as it doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 16) and must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or have the stunned condition until the grapple ends.

ExtractBrain.name: ExtractBrain
ExtractBrain.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Humanoid grappled by the mind flayer. on hit: 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills it by extracting and devouring its brain.

MindWhip{@recharge5}.name: MindWhip{@recharge5}
MindWhip{@recharge5}.description: The mind flayer lashes out with psychic energy, targeting up to two creatures it can see within 60 feet of itself. Each target must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 23 (4d8 + 5) psychic damage and have the stunned condition for 1 minute. A stunned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Nezznar has a fully charged spider staff|LMoP (see appendix B).

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Nezznar has advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the charmed condition on himself, and magic can't put him to sleep.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: Nezznar has disadvantage on attack rolls while he or his target is in sunlight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Nezznar makes two Poison Blast attacks.

PoisonBlast.name: PoisonBlast
PoisonBlast.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (2d8) poison damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The oculorb has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

WatchfulEyes.name: Watchful Eyes
WatchfulEyes.description: The oculorb has advantage on initiative rolls and can't be surprised.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The oculorb makes two Dreadful Contact attacks or four Eye Beam attacks.

DreadfulContact.name: DreadfulContact
DreadfulContact.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) psychic damage, or 25 (6d6 + 4) psychic damage if the target has the frightened condition.

EyeBeam.name: EyeBeam
EyeBeam.description: rs 8 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) psychic damage.

AntipathicFlood{@recharge5}.name: AntipathicFlood{@recharge5}
AntipathicFlood{@recharge5}.description: The oculorb releases a wave of negative emotions, choosing one of the following options:

WeepingEyes.name: WeepingEyes
WeepingEyes.description: The oculorb weeps, releasing a wave of crushing despair. Each creature within 30 feet of the oculorb must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature's speed is reduced to 0 feet until the end of the oculorb's next turn, and if the creature was concentration||concentrating, its concentration is broken.

WitheringGlare.name: WitheringGlare
WitheringGlare.description: The oculorb's eyes unleash furious scarlet energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 (6d10) necrotic damage and has the frightened condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't frightened. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Oshundo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Oshundo makes two Chilling Grasp or Arcane Bolt attacks.

ChillingGrasp.name: ChillingGrasp
ChillingGrasp.description: ms 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (4d6) cold damage, and Oshundo regains 14 hit points if the target is a creature.

ArcaneBolt.name: ArcaneBolt
ArcaneBolt.description: rs 8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (8d6) force damage.

ThunderingBlast{@recharge5}.name: ThunderingBlast{@recharge5}
ThunderingBlast{@recharge5}.description: Oshundo emits a wave of domineering energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) thunder damage and have the stunned condition for 1 minute. A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

VirulentBreath.name: Virulent Breath
VirulentBreath.description: Noxious gas from the mutate's digestion of previous meals spews from its mouth. At the start of the mutate's turn, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 3 (1d6) poison damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mutate makes two Bite or Tentacle attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Chitin Slam.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure. On a successful save, the target is no longer poisoned. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until it no longer has the poisoned condition.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 15) and the restrained condition until this grapple ends. The mutate has two tentacles that can grapple one target each.

ChitinSlam.name: ChitinSlam
ChitinSlam.description: The mutate targets one creature it is grappling, slamming the creature against its chitinous plating. The creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 16 (3d10) bludgeoning damage and have the stunned condition until the end of the mutate's next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ashenwight makes two Necrotic Shard attacks. It also uses Psionic Crown if available.

NecroticShard.name: NecroticShard
NecroticShard.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

PsionicCrown{@recharge5}.name: PsionicCrown{@recharge5}
PsionicCrown{@recharge5}.description: The ashenwight wreathes the head of a creature it can see within 60 feet of itself with a crown of jagged, spectral crystals. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or have the charmed condition for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the target's thoughts are sluggish; it can't take reactions, its speed is halved, and it takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Qunbraxel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Qunbraxel makes two Eldritch Bolt attacks, or one Eldritch Bolt attack and one Tentacle attack.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 16) and must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or have the stunned condition until the grapple ends.

EldritchBolt.name: EldritchBolt
EldritchBolt.description: rs 8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) force damage.

ExtractBrain.name: ExtractBrain
ExtractBrain.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Humanoid with the stunned condition who is grappled by Qunbraxel. on hit: 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, Qunbraxel kills it by extracting and devouring its brain.

MindBlast{@recharge5}.name: MindBlast{@recharge5}
MindBlast{@recharge5}.description: Qunbraxel magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 26 (5d8 + 4) psychic damage and have the stunned condition for 1 minute. A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

CreatureSense.name: Creature Sense
CreatureSense.description: The refraction is aware of creatures within 100 miles of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each one's Intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The refraction can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

LegendaryResistance(5/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(5/Day).description: If the refraction fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The refraction has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The refraction makes two Dissonant Claw attacks.

DissonantClaw.name: DissonantClaw
DissonantClaw.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) psychic damage. If the target is a creature concentration||concentrating on a spell, its concentration is broken.

MindBlast{@recharge5}.name: MindBlast{@recharge5}
MindBlast{@recharge5}.description: Creatures of the refraction's choice within 60 feet of it must succeed on a DC 19 Intelligence saving throw or take 33 (5d10 + 6) psychic damage and have the stunned condition for 1 minute. A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The refraction teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied place that it can see.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: When Ruxithid fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MentalFortitude.name: Mental Fortitude
MentalFortitude.description: Ruxithid has advantage on saving throws against the charmed and frightened conditions.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ruxithid makes two Psi-Charged Scimitar attacks.

Psi-ChargedScimitar.name: Psi-ChargedScimitar
Psi-ChargedScimitar.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The guard makes two melee attacks.

Morningstar.name: Morningstar
Morningstar.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The priest makes two melee attacks.

Glaive.name: Glaive
Glaive.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage.

BondoftheBlackEarth.name: Bond of the Black Earth
BondoftheBlackEarth.description: The burrowshark is magically bound to a bulette trained to serve as its mount. While mounted on its bulette, the burrowshark shares the bulette's senses and can ride the bulette while it burrows. The bonded bulette obeys the burrowshark's commands. If its mount dies, the burrowshark can train a new bulette to serve as its bonded mount, a process requiring a month.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The burrowshark makes three melee attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

SharktoothedLongsword.name: SharktoothedLongsword
SharktoothedLongsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands. Against a target is wearing no armor, the reaver deals an extra die of damage with this sword.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

BondedMount.name: Bonded Mount
BondedMount.description: The knight is magically bound to a beast with an innate swimming speed trained to serve as its mount. While mounted on this beast, the knight gains the beast's senses and ability to breathe underwater. The bonded mount obeys the knight's commands. If its mount dies, the knight can train a new beast to serve as its bonded mount, a process requiring a month.

SneakAttack.name: Sneak Attack
SneakAttack.description: The knight deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the knight that isn't incapacitated and the knight doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The knight makes two shortsword attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Lance.name: Lance
Lance.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage.

ActionSurge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRe.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
ActionSurge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRe.description: Drannin takes an additional action on his turn.

Brute.name: Brute
Brute.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Drannin hits with it (included in the attack).

DwarvenResilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
DwarvenResilience.description: Drannin has advantage on saving throws against poison.

Indomitable(RechargesafteraShortorLongRe.name: Indomitable (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
Indomitable(RechargesafteraShortorLongRe.description: Drannin can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

SecondWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
SecondWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.description: Drannin can use a bonus action to regain 16 (1d10 + 11) hit points.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Drannin wears a control amulet for his shield guardian (see the Monster Manual) and a ring of cold resistance. He also carries a potion of frost giant strength.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Drannin makes three attacks with his greataxe.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.

SummonMephits(RechargesafteraLongRest).name: Summon Mephits (Recharges after a Long Rest)
SummonMephits(RechargesafteraLongRest).description: By puffing on his pipe, Elizar can use an action to cast conjure minor elementals. If he does so, he summons four smoke mephits.

Dagger+1.name: Dagger+1
Dagger+1.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

FlamingWeapon(RechargesafteraShortorLong.name: Flaming Weapon (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
FlamingWeapon(RechargesafteraShortorLong.description: As a bonus action, the guard can wreath one melee weapon it is wielding in flame. The guard is unharmed by this fire, which lasts until the end of the guard's next turn. While wreathed in flame, the weapon deals an extra 3 (1d6) fire damage on a hit.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The guard makes two melee attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Shapechanger(2/Day).name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger(2/Day).description: The fathomer can use its action to polymorph into a Medium serpent composed of water, or back into its true form. Anything the fathomer is wearing or carrying is subsumed into the serpent form during the change, inaccessible until the fathomer returns to its true form. The fathomer reverts to its true form after 4 hours, unless it can expend another use of this trait. If the fathomer is knocked unconscious or dies, it also reverts to its true form.

Olhydra'sArmor(HumanFormOnly).name: Olhydra's Armor (Human Form Only)
Olhydra'sArmor(HumanFormOnly).description: The fathomer can cast mage armor at will, without expending material components.

Constrict(SerpentFormOnly).name: Constrict(SerpentFormOnly)
Constrict(SerpentFormOnly).description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 12). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the fathomer can't constrict another target.

Dagger(HumanFormOnly).name: Dagger(HumanFormOnly)
Dagger(HumanFormOnly).description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The knight makes two melee attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

WreathedinFlame.name: Wreathed in Flame
WreathedinFlame.description: For the flamewrath, the warm version of the fire shield spell has a duration of "until dispelled." The fire shield burns for 10 minutes after the flamewrath dies, consuming its body.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Assassinate.name: Assassinate
Assassinate.description: During its first turn, Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Ghald scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

LimitedAmphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
LimitedAmphibiousness.description: Ghald can breathe air and water, but he needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

SharkTelepathy.name: Shark Telepathy
SharkTelepathy.description: Ghald can magically command any shark within 120 feet of him, using a limited telepathy.

SneakAttack.name: Sneak Attack
SneakAttack.description: Ghald deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Ghald's that isn't incapacitated and Ghald doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ghald makes three attacks, one with his bite and two with his shortswords.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) piercing damage.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Garrote.name: Garrote
Garrote.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or Small creature against which Ghald has advantage on the attack roll. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target can't breathe, and Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against it.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If Hellenrae is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

StunningStrike{@recharge5}.name: Stunning Strike {@recharge 5}
StunningStrike{@recharge5}.description: When Hellenrae hits a target with a melee weapon attack, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of Hellenrae's next turn.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

UnarmoredMovement.name: Unarmored Movement
UnarmoredMovement.description: While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her speed increases by 20 feet (included in her speed).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Hellenrae makes three melee attacks.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

GuidingWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRe.name: Guiding Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
GuidingWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRe.description: As a bonus action, the initiate gains advantage on the next ranged attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The initiate can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The priest can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The priest makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While the hurricane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

UnarmoredMovement.name: Unarmored Movement
UnarmoredMovement.description: While the hurricane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its walking speed increases by 15 feet (included in its speed).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hurricane makes two melee attacks.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

EmpoweredAttacks.name: Empowered Attacks
EmpoweredAttacks.description: Imix's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

FireAura.name: Fire Aura
FireAura.description: At the start of each of Imix's turns, each creature within 10 feet of him takes 17 (5d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature also takes 17 (5d6) fire damage if it touches Imix or hits him with a melee attack while within 10 feet of him, and a creature takes that damage the first time on a turn that Imix moves into its space. Nonmagical weapons that hit Imix are destroyed by fire immediately after dealing damage to him

FireForm.name: Fire Form
FireForm.description: Imix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. He can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing if fire could pass through that space.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: Imix sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius and dim light for an additional 60 feet.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Imix fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Imix has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Imix makes two slam attacks or two flame blast attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (5d6) fire damage.

FlameBlast.name: FlameBlast
FlameBlast.description: rs 12 to hit, range 250 ft., one target. on hit: 35 (10d6) fire damage.

SummonElementals(1/Day).name: SummonElementals(1/Day)
SummonElementals(1/Day).description: Imix summons up to three fire elemental||fire elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Imix, and disappear if Imix is reduced to 0 hit points.

EarthenDefeat.name: Earthen Defeat
EarthenDefeat.description: When Marlos drops to 0 hit points, his body transforms into mud and collapses into a pool. Anything he is wearing or carrying is left behind.

EarthPassage.name: Earth Passage
EarthPassage.description: Marlos can move in difficult terrain||3 composed of anything made from earth or stone as if it were normal terrain. He can move through solid earth and rock as if it were difficult terrain||3. If he ends his turn there, he is shunted into the nearest space he last occupied.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If Marlos fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

PetrifyingGaze.name: Petrifying Gaze
PetrifyingGaze.description: When a creature that can see Marlos's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of him, Marlos can force it to make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw if Marlos isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Marlos makes three melee attacks, one with his snake hair and two with Ironfang|PotA.

SnakeHair.name: SnakeHair
SnakeHair.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.

Ironfang.name: Ironfang
Ironfang.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) thunder damage.

EarthWalk.name: Earth Walk
EarthWalk.description: Moving through difficult terrain||3 made of earth or stone costs Miraj no extra movement.

Staff.name: Staff
Staff.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

EmpoweredAttacks.name: Empowered Attacks
EmpoweredAttacks.description: Ogrmoch's slam attacks are treated as magical and adamantine for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Ogrmoch fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Ogrmoch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: Ogrmoch deals double damage to objects and structures with his melee and ranged weapon attacks.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ogrmoch makes two slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

Boulder.name: Boulder
Boulder.description: rw 6 to hit, range 500 ft., one target. on hit: 46 (7d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

SummonElementals(1/Day).name: SummonElementals(1/Day)
SummonElementals(1/Day).description: Ogrmoch summons up to three earth elemental||earth elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Ogrmoch, and disappear if Ogrmoch is reduced to 0 hit points.

EmpoweredAttacks.name: Empowered Attacks
EmpoweredAttacks.description: Olhydra's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Olhydra fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Olhydra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

WaterForm.name: Water Form
WaterForm.description: Olhydra can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. She can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Olhydra makes two slam attacks or two water jet attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19). Olhydra can grapple up to four targets. When Olhydra moves, all creatures she is grappling move with her.

WaterJet.name: WaterJet
WaterJet.description: rw 12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target is knocked prone if it fails a DC 19 Strength saving throw.

SummonElementals(1/Day).name: SummonElementals(1/Day)
SummonElementals(1/Day).description: Olhydra summons up to three water elemental||water elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental she summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Olhydra, and disappear if Olhydra is reduced to 0 hit points.

ChillingMist.name: Chilling Mist
ChillingMist.description: While it is alive, the one-eyed shiver projects an aura of cold mist within 10 feet of itself. If the one-eyed shiver deals damage to a creature in this area, the creature also takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

EyeofFrost.name: EyeofFrost
EyeofFrost.description: The one-eyed shiver casts ray of frost from its missing eye. If it hits, the target is also restrained. A target restrained in this way can end the condition by using an action, succeeding on a DC 13 Strength check.

GrimHarvest.name: Grim Harvest
GrimHarvest.description: Once per turn when Oreioth kills one or more creatures with a spell of 1st level or higher, he regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level.

SwiftAnimation(RechargesafteraLongRest).name: Swift Animation (Recharges after a Long Rest)
SwiftAnimation(RechargesafteraLongRest).description: When a living Medium or Small humanoid within 30 feet of Oreioth dies, he can use an action on his next turn to cast animate dead on that humanoid's corpse, instead of using the spell's normal casting time.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

SearingArmor.name: Searing Armor
SearingArmor.description: The razerblast's armor is hot. Any creature grappling the razerblast or grappled by it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the end of that creature's turn.

ShrapnelExplosion.name: Shrapnel Explosion
ShrapnelExplosion.description: When the razerblast drops to 0 hit points, a flaming orb in its chest explodes, destroying the razerblast's body and scattering its armor as shrapnel. Creatures within 10 feet of the razerblast when it explodes must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The razerblast makes three melee attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

UnarmoredMovement.name: Unarmored Movement
UnarmoredMovement.description: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its walking speed increases by 10 feet (included in its speed).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The monk makes two melee attacks.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: When the Stonemelder dies, it turns to stone and explodes in a burst of rock shards, becoming a smoking pile of rubble. Each creature within 10 feet of the exploding Stonemelder must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

BlackEarthRod.name: BlackEarthRod
BlackEarthRod.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage. The Stonemelder can also expend a spell slot to deal extra damage, dealing 2d8 bludgeoning damage for a 1st level slot, plus an additional 1d8 for each level of the slot above 1st.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Thurl makes two melee attacks.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Lance.name: Lance
Lance.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage.

FuneralPyre.name: Funeral Pyre
FuneralPyre.description: When Vanifer drops to 0 hit points, her body is consumed in a flash of fire and smoke. Anything she was wearing or carrying is left behind among ashes.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If Vanifer fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Vanifer makes two attacks.

Tinderstrike.name: Tinderstrike
Tinderstrike.description: mw,rw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

BraveDevotion.name: Brave Devotion
BraveDevotion.description: Wiggan has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Wiggan makes two attacks with his wooden cane.

WoodenCane.name: WoodenCane
WoodenCane.description: mw 0 to hit (4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Windharrow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Windharrow makes two melee attacks.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

AirForm.name: Air Form
AirForm.description: Yan-C-Bin can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. He can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing if air could pass through that space.

EmpoweredAttacks.name: Empowered Attacks
EmpoweredAttacks.description: Yan-C-Bin's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Yan-C-Bin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Yan-C-Bin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Yan-C-Bin makes two slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) force damage plus 10 (3d6) lightning damage.

Thundercrack(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.name: Thundercrack(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Thundercrack (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Thundercrack(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.description: Yan-C-Bin unleashes a terrible thundercrack in a 100-foot-radius sphere centered on himself. All other creatures in the area must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or take 31 (9d6) thunder damage and be deafened for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is deafened until the start of Yan-C-Bin's next turn.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: Yan-C-Bin polymorphs into a Medium humanoid. While in polymorphed form, a swirling breeze surrounds him, his eyes are pale and cloudy, and he loses the Air Form trait. He can remain in polymorphed form for up to 1 hour. Reverting to his true form requires an action.

SummonElementals(1/Day).name: SummonElementals(1/Day)
SummonElementals(1/Day).description: Yan-C-Bin summons up to three air elemental||air elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Yan-C-Bin, and disappear if Yan-C-Bin is reduced to 0 hit points.

Inscrutable.name: Inscrutable
Inscrutable.description: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sphinx makes a ram attack and two claw attacks.

Ram.name: Ram
Ram.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The manticore makes two attacks, one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

Stinger.name: Stinger
Stinger.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The serpopard has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.description: If the serpopard moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the serpopard can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

RakingCharge.name: Raking Charge
RakingCharge.description: If the kavu moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the kavu can make one rend attack against it as a bonus action.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. on hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) slashing damage.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the creepy doll remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary, inanimate doll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The creepy doll makes one attack with its scissors and uses Psychic Assault.

Scissors.name: Scissors
Scissors.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

PsychicAssault.name: PsychicAssault
PsychicAssault.description: The creepy doll targets one creature it can see within 10 feet of it that has a brain. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage. Also on a failure, roll 3d6. If the total equals or exceeds the target's Intelligence score, that score is reduced to 0. The target is stunned until it regains at least one point of Intelligence, as from the greater restoration spell or similar magic.

BodyExchange.name: BodyExchange
BodyExchange.description: The creepy doll initiates an Intelligence contest with an incapacitated humanoid within 5 feet of it. If it wins the contest, the creepy doll's spirit inhabits the target's body while the target's spirit is placed into the creepy doll's body. The creepy doll controls the target's body completely. It retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies. The target retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma while inhabiting the creepy doll's body.

EtherealSight.name: Ethereal Sight
EtherealSight.description: The geist can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The geist can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

WitheringTouch.name: WitheringTouch
WitheringTouch.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target on hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage.

Etherealness.name: Etherealness
Etherealness.description: The geist enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

Possession{@recharge}.name: Possession{@recharge}
Possession{@recharge}.description: One creature that the geist can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the geist; the geist then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The geist now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The geist can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies. The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the geist ends it as a bonus action, or the geist is turned or forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the geist reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this geist's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends. The geist can instead target the corpse of a creature, effectively using its own life force to animate the corpse as a zombie. The animated corpse uses zombie statistics and returns to death if the geist ends the possession.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadew.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks not made with living wood weapons

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadewith.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks not made with living wood weapons

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadewith.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with living wood weapons

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape DC 13).

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

VampiricGlamer.name: VampiricGlamer
VampiricGlamer.description: The vampire obscures its form with mind-affecting magic that makes others perceive it as a beautiful human of the same size and shape. The illusion ends if the vampire takes a bonus action to end it or if the vampire dies. A creature that can see the vampire can take an action to visually inspect it, ending the mental effect on itself and seeing the vampire's true form with a successful DC 20 Wisdom (Perception) check.

AuraofSilence.name: AuraofSilence
AuraofSilence.description: The vampire shrouds itself in a cloak of silence to a radius of 2 feet. Within that radius, the effect is the same as the silence spell.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The werewolf polymorphs into a wolf-humanoid canid form, or back into its true human form. This change is dictated by the moon, but can also be induced by trauma or strong emotion. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

KeenHearingandSmell.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
KeenHearingandSmell.description: The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Howlpack:Vildin.name: Howlpack: Vildin
Howlpack:Vildin.description: Vildin Rampage (Canid Form Only). When the werewolf reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, it can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadew.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadewith.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadewith.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

Multiattack(CanidFormOnly).name: Multiattack(CanidFormOnly)
Multiattack(CanidFormOnly).description: The werewolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or spear.

Bite(CanidFormOnly).name: Bite(CanidFormOnly)
Bite(CanidFormOnly).description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

Claws(CanidFormOnly).name: Claws(CanidFormOnly)
Claws(CanidFormOnly).description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

Spear(HumanFormOnly).name: Spear(HumanFormOnly)
Spear(HumanFormOnly).description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

AetherScent.name: Aether Scent
AetherScent.description: The gremlin can pinpoint, by scent, the location of refined or unrefined aether within 30 feet of it.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

Siphon.name: Siphon
Siphon.description: The gremlin drains aether from an aether-powered device it can see within 5 feet of it. If the object isn't being worn or carried, the touch automatically drains aether. If the object is being worn or carried by a creature, the creature must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw to keep it out of the gremlin's reach.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the leviathan. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the leviathan, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the leviathan's turns.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the chupacabra has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

DrainBlood.name: DrainBlood
DrainBlood.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature that is prone, incapacitated, or restrained. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken, and the chupacabra regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the elder dinosaur fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The elder dinosaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The elder dinosaur deals double damage to objects and structures.

Uniqueness.name: Uniqueness
Uniqueness.description: These statistics are shared by all six elder dinosaurs: Elder Dinosaur (Etali, Primal Storm)|PSX|Etali, Primal Storm, Elder Dinosaur (Ghalta, Primal Hunger)|PSX|Ghalta, Primal Hunger, Elder Dinosaur (Nezahal, Primal Tide)|PSX|Nezahal, Primal Tide, Elder Dinosaur (Tetzimoc, Primal Death)|PSX|Tetzimoc, Primal Death, Elder Dinosaur (Zacama, Primal Calamity)|PSX|Zacama, Primal Calamity, Elder Dinosaur (Zetalpa, Primal Dawn)|PSX|Zetalpa, Primal Dawn

FrightfulPresence.name: FrightfulPresence
FrightfulPresence.description: Each creature of the elder dinosaur's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the elder dinosaur is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself ona success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the elder dinosaur's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description: The elder dinosaur makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the elder dinosaur, and it takes 56 (16d6) acid damage at the start of each of the elder dinosaur's turns. If the elder dinosaur takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of it. If the elder dinosaur dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The deathspitter makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

SpitPoison.name: SpitPoison
SpitPoison.description: rw 5 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one creature. on hit: The target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, a creature that fails its saving throw is blinded until the end of the deathspitter's next turn.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Gishath fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Gishath makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stomp or tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 39 (5d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or it is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Gishath can't bite another target.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description: Gishath makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside Gishath, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of Gishath's turns.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 29 (5d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

DeathThroes.name: Death Throes
DeathThroes.description: When the sunbird dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried. The sunbird's body turns to ash, but an egg is left where the sunbird was.

FireAura.name: Fire Aura
FireAura.description: At the start of each of the sunbird's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 11 (2d10) fire damage, and flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the sunbird or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 11 (2d10) fire damage. The aura also sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius and dim light for an additional 60 feet.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The sunbird doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

KeenHearingandSight.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
KeenHearingandSight.description: The sunbird has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sunbird makes two talon attacks.

Talon.name: Talon
Talon.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d6 + 9) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the sunbird can't attack another target with that talon. A grappled creature takes 11 (2d10) fire damage at the start of each of the sunbird's turns.

AngelicWeapons.name: Angelic Weapons
AngelicWeapons.description: The archon's weapon attacks are magical. When the archon hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

AxiomaticMind.name: Axiomatic Mind
AxiomaticMind.description: The archon can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its understanding of justice.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

OneBeing.name: One Being
OneBeing.description: Though it appears as a humanoid creature riding a mount, an archon is a single being. The "rider" can't be dismounted, and no other means can separate the two portions of the archon's being short of its death.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The archon makes two attacks: one with its sword and one with its claws.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

DesignSpecialization.name: Design Specialization
DesignSpecialization.description: When the android is created, it gains one of six possible designs suited for its role (choose or roll a d6): 1, aerialist; 2, diplomat; 3, diver; 4, duelist; 5, medic; 6, sentry. This design determines certain traits in this stat block.

LightningOverload.name: Lightning Overload
LightningOverload.description: When the android takes lightning damage, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition until the start of its next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The android makes two Force Strike attacks.

ForceStrike.name: ForceStrike
ForceStrike.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 40/120 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) force damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the barkburr is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the barkburr move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the barkburr is animate.

SpringingLeap.name: Springing Leap
SpringingLeap.description: With or without a running start, the barkburr's high jump is up to 15 feet, and its long jump is up to 30 feet. The barkburr's jumps can exceed its speed if its speed isn't 0.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The barkburr makes two Poison Barb attacks and uses Lignify if able.

PoisonBarb.name: PoisonBarb
PoisonBarb.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage, and the barkburr attaches to the target. While the barkburr is attached, it can't make Poison Barb attacks, and the target has the restrained condition as its body begins to transform into wood.

Lignify.name: Lignify
Lignify.description: The barkburr targets the creature it is attached to, and the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target has the petrified condition until freed by the Greater Restoration spell or another effect, except it turns into a tree instead of stone. Any equipment the target is wearing or carrying is absorbed into the tree's bark.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: The champion has advantage on saving throws against the frightened condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The champion makes two Lightning Mace attacks or three Handaxe attacks.

LightningMace.name: LightningMace
LightningMace.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) lightning damage.

Handaxe.name: Handaxe
Handaxe.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The champion makes three Longsword attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The champion makes two Arcane Burst attacks or makes one Arcane Burst attack and uses Spellcasting.

ArcaneBurst.name: ArcaneBurst
ArcaneBurst.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) force damage.

LightningOverload.name: Lightning Overload
LightningOverload.description: When the robot takes lightning damage, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition until the start of its next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The robot makes two Tentacle attacks or three Laser Beam attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 16). While grappled, the target also has the restrained condition. The robot has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

LaserBeam.name: LaserBeam
LaserBeam.description: rw 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (4d6 + 2) radiant damage.

GrenadeLauncher{@recharge5}.name: GrenadeLauncher{@recharge5}
GrenadeLauncher{@recharge5}.description: The robot fires a grenade at a point it can see within 120 feet of itself. The grenade explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point, creating one of the following effects (robot's choice):

ConcussionGrenade.name: ConcussionGrenade
ConcussionGrenade.description: Each creature in the sphere must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

SleepGrenade.name: SleepGrenade
SleepGrenade.description: Each creature in the sphere must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the unconscious condition for 1 hour. The condition ends on a creature early if the creature takes damage or if another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls.

ChaosBlast.name: ChaosBlast
ChaosBlast.description: ms,rs 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) damage. Roll a d4 to determine the damage type: 1, acid; 2, cold; 3, fire; 4, lightning.

ForceBurst{@recharge4}.name: ForceBurst{@recharge4}
ForceBurst{@recharge4}.description: Raw arcane magic bursts out from the derro. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 11 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 7 (2d6) force damage and has the prone condition. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls.

HookedSpear.name: HookedSpear
HookedSpear.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the derro can choose to deal no damage, and instead the target has the prone condition.

ThrowingHammer.name: ThrowingHammer
ThrowingHammer.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

TreeShape(2/Day).name: Tree Shape
TreeShape(2/Day).description: Over the course of 1 minute, Derwyth can magically transform into a Huge or smaller tree and remain in that form for 24 hours or until she ends this transformation early (no action required). Her equipment melds into her new form. While in this form, her Armor Class is 16, she has the incapacitated condition, and she can't move or speak.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 2 to hit (4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Drelnza fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Drelnza wields Heretic|QftIS.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: Drelnza can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

SunlightHypersensitivity.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
SunlightHypersensitivity.description: Drelnza takes 20 radiant damage when she starts her turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, she has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Drelnza makes one Bite attack and one Heretic attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and Drelnza regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A Humanoid slain in this way and then buried rises the following night as a vampire spawn under Drelnza's control.

Heretic.name: Heretic
Heretic.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. on hit: 40 (6d10 + 7) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or have the paralyzed condition until the start of Drelnza's next turn. Celestials have disadvantage on the saving throw.

Charm.name: Charm
Charm.description: Drelnza targets one Humanoid she can see within 30 feet of herself. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or have the charmed condition. While charmed in this way, the target regards Drelnza as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. The target isn't under Drelnza's control, but it takes her requests and actions in the most favorable way.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The froghemoth can breathe air and water.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the froghemoth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

ShockSusceptibility.name: Shock Susceptibility
ShockSusceptibility.description: If the froghemoth takes lightning damage, it suffers two effects until the end of its next turn: its speed is halved, and it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The froghemoth makes one Bite attack and two Tentacle attacks, and it can use Tongue.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) piercing damage, and the target is swallowed if it is a Medium or smaller creature. A swallowed creature has the blinded and restrained conditions, has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the froghemoth, and takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the froghemoth's turns.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 20). Until this grapple ends, the froghemoth can't use this tentacle on another target. The froghemoth has four tentacles.

Tongue.name: Tongue
Tongue.description: The froghemoth targets one Large or smaller creature that it can see within 25 feet of it. The target must make a DC 20 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the froghemoth.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against the frightened condition.

LightningMace.name: LightningMace
LightningMace.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) lightning damage.

Handaxe.name: Handaxe
Handaxe.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

HorridPlantVarieties.name: Horrid Plant Varieties
HorridPlantVarieties.description: A horrid plant comes in one of three varieties (choose or roll a d6): 1-2, dew drinker; 3-4, purple blossom; or 5-6, snapper saw. This form determines certain traits in this stat block.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the horrid plant is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the horrid plant move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Nature) check to discern that the horrid plant isn't an ordinary plant.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The horrid plant makes two Tendril attacks.

Tendril.name: Tendril
Tendril.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14), and the horrid plant can pull the target up to 25 feet closer to itself. Until the grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition, and the horrid plant can't use the same tendril on another target. The horrid plant has two tendrils.

Industrious.name: Industrious
Industrious.description: The leprechaun is proficient with all artisan's tools and adds double its proficiency bonus to ability checks made with them.

ReluctantRefusal.name: Reluctant Refusal
ReluctantRefusal.description: When a creature offers the leprechaun the chance to partake in merriment or revelry such as a song, a dance, or a good meal, the leprechaun must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or have the charmed condition for 24 hours. While charmed in this way, the leprechaun partakes of the offering, treats the creature as a trusted friend, and seeks to defend it from harm. The charmed condition ends if the creature or any of its allies damage the leprechaun, force the leprechaun to make a saving throw, or steal from the leprechaun.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The leprechaun makes two Cobbler's Hammer attacks and can use Spellcasting.

Cobbler'sHammer.name: Cobbler'sHammer
Cobbler'sHammer.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) force damage. If the target is a creature, its speed is halved until the start of the leprechaun's next turn.

GiftofLuck(1/Day).name: GiftofLuck(1/Day)
GiftofLuck(1/Day).description: The leprechaun touches a creature and magically gifts the target a measure of luck. The creature gains the leprechaun's Astonishing Luck reaction. The creature can use the reaction three times, after which this gift goes away. The leprechaun can revoke this gift from a creature at any time (no action required). A creature can benefit from only one leprechaun's Gift of Luck at a time.

ArcaneBurst.name: ArcaneBurst
ArcaneBurst.description: ms,rs 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) force damage.

Overheat.name: Overheat
Overheat.description: When the maschin-i-bozorg is reduced to 0 hit points, its power source overloads, briefly superheating its outer shell. Each creature within 10 feet of the maschin-i-bozorg must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The maschin-i-bozorg makes two Poison Jab attacks.

PoisonJab.name: PoisonJab
