PoisonJab.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (4d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

SteamJet{@recharge5}.name: SteamJet{@recharge5}
SteamJet{@recharge5}.description: The maschin-i-bozorg emits scalding steam in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

DamageTransfer.name: Damage Transfer
DamageTransfer.description: While it is grappling a creature, the memory web takes only half the damage dealt to it, and the creature grappled by the web takes the other half.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the memory web is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the memory web move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the memory web is animate.

MemoryFlood.name: Memory Flood
MemoryFlood.description: When the memory web is reduced to 0 hit points, it discharges any memories it consumed over the past 24 hours in a telepathic deluge. Hazy, dreamlike visions of these discharged memories lodge in the minds of creatures up to 120 feet from the memory web.

Ensnare.name: Ensnare
Ensnare.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. on hit: The target has the grappled condition (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition and takes 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The memory web can grapple only one creature at a time.

DimensionallyBound.name: Dimensionally Bound
DimensionallyBound.description: Nafas can't leave the Infinite Staircase or be trapped within a container (such as an Iron Flask). Attempts to transport Nafas to another plane are wasted.

LastWish.name: Last Wish
LastWish.description: When Nafas drops to 0 hit points, his body disintegrates into a whirl of multiversal dust that surrounds one creature responsible for his demise. That creature then hears Nafas's last wish: for the creature to take his place.

LegendaryResistance(5/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(5/Day).description: If Nafas fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Nafas has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

NobleGenie.name: Noble Genie
NobleGenie.description: Nafas doesn't suffer any of the penalties that normally follow casting the Wish spell to produce an effect other than duplicating another spell.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Nafas makes three Storm Shamshir attacks and uses Create Vortex.

StormShamshir.name: StormShamshir
StormShamshir.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) lightning or thunder damage (Nafas's choice).

CreateVortex.name: CreateVortex
CreateVortex.description: A 10-foot-radius, 60-foot-tall cylinder of swirling cosmic dust forms on a point Nafas can see within 120 feet of him. The vortex lasts as long as Nafas maintains concentration (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). When the vortex appears, each creature other than Nafas in the vortex's area must make a DC 22 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 36 (8d8) force damage and has the restrained condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only and moves to the nearest unoccupied space outside the vortex.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If Nafik fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Nafik has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: When he is destroyed, Nafik gains a new body in 24 hours if his heart is intact, regaining all his hit points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of Nafik's heart.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Nafik can use his Dreadful Glare and makes one Rotting Fist or Unholy Beam attack.

RottingFist.name: RottingFist
RottingFist.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the Remove Curse spell or other magic.

UnholyBeam.name: UnholyBeam
UnholyBeam.description: rs 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (8d6) necrotic damage, and the next attack roll made against this target before the end of Nafik's next turn has advantage.

DreadfulGlare.name: DreadfulGlare
DreadfulGlare.description: Nafik targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of himself. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or have the frightened condition until the end of Nafik's next turn. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to Nafik's Dreadful Glare for the next 24 hours.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Sion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects if he is in dim light or darkness.

Shadesight.name: Shadesight
Shadesight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Sion's darkvision.

ShadowyDemise.name: Shadowy Demise
ShadowyDemise.description: If Sion dies, his body melts into shadow, leaving behind only equipment he was wearing or carrying.

SunlightWeakness.name: Sunlight Weakness
SunlightWeakness.description: While in sunlight, Sion has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Sion makes one Shadow Sword attack and uses Affix Shadow or Spellcasting.

ShadowSword.name: ShadowSword
ShadowSword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) necrotic damage.

AffixShadow.name: AffixShadow
AffixShadow.description: Sion targets a creature within 60 feet of himself that he can see. That target must make a DC 13 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 13) as its shadow wraps around it. Once the target escapes the grapple, its shadow returns to normal.

AversiontoFire.name: Aversion to Fire
AversiontoFire.description: If the swarm takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

IncessantGibberish.name: Incessant Gibberish
IncessantGibberish.description: Any non-gibberling that is within 60 feet of the swarm and doesn't have the deafened condition has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration on spells and similar effects.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough to accommodate a Small gibberling. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The swarm makes two Gnashing Teeth attacks.

GnashingTeeth.name: GnashingTeeth
GnashingTeeth.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. on hit: 14 (4d4 + 4) piercing damage, or 9 (2d4 + 4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

FeyRebirth.name: Fey Rebirth
FeyRebirth.description: If the Gardener dies in the Eternal Garden, they revive with all their hit points 1d4 days later in a safe location within the garden.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the Gardener fails a saving throw, they can choose to succeed instead.

UnfetteredSteps.name: Unfettered Steps
UnfetteredSteps.description: The Gardener is unaffected by difficult terrain.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Gardener makes two Vine attacks and can use Breath of Tranquility if available.

Vine.name: Vine
Vine.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, the vine wraps around the target, and the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 17). The vine vanishes when the target is no longer grappled, or when the Gardener wills it to (no action required). A creature reduced to 0 hit points by the vine has the unconscious condition but is stable instead of dying.

BreathofTranquility{@recharge5}.name: BreathofTranquility{@recharge5}
BreathofTranquility{@recharge5}.description: The Gardener exhales soporific vapor in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition. A poisoned creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a failed save, it has the unconscious condition, and on a successful save, the effect ends on it. An unconscious creature is no longer poisoned and remains unconscious for 1 hour, until it takes damage, or until a creature uses an action to shake it awake.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While the tower hand is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tower hand makes two Unarmed Strike attacks, two Dart attacks, or one of each.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Dart.name: Dart
Dart.description: rw 4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tower sage makes two Arcane Burst attacks and can use Starry Radiance if available.

ArcaneBurst.name: ArcaneBurst
ArcaneBurst.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) radiant damage.

StarryRadiance{@recharge5}.name: StarryRadiance{@recharge5}
StarryRadiance{@recharge5}.description: Dazzling light bursts from the tower sage's fingertips in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or have the blinded condition until the end of the tower sage's next turn.

PlantCamouflage.name: Plant Camouflage
PlantCamouflage.description: The vegepygmy has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring vegetation.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The vegepygmy regains 7 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vegepygmy's next turn. The vegepygmy dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The vegepygmy makes two Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) slashing damage.

ToxicMold(2/Day).name: ToxicMold(2/Day)
ToxicMold(2/Day).description: The vegepygmy targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. If the target isn't a vegepygmy, it must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 13 (3d8) poison damage and has the blinded and deafened conditions for 1 minute as it becomes covered in a thick layer of mold. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

PlantCamouflage.name: Plant Camouflage
PlantCamouflage.description: The vegepygmy has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring vegetation.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The vegepygmy regains 3 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vegepygmy's next turn. The vegepygmy dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

Sling.name: Sling
Sling.description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The vegepygmy has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the vegepygmy's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

PlantCamouflage.name: Plant Camouflage
PlantCamouflage.description: The vegepygmy has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring vegetation.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The vegepygmy regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vegepygmy's next turn. The vegepygmy dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

ThornyBody.name: Thorny Body
ThornyBody.description: At the start of its turn, the vegepygmy deals 2 (1d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the wolf-in-sheep's-clothing is motionless (except for its lure) at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the wolf-in-sheep's-clothing move or act (except for the lure), that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the wolf-in-sheep's-clothing is animate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The wolf-in-sheep's-clothing makes one Bite attack and two Root Tentacle attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

RootTentacle.name: RootTentacle
RootTentacle.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 16). While grappled in this way, the target has the restrained condition, and at the start of each of the wolf-in-sheep's-clothing's turns, the wolf-in-sheep's-clothing can pull the target up to 10 feet toward itself (no action required). The wolf-in-sheep's-clothing has four root tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

LightningOverload.name: Lightning Overload
LightningOverload.description: When the robot takes lightning damage, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition until the start of its next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The robot makes two Cargo Tentacle attacks.

CargoTentacle.name: CargoTentacle
CargoTentacle.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 15). The robot has two cargo tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

TractorBeam.name: TractorBeam
TractorBeam.description: The robot casts Telekinesis, targeting only creatures with the incapacitated condition or objects. It requires no spell components and uses Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If Zargon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Zargon regains 20 hit points at the start of each of its turns. If Zargon takes cold or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of Zargon's next turn. Zargon dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

ShroudedBeing.name: Shrouded Being
ShroudedBeing.description: Zargon can't be targeted by divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

SlimyDemise.name: Slimy Demise
SlimyDemise.description: When Zargon dies, its body dissolves into foul slime, leaving only its horn behind. Zargon re-forms in 1d10 days, regrowing from the horn. The horn is immune to all damage and can be destroyed only by submerging it in a cleansing waterfall on one of the Upper Planes for 101 days. While the horn is submerged in this way, Zargon doesn't re-form, and the horn slowly dissolves, sending corrupting slime downriver that permanently fouls the water for 10 miles from the place where the horn dissolved. The fouled water is unfit to drink, chokes aquatic wildlife, and withers plants.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Zargon makes two Barbed Tentacle attacks, one Bite attack, and one Gore attack.

BarbedTentacle.name: BarbedTentacle
BarbedTentacle.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 20), and Zargon can pull the creature up to 20 feet straight toward itself. Zargon has six tentacles, each of which can grapple one creature. Zargon can move at its full speed while dragging creatures it is grappling.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) force damage, and a 10-foot-radius invisible sphere of antimagic, like that created by an Antimagic Field spell, surrounds the target. The sphere is centered on the target, moves with the target, and lasts until the end of Zargon's next turn.

SlimeWave{@recharge5}.name: SlimeWave{@recharge5}
SlimeWave{@recharge5}.description: Zargon spews slime in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area that isn't an Aberration or Ooze must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 38 (7d10) acid damage and has the poisoned condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only. A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: As a bonus action, Piggy Wiggle Butt can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

ClayJug.name: ClayJug
ClayJug.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

WebbyHands.name: WebbyHands
WebbyHands.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

DragonFanatic.name: Dragon Fanatic
DragonFanatic.description: The dragonfang has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened. While the dragonfang can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonfang ignores the effects of being charmed or frightened.

FanaticAdvantage.name: Fanatic Advantage
FanaticAdvantage.description: Once per turn, if the dragonfang makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage.

LimitedFlight.name: Limited Flight
LimitedFlight.description: The dragonfang can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The dragonfang has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonfang's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Dragonfang attacks twice with its shortsword.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) damage of the type to which the dragonfang has resistance.

OrbofDragon'sBreath(2/Day).name: OrbofDragon'sBreath(2/Day)
OrbofDragon'sBreath(2/Day).description: rs 5 to hit, range 50 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (5d8) damage of the type to which the dragonfang has damage resistance.

DragonFanatic.name: Dragon Fanatic
DragonFanatic.description: The dragonsoul has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened. While the dragonsoul can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonsoul ignores the effects of being charmed or frightened.

FanaticAdvantage.name: Fanatic Advantage
FanaticAdvantage.description: Once per turn, if the dragonsoul makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage.

LimitedFlight.name: Limited Flight
LimitedFlight.description: The dragonsoul can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The dragonsoul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonsoul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Dragonsoul attacks twice with its shortsword.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) damage of the type to which the dragonsoul has resistance.

OrbofDragon'sBreath(3/Day).name: OrbofDragon'sBreath(3/Day)
OrbofDragon'sBreath(3/Day).description: rs 7 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (6d8) damage of the type to which the dragonsoul has damage resistance.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The toad can breathe air or water.

ColdAura.name: Cold Aura
ColdAura.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the toad takes 3 (1d6) cold damage.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The toad's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d8) cold damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the toad can't bite another target.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Naergoth has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Naergoth makes three attacks, either with his longsword or longbow. He can use Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

LifeDrain.name: LifeDrain
LifeDrain.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (5d6 + 3) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5) if used with two hands, plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

DraconicMajesty.name: Draconic Majesty
DraconicMajesty.description: Neronvain adds his Charisma bonus to his AC (included).

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Magic can't put Neronvain to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Neronvain makes two attacks, either with his shortsword or Eldritch Arrow.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) poison damage.

EldritchArrow.name: EldritchArrow
EldritchArrow.description: rs 7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d10) force damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

PoisonousCloud(2/Day).name: PoisonousCloud(2/Day)
PoisonousCloud(2/Day).description: Poison gas fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point Neronvain can see within 50 feet of him. The gas spreads around corners and remains until the start of Neronvain's next turn. Each creature that starts its turn in the gas must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Discorporation.name: Discorporation
Discorporation.description: When Tiamat drops to 0 hit points or dies, her body is destroyed but her essence travels back to her domain in the Nine Hells, and she is unable to take physical form for a time.

LegendaryResistance(5/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(5/Day).description: If Tiamat fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

LimitedMagicImmunity.name: Limited Magic Immunity
LimitedMagicImmunity.description: Unless she wishes to be affected, Tiamat is immune to spells of 6th level or lower. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

MultipleHeads.name: Multiple Heads
MultipleHeads.description: Tiamat can take one reaction per turn, rather than only one per round. She also has advantage on saving throws against being knocked unconscious. If she fails a saving throw against an effect that would stun a creature, one of her unspent legendary actions is spent.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Tiamat regains 30 hit points at the start of her turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Tiamat can use her Frightful Presence. She then makes three attacks: two with her claws and one with her tail.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (4d6 + 10) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 19 to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) piercing damage.

FrightfulPresence.name: FrightfulPresence
FrightfulPresence.description: Each creature of Tiamat's choice that is within 240 feet of Tiamat and aware of her must succeed on a DC 26 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Tiamat's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The giant shark skeleton has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Lhammaruntosz can breathe air and water.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Lhammaruntosz fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Lhammaruntosz regains 5 hit points at the start of her turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Lhammaruntosz can use her Frightful Presence. She then makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

FrightfulPresence.name: FrightfulPresence
FrightfulPresence.description: Each creature of Lhammaruntosz's choice that is within 120 feet of her and aware of her must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Lhammaruntosz's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

BreathWeapons{@recharge5}.name: BreathWeapons{@recharge5}
BreathWeapons{@recharge5}.description: Lhammaruntosz uses one of the following breath weapons.

LightningBreath.name: LightningBreath
LightningBreath.description: Lhammaruntosz exhales lightning in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

RepulsionBreath.name: RepulsionBreath
RepulsionBreath.description: Lhammaruntosz exhales repulsion energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is pushed 60 feet away from the dragon.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: Lhammaruntosz magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than her own, or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Lhammaruntosz's choice).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two greatclub attacks or two unarmed attacks.

Greatclub.name: Greatclub
Greatclub.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

UnarmedAttack.name: UnarmedAttack
UnarmedAttack.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (3d4 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 8 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

Nondetection.name: Nondetection
Nondetection.description: The cat cannot be targeted or detected by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.description: If the cat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the cat can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

SpellTurning.name: Spell Turning
SpellTurning.description: The cat has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only the cat (not an area). If the cat's saving throw succeeds and the spell is of 7th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the cat and instead targets the caster.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: Zalto deals double damage to objects and structures.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Zalto wears a ring of lightning resistance.

Tackle.name: Tackle
Tackle.description: When Zalto enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Zalto makes two maul attacks.

Maul.name: Maul
Maul.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (6d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

LegendaryResistance(1/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(1/Day).description: If Harshnag fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

WeightedNet.name: WeightedNet
WeightedNet.description: rw 5 to hit, ranged 20/60 ft., one Small, Medium, or Large creature. on hit: The target is restrained until it escapes the net. Any creature can use its action to make a DC 17 Strength check to free itself or another creature in the net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 15 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) destroys the net and frees the target.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

Gurt'sGreataxe.name: Gurt'sGreataxe
Gurt'sGreataxe.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) slashing damage, or 39 (5d12 + 7) slashing damage if the target is human.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The crab can breathe air and water.

ShellCamouflage.name: Shell Camouflage
ShellCamouflage.description: While the crab remains motionless with its eyestalks and pincers tucked close to its body, it resembles a natural formation or a pile of detritus. A creature within 30 feet of it can discern its true nature with a successful DC 15 Intelligence (Nature) check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The crab makes two attacks with its claws.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Iymrith fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Iymrith can use her Frightful Presence. She then makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) lightning damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d6 + 9) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

FrightfulPresence.name: FrightfulPresence
FrightfulPresence.description: Each creature of Iymrith's choice that is within 120 feet of Iymrith and aware of it must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Iymrith's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

LightningBreath{@recharge5}.name: LightningBreath{@recharge5}
LightningBreath{@recharge5}.description: Iymrith exhales lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 88 (16d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: Iymrith magically polymorphs into a female storm giant or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Iymrith's choice).

WeightedNet.name: WeightedNet
WeightedNet.description: rw 5 to hit, ranged 20/60 ft., one Small, Medium, or Large creature. on hit: The target is restrained until it escapes the net. Any creature can use its action to make a DC 17 Strength check to free itself or another creature in the net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 15 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) destroys the net and frees the target.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Hekaton can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Hekaton makes two broken chain attacks.

BrokenChain.name: BrokenChain
BrokenChain.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

Ballista.name: Ballista
Ballista.description: rw 6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d10 + 2) piercing damage.

LightningStrike{@recharge5}.name: LightningStrike{@recharge5}
LightningStrike{@recharge5}.description: Hekaton hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point he can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

ThunderousStomp{@recharge}.name: ThunderousStomp{@recharge}
ThunderousStomp{@recharge}.description: Hekaton stomps the ground, triggering a thunderclap. All other creatures within 15 feet of him must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take 33 (6d10) thunder damage and be deafened until the start of Hekaton's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't deafened. The thunderclap can be heard out to a range of 1,200 feet.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Klauth fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

DualWandWielder.name: Dual Wand Wielder
DualWandWielder.description: If Klauth is carrying two wands, he can use an action to expend 1 charge from each wand, triggering the effects of both wands simultaneously.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Klauth carries a wand of fireballs and a wand of lightning bolts, and he wears a ring of cold resistance.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Klauth can use his Frightful Presence. He then makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d6 + 10) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

FrightfulPresence.name: FrightfulPresence
FrightfulPresence.description: Each creature of Klauth's choice that is within 120 feet of Klauth and aware of him must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Klauth's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

FireBreath{@recharge5}.name: FireBreath{@recharge5}
FireBreath{@recharge5}.description: Klauth exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 (26d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

EmpoweredAttacks.name: Empowered Attacks
EmpoweredAttacks.description: Maegera's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to damage from nonmagical attacks.

FireAura.name: Fire Aura
FireAura.description: At the start of each of Maegera's turns, each creature within 30 feet of it takes 35 (10d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature also takes 35 (10d6) fire damage from touching Maegera or from hitting it with a melee attack while within 10 feet of it, and a creature takes that damage the first time on a turn that Maegera moves into its space. Nonmagical weapons that hit Maegera are destroyed by fire immediately after dealing damage to it.

FireForm.name: Fire Form
FireForm.description: Maegera can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing if fire could pass through that space.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: Maegera sheds bright light in a 120-foot radius and dim light in an additional 120 ft..

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Maegera has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Maegera makes three slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 35 (10d6) fire damage

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The wormling makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a Small or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wormling, and it takes 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of the wormling's turns.

TailStinger.name: TailStinger
TailStinger.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Slarkrethel fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Slarkrethel can breathe air and water.

FreedomofMovement.name: Freedom of Movement
FreedomofMovement.description: Slarkrethel ignores difficult terrain||3, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: Slarkrethel deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Slarkrethel makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature grappled by Slarkrethel, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside Slarkrethel, and it takes 42 (12d6) acid damage at the start of each of Slarkrethel's turns. If Slarkrethel takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, Slarkrethel must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of Slarkrethel. If Slarkrethel dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Slarkrethel has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description: One Large or smaller object held or creature grappled by Slarkrethel is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

LightningStorm.name: LightningStorm
LightningStorm.description: Slarkrethel magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target Slarkrethel can see within 120 feet of it. A target must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

StoneCamouflage.name: Stone Camouflage
StoneCamouflage.description: The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

OlachMorrah.name: Olach Morrah
OlachMorrah.description: The giant meditates for 1 hour, during which time it can do nothing else. At the end of the hour, provided the giant's meditation has been uninterrupted, it becomes petrified for 8 hours. At the end of this time, the giant is no longer petrified and gains tremorsense out to a range of 30 feet, as well as a measure of innate spellcasting ability for the next 24 hours.

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description: The giant tries to throw a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of the giant's choice. and land prone, taking 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown.

RollingRock.name: RollingRock
RollingRock.description: The giant sends a rock tumbling along the ground in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage and falling prone on a failed save

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two adamantine greatclub attacks.

Greatclub.name: Greatclub
Greatclub.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Succeed on a DC14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

DetectInvisibility.name: Detect Invisibility
DetectInvisibility.description: Within 60 feet of the tressym, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the tressym's sight.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The tressym has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

PoisonSense.name: Poison Sense
PoisonSense.description: The tressym can detect whether a substance is poisonous by taste, touch, or smell.

Familiar.name: Familiar
Familiar.description: With the DM's permission, a person who casts the find familiar spell can choose to conjure a tressym instead of a normal cat.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 slashing damage.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if wielded with two hands.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

Possession(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.name: Possession (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
Possession(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.description: The yakfolk attempts to magically possess a humanoid or giant. The yakfolk must touch the target throughout a short rest, or the attempt fails. At the end of the rest, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be possessed by the yakfolk, which disappears with everything it is carrying and wearing. Until the possession ends, the target is incapacitated, loses control of its body, and is unaware of its surroundings. The yakfolk now controls the body and can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment; its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; and its proficiencies. It otherwise uses the target's statistics, except the target's knowledge, class features, feats, and proficiencies.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The yakfolk makes two melee attacks.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, or 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

SummonEarthElemental(1/Day).name: SummonEarthElemental(1/Day)
SummonEarthElemental(1/Day).description: The yakfolk summons an earth elemental. The elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner and acts as an ally of the summoner. It remains for 10 minutes, until it dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

Possession(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.name: Possession (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
Possession(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.description: The yakfolk attempts to magically possess a humanoid or giant. The yakfolk must touch the target throughout a short rest, or the attempt fails. At the end of the rest, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be possessed by the yakfolk, which disappears with everything it is carrying and wearing. Until the possession ends, the target is incapacitated, loses control of its body, and is unaware of its surroundings. The yakfolk now controls the body and can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment; its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; and its proficiencies. It otherwise uses the target's statistics, except the target's knowledge, class features, feats, and proficiencies.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The yakfolk makes two attacks, either with its greatsword or its longbow.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 2 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d8) piercing damage.

Battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
Battleaxe.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: Zephyros has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description: Zephyros tries to throw a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of Zephyros's choice and land prone, taking 1d8 bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown.

WindAura.name: WindAura
WindAura.description: A magical aura of wind surrounds Zephyros. The aura is a 10-foot-radius sphere that lasts as long as he maintains concentration on it (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). While the aura is in effect, Zephyros gains a +2 bonus to his AC against ranged weapon attacks, and all open flames within the aura are extinguished unless they are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Zephyros makes two staff attacks.

StaffoftheMagi.name: StaffoftheMagi
StaffoftheMagi.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, or 23 (3d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands. This damage is considered magical..

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

Sting.name: Sting
Sting.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The statue makes five attacks: one with its headbutt and four with its lightning bolt blades.

Headbutt.name: Headbutt
Headbutt.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

LightningBoltBlades.name: LightningBoltBlades
LightningBoltBlades.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

KeenHearingandSmell.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
KeenHearingandSmell.description: Tooth-N-Claw has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: Tooth-N-Claw has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

FreezingBreath{@recharge5}.name: FreezingBreath{@recharge5}
FreezingBreath{@recharge5}.description: Tooth-N-Claw exhales an icy blast in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

FalseAppearance(ObjectFormOnly).name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
FalseAppearance(ObjectFormOnly).description: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The mimic can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description: The mimic polymorphs into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

AntimagicSusceptibility.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
AntimagicSusceptibility.description: The table is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the table must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the table remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal table.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the table moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Ram.name: Ram
Ram.description: mw 6, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 2 to hit (4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.

ColdBreath{@recharge5}.name: ColdBreath{@recharge5}
ColdBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the centaur mummy moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The centaur mummy makes two melee attacks, one with its pike and one with its hooves, or it attacks with its pike and uses Dreadful Glare.

Pike.name: Pike
Pike.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or similar magic.

DreadfulGlare.name: DreadfulGlare
DreadfulGlare.description: The centaur mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the dread warrior to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the dread warrior drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dread warrior makes two melee attacks.

Battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
Battleaxe.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

CunningAction.name: Cunning Action
CunningAction.description: On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

DuergarResilience.name: Duergar Resilience
DuergarResilience.description: The spy has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

SneakAttack.name: Sneak Attack
SneakAttack.description: Once per turn, the spy can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn't incapacitated and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the spy has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The spy makes two shortsword attacks.

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: For 1 minute, the spy magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the spy is Large, doubles her damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the spy lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage while enlarged.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Invisibility(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.name: Invisibility(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Invisibility(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.description: The spy magically turns invisible until it attacks, deals damage, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the spy wears or carries is invisible with it.

MartialAdvantage.name: Martial Advantage
MartialAdvantage.description: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

ChannelDivinity:TurnUndead(1/ShortRest).name: ChannelDivinity:TurnUndead(1/ShortRest)
ChannelDivinity:TurnUndead(1/ShortRest).description: Erky presents his holy Symbol and speaks a prayer censuring the Undead. Each Undead that can see or hear Erky within 30 feet of him must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gargoyle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The giant crayfish can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant crayfish makes two claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). The crayfish has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The toad can breathe air and water.

ColdAura.name: Cold Aura
ColdAura.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the toad takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The toad's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the toad can't bite another target.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature the toad is grappling. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage and 11 (2d10) cold damage at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time.

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The eel can breathe only underwater.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The eel makes two bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) lightning damage.

LightningJolt{@recharge5}.name: LightningJolt{@recharge5}
LightningJolt{@recharge5}.description: One creature the eel touches within 5 feet of it outside water, or each creature within 15 feet of it in a body of water, must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On failed save, a target takes 13 (3d8) lightning damage. If the target takes any of this damage, the target is stunned until the end of the eel's next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If the skeleton is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The skeleton has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

TurnImmunity.name: Turn Immunity
TurnImmunity.description: The skeleton is immune to effects that turn undead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The skeleton makes three scimitar attacks.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The lizard makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. One attack can be replaced by Swallow.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the lizard can't bite another target.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not grappled by the lizard. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature the lizard is grappling. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage. The target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the lizard, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the lizard's turns. The lizard can have only one target swallowed at a time.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The zombie has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The zombie makes two melee attacks.

EmpoweredSlam.name: EmpoweredSlam
EmpoweredSlam.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage and 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

NimbleEscape.name: Nimble Escape
NimbleEscape.description: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 4, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 4, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit point maximum decreases by 3 (1d6) every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.

BandedClaw.name: Banded Claw
BandedClaw.description: On one of its claws, the crab wears a rune-covered copper band that makes it immune to being charmed, frightened, and paralyzed. The copper band is worthless as a treasure, as the magic is keyed to this crab.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The crab can breathe air and water.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled, escape DC 14. The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

ChameleonSkin.name: Chameleon Skin
ChameleonSkin.description: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.description: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The troglodyte makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Kalka-Kylla can breathe air and water.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While Kalka-Kylla remains motionless and hidden in its shell, it is indistinguishable from a polished boulder.

Shell.name: Shell
Shell.description: Kalka-Kylla can use a bonus action to retract into or emerge from its shell. While retracted, Kalka-Kylla gains a +4 bonus to AC, and it has a speed of 0 and can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Kalka-Kylla makes two claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Kalka-Kylla has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The kelpie can breathe air and water.

SeaweedShape.name: Seaweed Shape
SeaweedShape.description: The kelpie can use its action to reshape its body into the form of a humanoid or beast that is Small, Medium, or Large. Its statistics are otherwise unchanged. The disguise is convincing, unless the kelpie is in bright light or the viewer is within 30 feet of it, in which case the seams between the seaweed strands are visible. The kelpie returns to its true form if takes a bonus action to do so or if it dies.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the kelpie remains motionless in its true form, it is indistinguishable from normal seaweed.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kelpie makes two slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 12).

DrowningHypnosis.name: DrowningHypnosis
DrowningHypnosis.description: The kelpie chooses one humanoid it can see within 150 feet of it. If the target can see the kelpie, the target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed while the kelpie maintains concentration, up to 10 minutes (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). The charmed target is incapacitated, and instead of holding its breath underwater, it tries to breathe normally and immediately runs out of breath, unless it can breathe water. If the charmed target is more than 5 feet away from the kelpie, the target must move on its turn toward the kelpie by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The kraken can breathe air and water.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kraken makes three tentacle attacks. One of them can be replaced with a bite attack, and any of them can be replaced with Fling.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) piercing damage.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description: One Medium or smaller object held or creature grappled by the kraken's tentacles is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

LightningStorm.name: LightningStorm
LightningStorm.description: The kraken creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target the kraken can see within 150 feet of it. A target must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Ambusher.name: Ambusher
Ambusher.description: In the first round of a combat, the doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

SurpriseAttack.name: Surprise Attack
SurpriseAttack.description: If the doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The doppelganger makes two melee attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

ReadThoughts.name: ReadThoughts
ReadThoughts.description: The doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet of it. The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 feet of wood or dirt, 2 feet of stone, 2 inches of metal, or a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in range, the doppelganger can continue reading its thoughts, as long as the doppelganger's concentration isn't broken (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). While reading the target's mind, the doppelganger has advantage on Wisdom (Insight) and Charisma (Deception, Intimidation, and Persuasion) checks against the target.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The nereid can breathe air and water.

AquaticInvisibility.name: Aquatic Invisibility
AquaticInvisibility.description: If immersed in water, the nereid can make itself invisible as a bonus action. It remains invisible until it leaves the water, ends the invisibility as a bonus action, or dies.

MantleDependent.name: Mantle Dependent
MantleDependent.description: The nereid wears a mantle of silky cloth the color of sea foam, which holds the creature's spirit. The mantle has an AC and hit points equal to that of the nereid, but the garment can't be directly harmed while the nereid wears it. If the mantle is destroyed, the nereid becomes poisoned and dies within 1 hour. A nereid is willing to do anything in its power to recover the mantle if it is stolen, including serving the thief.

ShapeWater.name: Shape Water
ShapeWater.description: The nereid can cast control water at will, requiring no components. Its spellcasting ability for it is Charisma. This use of the spell has a range of 30 feet and can affect a cube of water no larger than 30 feet on a side.

SpeakWithAnimals.name: Speak With Animals
SpeakWithAnimals.description: The nereid can comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts.

BlindingAcid.name: BlindingAcid
BlindingAcid.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d12 + 3) acid damage, and the target is blinded until the start of the nereid's next turn.

DrowningKiss{@recharge5}.name: DrowningKiss{@recharge5}
DrowningKiss{@recharge5}.description: The nereid touches one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 22 (3d12 + 3) acid damage. On a failure, it also runs out of breath and can't speak for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, it can repeat the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

WaterLash.name: WaterLash
WaterLash.description: The nereid causes a 5-foot cube of water within 60 feet of it to take a shape of its choice and strike one target it can see within 5 feet of that water. The target must make a DC 13 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 17 (4d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and if it is a Large or smaller creature, it is pushed up to 15 feet in a straight line or is knocked prone (nereid's choice). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't pushed or knocked prone.

CorrosiveForm.name: Corrosive Form
