CorrosiveForm.description: A creature that touches the Ooze Master or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 9 (2d8) acid damage. Any nonmagical weapon that hits the Ooze Master corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative 1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to 5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition that hits the Ooze Master is destroyed after dealing damage.

InstinctiveAttack.name: Instinctive Attack
InstinctiveAttack.description: When the Ooze Master casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action, it can make one pseudopod attack as a bonus action.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The Ooze Master can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) acid damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The sea lion can breathe air and water.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The sea lion has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The sea lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sea lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

SwimmingLeap.name: Swimming Leap
SwimmingLeap.description: With a 10-foot swimming start, the sea lion can long jump out of or across the water up to 25 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sea lion makes three attacks: one bite attack and two claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Barkskin.name: Barkskin
Barkskin.description: Sharwyn's AC can't be lower than 16.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Sharwyn has a spellbook|phb that contains the spells listed in her Spellcasting trait, plus detect magic and silent image.

TreeThrall.name: Tree Thrall
TreeThrall.description: If the Gulthias Tree dies, Sharwyn dies 24 hours later.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 4, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Barkskin.name: Barkskin
Barkskin.description: Sir Braford's AC can't be lower than 16.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Sir Braford wields Shatterspike|TftYP, a magic longsword that grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it (included in his attack). See the Shatterspike handout for the item's other properties.

TreeThrall.name: Tree Thrall
TreeThrall.description: If the Gulthias Tree dies, Sir Braford dies 24 hours later.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Siren can breathe air and water.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Siren has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

StupefyingTouch.name: StupefyingTouch
StupefyingTouch.description: Siren touches one creature she can see within 5 feet of her. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw or take 13 (3d6 + 3) psychic damage and be stunned until the start of Siren's next turn.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

KeenHearingandSmell.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
KeenHearingandSmell.description: The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).name: Multiattack(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly)
Multiattack(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).description: The werewolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or spear.

Bite(WolforHybridFormOnly).name: Bite(WolforHybridFormOnly)
Bite(WolforHybridFormOnly).description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

Claws(HybridFormOnly).name: Claws(HybridFormOnly)
Claws(HybridFormOnly).description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

Spear(HumanoidFormOnly).name: Spear(HumanoidFormOnly)
Spear(HumanoidFormOnly).description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

DuergarResilience.name: Duergar Resilience
DuergarResilience.description: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

WarPick.name: WarPick
WarPick.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, or 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage while enlarged.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage while enlarged.

Invisibility(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.name: Invisibility(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Invisibility(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.description: The duergar magically turns invisible until it attacks, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is invisible with it.

FocusedConjuration.name: Focused Conjuration
FocusedConjuration.description: While Var is concentration||concentrating on a conjuration spell, his concentration can't be broken as a result of taking damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Var fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If Var is destroyed but his phylactery remains intact, Var gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all his hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: Var has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

ParalyzingTouch.name: ParalyzingTouch
ParalyzingTouch.description: ms 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 10 (3d6) cold damage. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

BenignTransposition.name: BenignTransposition
BenignTransposition.description: Var teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Alternatively, he can choose a space within range that is occupied by a Small or Medium creature. If that creature is willing, both creatures teleport, swapping places. Var can use this feature again only after he finishes a long rest or casts a conjuration spell of 1st level or higher.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Tecuziztecatl can breathe air and water.

Glowing.name: Glowing
Glowing.description: Tecuziztecatl sheds dim light within 20 feet of itself.

Flexible.name: Flexible
Flexible.description: Tecuziztecatl can enter a space large enough for a Medium creature without squeezing.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: Tecuziztecatl can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Tecuziztecatl makes two pseudopod attacks.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

SpitAcid{@recharge4}.name: SpitAcid{@recharge4}
SpitAcid{@recharge4}.description: Tecuziztecatl exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

DoomvaultDevotion.name: Doomvault Devotion
DoomvaultDevotion.description: Within the Doomvault, the apprentice has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

DoomvaultDevotion.name: Doomvault Devotion
DoomvaultDevotion.description: Within the Doomvault, the warrior has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The warrior makes two melee attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

AdhesiveBlossoms.name: Adhesive Blossoms
AdhesiveBlossoms.description: The thorn slinger adheres to anything that touches it. A Medium or smaller creature adhered to the thorn slinger is also grappled by it (escape DC 11). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the thorn slinger remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate bush.

Thorns.name: Thorns
Thorns.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage.

AmorphousForm.name: Amorphous Form
AmorphousForm.description: White Maw can occupy another creature's space and vice versa.

CorrodeMetal.name: Corrode Metal
CorrodeMetal.description: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits White Maw corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative 1 penalty to damage rolls. if its penalty drops to 5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits White Maw is destroyed after dealing damage.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While White Maw remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from white stone.

KillerResponse.name: Killer Response
KillerResponse.description: Any creature that starts its turn in White Maw's space is targeted by a pseudopod attack if White Maw isn't incapacitated.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage. If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative 1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Yusdrayl has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: Yusdrayl has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of her allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

DwarvenResilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
DwarvenResilience.description: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison.

Handaxe.name: Handaxe
Handaxe.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

DwarvenResilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
DwarvenResilience.description: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison.

Handaxe.name: Handaxe
Handaxe.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The aldani can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The aldani makes two attacks with its claws.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). The aldani has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

KeenSenses.name: Keen Senses
KeenSenses.description: The almiraj has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

Familiar.name: Familiar
Familiar.description: With the DM's permission, the find familiar spell can summon an almiraj.

Horn.name: Horn
Horn.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Artus wears the Ring of Winter|toa. He and the ring can't be targeted by divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors. While attuned to and wearing the ring, Artus ceases to age and is immune to cold damage and the effects of extreme cold.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Artus makes three attacks with Bookmark or his longbow.

Bookmark(+3Dagger).name: Bookmark(+3Dagger)
Bookmark(+3Dagger).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

RingofWinter.name: RingofWinter
RingofWinter.description: The Ring of Winter has 12 charges and regains all its expended charges daily at dawn. While attuned to and wearing the ring, Artus can expend the necessary number of charges to activate one of the following properties:

DiveAttack.name: Dive Attack
DiveAttack.description: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage to the target.

DanceoftheSevenWinds.name: Dance of the Seven Winds
DanceoftheSevenWinds.description: Asharra knows a ritual called the Dance of the Seven Winds, which temporarily grants magical flight to as many as ten nonflying creatures. The ritual, which takes 10 minutes to complete, can only be performed by an aarakocra elder and requires a black orchid as a material component.

Talon.name: Talon
Talon.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

SummonAirElemental.name: SummonAirElemental
SummonAirElemental.description: Five aarakocra within 30 feet of each other can magically summon an air elemental. Each of the five must use its action and movement on three consecutive turns to perform an aerial dance and must maintain concentration while doing so (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). When all five have finished their third turn of the dance, the elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of them. It is friendly toward them and obeys their spoken commands. It remains for 1 hour, until it or all its summoners die, or until any of its summoners dismisses it as a bonus action. A summoner can't perform the dance again until it finishes a short rest. When the elemental returns to the Elemental Plane of Air, any aarakocra within 5 feet of it can return with it.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the assassin vine remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal plant.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. on hit: The target takes 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and it takes 21 (6d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The vine can constrict only one target at a time.

EntanglingVines.name: EntanglingVines
EntanglingVines.description: The assassin vine can animate normal vines and roots on the ground in a 15-foot square within 30 feet of it. These plants turn the ground in that area into difficult terrain||3. A creature in that area when the effect begins must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be restrained by entangling vines and roots. A creature restrained by the plants can use its action to make a DC 13 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing itself on a successful check. The effect ends after 1 minute or when the assassin vine dies or uses Entangling Vines again.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The atropal has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

NegativeEnergyAura.name: Negative Energy Aura
NegativeEnergyAura.description: Creatures within 30 feet of the atropal can't regain hit points, and any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the atropal takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. If the atropal is struck by a vorpal sword, the wielder can cut the atropal's umbilical cord instead of dealing damage. If its umbilical cord is cut, the atropal loses this feature.

TurnResistanceAura.name: Turn Resistance Aura
TurnResistanceAura.description: The atropal and any other undead creature within 30 feet of it has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

Touch.name: Touch
Touch.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

RayofCold.name: RayofCold
RayofCold.description: rs 12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (6d6) cold damage.

LifeDrain.name: LifeDrain
LifeDrain.description: The atropal targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The atropal regains a number of hit points equal to half the amount of damage dealt.

SummonWraith{@recharge}.name: SummonWraith{@recharge}
SummonWraith{@recharge}.description: The atropal summons a wraith which materializes within 30 feet of it in an unoccupied space it can see. The wraith obeys its summoner's commands and can't be controlled by any other creature. The Wraith vanishes when it drops to 0 hit points or when its summoner dies.

FelineAgility.name: Feline Agility
FelineAgility.description: When Bag of Nails moves on its turn in combat, he can double his speed until the end of the turn. Once he uses this trait, Bag of Nails can't use it again until he moves 0 feet on one of his turns.

Assassinate.name: Assassinate
Assassinate.description: During his first turn, Bag of Nails has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Bag of Nails scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If Bag of Nails is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Bag of Nails instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

SneakAttack(1/Turn).name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
SneakAttack(1/Turn).description: Bag of Nails deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of his that isn't incapacitated and Bag of Nails doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Bag of Nails makes two shortsword attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The chwinga doesn't require air, food, or drink. When it dies, it turns into a handful of flower petals, a cloud of pollen, a stone statuette resembling its former self, a tiny sphere of smooth stone, or a puddle of fresh water (your choice).

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: When the chwinga is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

MagicalGift(1/Day).name: MagicalGift(1/Day)
MagicalGift(1/Day).description: The chwinga targets a humanoid it can see within 5 feet of it. The target gains a supernatural charm|rewards|type=charm of the DM's choice. See chapter 7|DMG|7|Other Rewards of the Dungeon Masters Guide for more information on supernatural charms.

NaturalShelter.name: NaturalShelter
NaturalShelter.description: The chwinga magically takes shelter inside a rock, a living plant, or a natural source of fresh water in its space. The chwinga can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect while inside this shelter, and the shelter doesn't impair the chwinga's blindsight. The chwinga can use its action to emerge from a shelter. If its shelter is destroyed, the chwinga is forced out and appears in the shelter's space, but is otherwise unharmed.

Climbing.name: Climbing
Climbing.description: The gladiator can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Steadfast.name: Steadfast
Steadfast.description: The gladiator can't be disarmed, and cannot make ranged attacks.

Brute.name: Brute
Brute.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gladiator makes three melee attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands.

ShieldBash.name: ShieldBash
ShieldBash.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: While holding his holy avenger longsword, Dragonbait creates an aura in a 10-foot radius around him. While this aura is active, Dragonbait and all creatures friendly to him in the aura have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Dragonbait makes two melee weapon attacks.

HolyAvenger(+3Longsword).name: HolyAvenger(+3Longsword)
HolyAvenger(+3Longsword).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage when used with two hands. If the target is a fiend or an undead it takes an extra 11 (2d10) radiant damage.

SenseAlignment.name: SenseAlignment
SenseAlignment.description: Dragonbait chooses one creature he can see within 60 feet of him and determines its alignment, as long as the creature isn't hidden from divination magic by a spell or other magical effect.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The eblis attacks twice with its beak.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The flying monkey has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the monkey's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Familiar.name: Familiar
Familiar.description: With the DM's permission, the find familiar spell can summon a flying monkey.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target on hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadew.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadewith.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadewith.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gargoyle makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The turtle can breathe air and water.

Stable.name: Stable
Stable.description: Whenever an effect knocks the turtle prone, it can make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw to avoid being knocked prone. A prone turtle is upside down. To stand up, it must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity check on its turn and then use all its movement for that turn.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: As a bonus action, the zombie can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The zombie makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage.

DwarvenResilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
DwarvenResilience.description: Hew has resistance to poison damage and advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: At the start of his turn, Hew can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

Battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
Battleaxe.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

Camouflage.name: Camouflage
Camouflage.description: The jaculi has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The jaculi has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Spring.name: Spring
Spring.description: The jaculi springs up to 30 feet in a straight line and makes a bite attack against a target within its reach. This attack has advantage if the jaculi springs at least 10 feet. If the attack hits, the bite deals an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The kamadan has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.description: If the kamadan moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is knocked prone, the kamadan can make two attacksone with its bite and one with its snakesagainst it as a bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kamadan makes two attacks: one with its bite or claw and one with its snakes.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Snakes.name: Snakes
Snakes.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

SleepBreath(RechargesafteraShortorLongRe.name: SleepBreath(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Sleep Breath (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

SleepBreath(RechargesafteraShortorLongRe.description: The kamadan exhales sleep gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious for 10 minutes. This effect ends for a creature if it takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

DetectInvisibility.name: Detect Invisibility
DetectInvisibility.description: The King of Feathers can see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the King of Feathers fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The King of Feathers makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 33 (4d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

SummonSwarm{@recharge5}.name: SummonSwarm{@recharge5}
SummonSwarm{@recharge5}.description: The King of Feathers exhales a swarm of wasps||swarm of insects (wasps) that forms in a space within 20 feet of it. The swarm acts as an ally of the King of Feathers and takes its turn immediately after it. The swarm disperses after 1 minute. It can't use the Summon Swarm action while it is grappling a creature with its jaws.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: Liara has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

FlamingFury.name: Flaming Fury
FlamingFury.description: Once per turn, when Liara hits a creature with a melee weapon, she can cause fire to magically erupt from her weapon and deal an extra 10 (3d6) fire damage to the target.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Liara makes three melee attacks.

Battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
Battleaxe.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage when used with two hands.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

AttractivePollen(1/Day).name: Attractive Pollen
AttractivePollen(1/Day).description: When the mantrap detects any creatures nearby, it can use its reaction to release pollen out to a radius of 30 feet. Any beast or humanoid within the area must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be forced to use all its movement on its turns to get as close to the the mantrap as possible. An affected target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the mantrap remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary tropical plant.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. on hit: The target is trapped inside the mantrap's leafy jaws. While trapped in this way, the target is blinded and restrained, has Cover||3||total cover from an attacks and other effects outside the mantrap, and takes 14 (4d6) acid damage at the start of each of the target's turns. If the mantrap dies, the creature inside it is no longer restrained by it. A mantrap can engulf only one creature at a time.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 2 to hit. reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

TerrorDive.name: Terror Dive
TerrorDive.description: If the pterafolk is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target, and then hits that target with a melee weapon attack, the target is frightened until the end of its next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The pterafolk makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. Alternatively, it makes two melee attacks with its javelin.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Ras Nsi wears bracers of defense, wields a flame tongue longsword, and carries a sending stones||sending stone matched to the one carried by the guide Salida (see chapter 1).

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: Ras Nsi can use his action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into his yuan-ti form. His statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. He doesn't change form if he dies.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Ras Nsi has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ras Nsi makes three melee attacks, but can use Constrict only once.

Bite(SnakeFormOnly).name: Bite(SnakeFormOnly)
Bite(SnakeFormOnly).description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Ras Nsi can't constrict another target.

FlameTongueLongsword(Yuan-tiFormOnly).name: FlameTongueLongsword(Yuan-tiFormOnly)
FlameTongueLongsword(Yuan-tiFormOnly).description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description: Whenever the tomb guardian starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the tomb guardian goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the tomb guardian attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the tomb guardian attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the tomb guardian goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points. The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk tomb guardian, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The tomb guardian must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the tomb guardian ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the tomb guardian might go berserk again.

AversionofFire.name: Aversion of Fire
AversionofFire.description: If the tomb guardian takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The tomb guardian is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

LightningAbsorption.name: Lightning Absorption
LightningAbsorption.description: Whenever the tomb guardian is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The tomb guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

Chained.name: Chained
Chained.description: This trait applies when two guardians are chained together.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tomb guardian makes two spiked gauntlet attacks.

SpikedGauntlet.name: SpikedGauntlet
SpikedGauntlet.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d6) piercing damage.

DevastatingRoll.name: Devastating Roll
DevastatingRoll.description: The juggernaut can move through the space of a prone creature. A creature whose space the juggernaut enters for the first time on a turn must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The juggernaut is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: As long as it has 1 hit point left, the juggernaut magically regains all its hit points daily at dawn. The juggernaut is destroyed and doesn't regenerate if it drops to 0 hit points.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The juggernaut deals double damage to objects and structures.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadew.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadewith.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadewith.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

value.condition: (in one direction chosen at the start of its turn)

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The su-monster makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage, or 12 (4d4 + 2) slashing damage if the su-monster is hanging by its tail and all four of its limbs are free.

PsychicCrush{@recharge5}.name: PsychicCrush{@recharge5}
PsychicCrush{@recharge5}.description: The su-monster targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or take 17 (5d6) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

FelineAgility.name: Feline Agility
FelineAgility.description: When the tabaxi moves on its turn in combat, it can double its speed until the end of the turn. Once it uses this ability, the tabaxi can't use it again until it moves 0 feet on one of its turns.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tabaxi makes two attacks with its claws, its shortsword, or its shortbow.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

FelineAgility.name: Feline Agility
FelineAgility.description: When the tabaxi moves on its turn in combat, it can double its speed until the end of the turn. Once it uses this ability, the tabaxi can't use it again until it moves 0 feet on one of its turns.

Inspire(1/Day).name: Inspire
Inspire(1/Day).description: While taking a short rest, the tabaxi can spend 1 minute singing, playing an instrument, telling a story, or reciting a poem to soothe and inspire creatures other than itself. Up to five creatures of the tabaxi's choice that can see and hear its performance gain 8 temporary hit points at the end of the tabaxi's short rest.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tabaxi makes two claws attacks or two dart attacks.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage.

Dart.name: Dart
Dart.description: rw 4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the tomb dwarf has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tomb dwarf makes two longsword attacks or two crossbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

LifeDrain.name: LifeDrain
LifeDrain.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the tomb dwarf's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The tomb dwarf can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

Battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
Battleaxe.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

LightCrossbow.name: LightCrossbow
LightCrossbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description: Whenever the tomb guardian starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the tomb guardian goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the tomb guardian attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the tomb guardian attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the tomb guardian goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points. The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk tomb guardian, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The tomb guardian must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the tomb guardian ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the tomb guardian might go berserk again.

AversionofFire.name: Aversion of Fire
AversionofFire.description: If the tomb guardian takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The tomb guardian is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

LightningAbsorption.name: Lightning Absorption
LightningAbsorption.description: Whenever the tomb guardian is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The tomb guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tomb guardian makes two slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tri-flower frond uses its orange blossom, then its yellow blossom, and then its red blossom.

OrangeBlossom.name: OrangeBlossom
OrangeBlossom.description: The tri-flower frond chooses one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. While poisoned in this way, the target is unconscious. At the end of each minute, the poisoned target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

YellowBlossom.name: YellowBlossom
YellowBlossom.description: The tri-flower frond chooses one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, or it is covered with corrosive sap and takes 5 acid damage at the start of each of its turns. Dousing the target with water reduces the acid damage by 1 point per pint or flask of water used.

RedBlossom.name: RedBlossom
RedBlossom.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 5 (2d4) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The red blossom can grapple only one target at a time. Another creature within reach of the tri-flower frond can use its action to end the grapple on the target.

DisgorgeZombie.name: Disgorge Zombie
DisgorgeZombie.description: As a bonus action, the tyrannosaurus zombie can disgorge a normal zombie, which appears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of it. The disgorged zombie acts on its own initiative count. After a zombie is disgorged, roll a d6. On a roll of 1, the tyrannosaurus zombie runs out of zombies to disgorge and loses this trait. If the tyrannosaurus zombie still has this trait when it dies, 1d4 normal zombies erupt from its corpse at the start of its next turn. These zombies act on their own initiative count.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the tyrannosaurus zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tyrannosaurus zombie makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 33 (4d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and the tyrannosaurus zombie can't bite another target or disgorge zombies.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Withers carries the amulet of the black skull|ToA.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Withers has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Withers makes two longsword attacks. He can use his Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

LifeDrain.name: LifeDrain
LifeDrain.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

QuickenedSpell(3/Day).name: Quickened Spell
QuickenedSpell(3/Day).description: When she casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, Xandala changes the casting time to 1 bonus action for that casting.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the creeper remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary flowering vine.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The creeper regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the creeper takes fire, necrotic, or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The creeper dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Touch.name: Touch
Touch.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (3d8) psychic damage. If the target is a humanoid that drops to 0 hit points as a result of this damage, it dies and is implanted with a yellow musk creeper bulb. Unless the bulb is destroyed, the corpse animates as a yellow musk zombie after being dead for 24 hours. The bulb is destroyed if the creature is raised from the dead before it can transform into a yellow musk zombie, or if the corpse is targeted by a remove curse spell or similar magic before it animates.

YellowMusk(3/Day).name: YellowMusk(3/Day)
YellowMusk(3/Day).description: The creeper's flowers release a strong musk that targets all humanoids within 30 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the creeper for 1 minute. A creature charmed in this way does nothing on its turn except move as close as it can to the creeper. A creature charmed by the creeper can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 +the damage taken, unless the damage is fire or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

DragonWings.name: Dragon Wings
DragonWings.description: As a bonus action on his turn, Zindar can sprout a pair of dragon wings from his back, gaining a flying speed of 30 feet until he dismisses them as a bonus action.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.name: BreathWeapon{@recharge5}
BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.description: Zindar uses one of the following options:

FireBreath.name: FireBreath
FireBreath.description: Zindar exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

WeakeningBreath.name: WeakeningBreath
WeakeningBreath.description: Zindar exhales gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, Strength checks, and Strength saving throws for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The zorbo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

NaturalArmor.name: Natural Armor
NaturalArmor.description: The zorbo magically absorbs the natural strength of its surroundings, adjusting its Armor Class based on the material it is standing or climbing on: AC 15 for wood or bone, AC 17 for earth or stone, or AC 19 for metal. If the zorbo isn't in contact with any of these substances, its AC is 10.

DestructiveClaws.name: DestructiveClaws
DestructiveClaws.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature wearing armor, carrying a shield, or in possession of a magic item that improves its AC, it must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, one such item worn or carried by the creature (the target's choice) magically deteriorates, taking a permanent and cumulative 1 penalty to the AC it offers, and the zorbo gains a +1 bonus to AC until the start of its next turn. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield or magic item that drops to a 0 AC increase is destroyed.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description: Whenever the bearer takes damage or makes a Strength or Dexterity saving throw, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, the bearer goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the bearer has advantage on melee attack rolls, it can Dash as a bonus action, and it must attack the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the bearer attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the bearer goes berserk, it remains berserk until it is destroyed or its creator gives it a pristine black rose.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the bearer to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 plus the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a successful save, the bearer drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The bearer makes two Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The lieutenant has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lieutenant's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The lieutenant makes three Longsword or Javelin Launcher attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 20 (3d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

JavelinLauncher.name: JavelinLauncher
JavelinLauncher.description: rw 8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target has the prone condition.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The scout has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the scout's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The scout makes three Armblade or Bolt Launcher attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a use of Snare Trap.

Armblade.name: Armblade
Armblade.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

BoltLauncher.name: BoltLauncher
BoltLauncher.description: rw 8 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

SnareTrap(1/Day).name: SnareTrap(1/Day)
SnareTrap(1/Day).description: The scout deploys a Tiny mechanical trap on a solid surface within 5 feet of itself. The trap is hidden, requiring a successful DC 17 Intelligence (Investigation) check to find. The trap lasts for 1 minute. Whenever an enemy enters a space within 10 feet of the trap or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 21 (6d6) piercing damage and have the prone condition. A creature makes this saving throw only once per turn.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The blazebear has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MistSight.name: Mist Sight
MistSight.description: The blazebear can see normally through heavily obscured areas created by mist or fog, including areas created by spells such as Fog Cloud.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The blazebear makes two Bite attacks. It can replace one attack with Stunning Gaze if available.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (2d12 + 7) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage.

StunningGaze{@recharge5}.name: StunningGaze{@recharge5}
StunningGaze{@recharge5}.description: The blazebear targets two creatures it can see within 120 feet of itself. Each target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or have the stunned condition until the start of the blazebear's next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The bone roc makes one Beak attack and two Talons attacks.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

GlacialAura.name: Glacial Aura
GlacialAura.description: At the end of the borthak's turn, slippery ice covers surfaces within 10 feet of the borthak. This ice is difficult terrain. When a creature other than the borthak enters the ice's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or have the prone condition. The ice disappears at the start of the borthak's next turn.

WebbedFeet.name: Webbed Feet
WebbedFeet.description: The borthak can move across icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The borthak makes one Bite attack or uses Noxious Regurgitation if available, and it makes two Stomp attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

NoxiousRegurgitation{@recharge5}.name: NoxiousRegurgitation{@recharge5}
NoxiousRegurgitation{@recharge5}.description: The borthak spews acid at a creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 24 (7d6) acid damage and has the poisoned condition until the start of the borthak's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

DeathThroes.name: Death Throes
DeathThroes.description: Camlash explodes when reduced to 0 hit points, and each creature within 30 feet of Camlash must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 (20d6) fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Camlash has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpiderAura.name: Spider Aura
SpiderAura.description: Camlash is surrounded by tiny biting spiders that magically appear and disappear from moment to moment. At the start of each of Camlash's turns, each creature within 10 feet of Camlash takes 10 (3d6) poison damage and must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or have the paralyzed condition until the start of Camlash's next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Camlash makes one Flaming Whip attack and one Lightning Blade attack. Camlash can replace one of these attacks with Teleport.

FlamingWhip.name: FlamingWhip
FlamingWhip.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (5d6 + 8) fire damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 25 feet toward Camlash.

LightningBlade.name: LightningBlade
LightningBlade.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) lightning damage.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: Camlash magically teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the spider fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The spider makes two Bite attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with a use of Web Bomb.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

WebBomb.name: WebBomb
WebBomb.description: rw 14 to hit, range 300 ft./600 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage, and the target and all creatures within 10 feet of it must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) acid damage and have the restrained condition until the start of the spider's next turn.

BrambleWalk.name: Bramble Walk
BrambleWalk.description: Difficult terrain composed of vegetation, such as foliage or thorns, doesn't cost the dryad extra movement.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpeakwithBeastsandPlants.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
SpeakwithBeastsandPlants.description: The dryad can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dryad makes two Poisonous Thorn attacks and one Sapping Vine attack.

PoisonousThorn.name: PoisonousThorn
PoisonousThorn.description: mw,rw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (4d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition until the start of the dryad's next turn.

SappingVine.name: SappingVine
SappingVine.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: The target has the grappled condition (escape DC 16). Until the grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition, and the dryad can't use the same vine on another target. A creature restrained in this way takes 13 (3d8) necrotic damage at the start of its turn.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the deathwolf fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Moon'sGrace.name: Moon's Grace
Moon'sGrace.description: When the deathwolf falls, it descends at a rate of 60 feet per round and takes no falling damage.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The deathwolf makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Phantom Deathwolf if available.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on saving throws against the frightened condition. This curse lasts until removed by the Remove Curse spell or other magic.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

PhantomDeathwolf{@recharge5}.name: PhantomDeathwolf{@recharge5}
PhantomDeathwolf{@recharge5}.description: The deathwolf creates a terrifying phantom of itself in the mind of a creature the deathwolf can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or have the frightened condition for 1 minute.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The degloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The degloth makes two Razor Fist attacks.

RazorFist.name: RazorFist
RazorFist.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition, and the degloth can't use this fist to grapple another target. The degloth has two fists.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the false lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The false lich has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The false lich makes two Death Rend attacks and uses Bloodcurdling Lament if available.

DeathRend.name: DeathRend
DeathRend.description: ms 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) necrotic damage.

BloodcurdlingLament{@recharge5}.name: BloodcurdlingLament{@recharge5}
BloodcurdlingLament{@recharge5}.description: The false lich emits a hideous shriek charged with malignant energy. Each creature within 30 feet of the false lich must succeed on a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw or have the frightened condition for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, a creature also has the unconscious condition. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Heatsink.name: Heatsink
Heatsink.description: When Glaive takes cold damage, her Overdrive immediately recharges.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: Glaive has advantage on attack rolls if at least one ally is within 5 feet of the creature she's attacking and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Glaive makes two Spiked Glaive attacks and two Serrated Bolt attacks.

SpikedGlaive.name: SpikedGlaive
SpikedGlaive.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing or slashing damage, or 14 (1d10 + 9) piercing or slashing damage if Glaive is in overdrive.

SerratedBolt.name: SerratedBolt
SerratedBolt.description: rw 7 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage. If Glaive has advantage on the attack roll, the serrated bolt lodges in the target, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the serrated bolt is removed. A target's speed can be reduced by only one serrated bolt at a time. A creature can use its action to remove a serrated bolt lodged in itself or another creature within its reach; when the bolt is removed from a creature, that creature takes 5 (2d4) slashing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The juggernaut has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The juggernaut deals double damage to objects and structures.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The hazvongel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hazvongel makes three Talon attacks.

Talon.name: Talon
Talon.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) piercing damage.

BloodBarrage{@recharge5}.name: BloodBarrage{@recharge5}
BloodBarrage{@recharge5}.description: The hazvongel launches a spray of blood in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

LegendaryResistances(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistances
LegendaryResistances(3/Day).description: If the hertilod fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The hertilod has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

ShockSusceptibility.name: Shock Susceptibility
ShockSusceptibility.description: If the hertilod takes lightning damage, its speed is halved until the end of its next turn, and it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or immediately regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which lands in a space within 10 feet of the hertilod and has the prone condition.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The hertilod can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hertilod makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) poison damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be swallowed by the hertilod. A swallowed creature has the blinded and restrained conditions, and it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the hertilod. At the start of each of the hertilod's turns, each swallowed creature takes 13 (2d12) poison damage from the poisonous secretion in the hertilod's gullet.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The kakkuu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The kakkuu can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WebSense.name: Web Sense
WebSense.description: When in contact with a web, the kakkuu knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: The kakkuu ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kakkuu makes a Web Snare attack, uses Reel, and makes a Bite attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

Reel.name: Reel
Reel.description: The kakkuu pulls each creature within 60 feet of itself that is grappled by its Web Snare up to 30 feet straight toward itself.

WebSnare.name: WebSnare
WebSnare.description: rw 6 to hit, reach 30/60 ft., one Large or smaller creature. on hit: The target has the grappled condition (escape DC 13). While grappled, the target also has the restrained condition. A web snare grappling a creature can be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; 10 hit points; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

EagerBetrayer.name: Eager Betrayer
EagerBetrayer.description: Kas adds 1d10 to his initiative rolls. He has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that has the frightened condition.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Kas fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Kas regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Kas wears the Crown of Lies|VEoR (see the Introduction of Vecna: Eve of Ruin).

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: Kas can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

StrengthoftheNight.name: Strength of the Night
StrengthoftheNight.description: Kas doesn't require a coffin, and he drinks blood to sow terror rather than for sustenance. If destroyed, Kas revives in 1d100 nights in an unoccupied space in Tovag, his Domain of Dread. He can be permanently destroyed only by having a stake driven through his heart and then being beheaded. The stake must be cut from a tree growing in soil from Oerth, Kas's home world.

SunlightHypersensitivity.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
SunlightHypersensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Kas takes 20 radiant damage at the start of his turn, has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and can't use his Change Shape bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Kas makes three Vengeful Sword attacks. He can replace one of these attacks with a Bite attack.

VengefulSword.name: VengefulSword
VengefulSword.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (2d8 + 11) slashing damage. The sword scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 11 (1d6 + 8) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and Kas regains a number of hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. A Humanoid slain in this way and then buried rises the following night as a vampire spawn under Kas's control.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the mirror shade is within 5 feet of a reflective surfacesuch as a mirror, glass pane, or still waterit has advantage on its initiative roll. If a creature hasn't observed the mirror shade move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the mirror shade isn't the creature's own reflection.

MirrorMovement.name: Mirror Movement
MirrorMovement.description: The mirror shade can move along the surface of reflective or translucent objects, such as mirrors, without provoking opportunity attacks. It can move through translucent objects as if they were difficult terrain.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mirror shade makes two Phantasmal Strike attacks and uses Reflect Fear.

PhantasmalStrike.name: PhantasmalStrike
PhantasmalStrike.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) radiant damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

ReflectFear.name: ReflectFear
