ReflectFear.description: The mirror shade targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself and projects an illusion of that creature's greatest fear. The target must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 28 (8d6) psychic damage and has the frightened condition until the start of the mirror shade's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

FoulIchor.name: Foul Ichor
FoulIchor.description: A creature that hits Miska with a melee weapon attack takes 7 (2d6) poison damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Miska fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Miska has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: Miska can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WebSense.name: Web Sense
WebSense.description: When in contact with a web, Miska knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: Miska ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Miska makes one Lupine Bite attack and two Trident of Chaos attacks.

LupineBite.name: LupineBite
LupineBite.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 27 (6d8) poison damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, a creature has the incapacitated condition and can't regain hit points. A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

TridentofChaos.name: TridentofChaos
TridentofChaos.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) force damage.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The guardian is immune to any spell or other effect that would alter its form.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

RadiantAbsorption.name: Radiant Absorption
RadiantAbsorption.description: Whenever the guardian is subjected to radiant damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the radiant damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The guardian makes two Moonlight Slam attacks.

MoonlightSlam.name: MoonlightSlam
MoonlightSlam.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) radiant damage.

MoonlightBlast{@recharge5}.name: MoonlightBlast{@recharge5}
MoonlightBlast{@recharge5}.description: The guardian unleashes a magical blast of moonlight in a line 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. Creatures that aren't in their true form have disadvantage on the save. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 (5d8) radiant damage, and if it isn't in its true form, it is forced into its true form and can't change forms until the end of the guardian's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The phisarazu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The phisarazu can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WebSense.name: Web Sense
WebSense.description: When in contact with a web, the phisarazu knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: The phisarazu ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The phisarazu makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Scintillating Spray if available.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage, and the target has the poisoned condition until the start of the phisarazu's next turn.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) slashing damage.

ScintillatingSpray{@recharge5}.name: ScintillatingSpray{@recharge5}
ScintillatingSpray{@recharge5}.description: The phisarazu expels shimmering webs in a 60-foot cone. Creatures and objects in that area are outlined by the glittering webs for 1 minute, during which time they emit dim light for 10 feet and can't benefit from the invisible condition. Additionally, creatures in that area must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or have the stunned condition for 1 minute. A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The quavilithku has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The quavilithku can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WebSense.name: Web Sense
WebSense.description: When in contact with a web, the quavilithku knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: The quavilithku ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The quavilithku makes two Bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) poison damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, a creature can't regain hit points. A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

DissolvingWeb{@recharge5}.name: DissolvingWeb{@recharge5}
DissolvingWeb{@recharge5}.description: The quavilithku expels acid-drenched webs in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) acid damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Nonmagical objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried take 44 (8d10) acid damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The raklupis has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The raklupis can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WebSense.name: Web Sense
WebSense.description: When in contact with a web, the raklupis knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: The raklupis ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The raklupis makes a Bite attack and two Serrated Sword attacks. It can use Venom Globe in place of one of these attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) poison damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, a creature has the incapacitated condition and can't regain hit points. A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

SerratedSword.name: SerratedSword
SerratedSword.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (4d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) poison damage.

VenomGlobe.name: VenomGlobe
VenomGlobe.description: rw 11 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. on hit: 45 (10d8) poison damage.

BloodheartStake.name: Bloodheart Stake
BloodheartStake.description: The impaler is magically bound to the ceremonial stake and the sacrificed corpse the ritual caster used to create it. If the impaler is reduced to 0 hit points, it disappears, then re-forms 1d8 hours later in the nearest unoccupied space to the stake and regains all its hit points. The impaler dies only if it is reduced to 0 hit points while either the ceremonial stake is removed from the sacrifice's corpse or the impaler is on a different plane of existence from that corpse.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the impaler fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The impaler makes one Spike attack and two Wicked Spear attacks.

Spike.name: Spike
Spike.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage, and the target's speed is halved until the start of the impaler's next turn.

WickedSpear.name: WickedSpear
WickedSpear.description: mw,rw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/40 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

SpikeBurst{@recharge5}.name: SpikeBurst{@recharge5}
SpikeBurst{@recharge5}.description: Twisted, spectral spikes shoot out from the impaler's body. Each creature within 30 feet of the impaler must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 (9d8) force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The spiderdragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The spiderdragon can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: The spiderdragon ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The spiderdragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) poison damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

SpiderlingBreath{@recharge5}.name: SpiderlingBreath{@recharge5}
SpiderlingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The spiderdragon exhales venomous spiderlings in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 (6d10) piercing damage and 33 (6d10) poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Avoidance.name: Avoidance
Avoidance.description: If the star angler is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if it fails.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The star angler's lure sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The star angler makes three Bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Strahd fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MasteroftheHouse.name: Master of the House
MasteroftheHouse.description: When Strahd is reduced to 0 hit points, he dissolves into mist and immediately teleports to his lair in Castle Ravenloft. After 1d4 hours, Strahd re-forms in a random unoccupied space within his lair, regaining all his hit points.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Strahd regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: Strahd can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Strahd makes two Death Strike attacks. He can replace one of these attacks with Blighted Fire if available.

DeathStrike.name: DeathStrike
DeathStrike.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, Strahd can forgo dealing slashing damage; the target then has the grappled condition (escape DC 18) instead. Strahd can grapple only one creature at a time.

BlightedFire{@recharge5}.name: BlightedFire{@recharge5}
BlightedFire{@recharge5}.description: Strahd summons shadowy, necrotic fire that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point he can see within 90 feet of himself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Charm.name: Charm
Charm.description: Strahd targets one Humanoid he can see within 30 feet of himself. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or have the charmed condition. The charmed target regards Strahd as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. The target isn't under Strahd's control, but it takes Strahd's requests and actions in the most favorable way.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Tasha fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Tasha has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. (This trait is bestowed by her Robe of the Archmagi.)

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Tasha wears a Robe of the Archmagi.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Tasha makes two Caustic Blast attacks and uses Psychic Whip once.

CausticBlast.name: CausticBlast
CausticBlast.description: ms,rs 14 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (6d4 + 6) acid damage.

PsychicWhip.name: PsychicWhip
PsychicWhip.description: Tasha psychically lashes out at one creature she can see within 90 feet of herself. The target must make a DC 20 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 21 (6d6) psychic damage and has the stunned condition until the start of Tasha's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The vlazok has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The vlazok has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The vlazok can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The vlazok makes two Gore attacks.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the prone condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The warforged makes two Armblade attacks.

Armblade.name: Armblade
Armblade.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the chandelier is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the chandelier move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the chandelier is animate.

FieryAura.name: Fiery Aura
FieryAura.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the chandelier takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The chandelier makes three Chain attacks, three Lamp attacks, or a combination thereof.

Chain.name: Chain
Chain.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the chandelier.

Lamp.name: Lamp
Lamp.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) fire damage.

BlazingVortex{@recharge5}.name: BlazingVortex{@recharge5}
BlazingVortex{@recharge5}.description: Each creature within 20 feet of the chandelier and not behind Cover||3||total cover must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 36 (8d8) fire damage and have the blinded condition until the start of the chandelier's next turn.

DazzlingVisage.name: Dazzling Visage
DazzlingVisage.description: A brilliant array of chromatic colors emanates from Windfall, causing attack rolls against her to have disadvantage. This trait ceases to function while Windfall has the incapacitated condition or has a speed of 0.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Windfall fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Windfall wears an iridescent magic coat that was tailored specifically for her and imbued with Tiamat's power. When she dies, the coat functions as a Robe of Scintillating Colors.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Windfall makes two Chromatic Rapier attacks and uses Dragon's Fury once.

ChromaticRapier.name: ChromaticRapier
ChromaticRapier.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d8 + 7) piercing damage plus 21 (6d6) acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage (Windfall's choice).

Dragon'sFury.name: Dragon'sFury
Dragon'sFury.description: Windfall targets one creature she can see within 60 feet of herself and unleashes a burst of magical ire. The target must make a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 36 (8d8) psychic damage and has the frightened condition until the start of Windfall's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

BenignTransportation(RechargesaftertheCo.name: Benign Transportation (Recharges after the Conjurer Casts a Conjuration Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
BenignTransportation(RechargesaftertheCo.description: As a bonus action, the conjurer teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see. If it instead chooses a space within range that is occupied by a willing Small or Medium creature, they both teleport, swapping places.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the cow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Portent(RechargesaftertheDivinerCastsaDi.name: Portent (Recharges after the Diviner Casts a Divination Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
Portent(RechargesaftertheDivinerCastsaDi.description: When the diviner or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the diviner can roll a d20 and choose to use this roll in place of the attack roll, saving throw, or ability check.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

SculptSpells.name: Sculpt Spells
SculptSpells.description: When the evoker casts an evocation spell that forces other creatures it can see to make a saving throw, it can choose a number of them equal to 1 + the spell's level. These creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell. If a successful save means a chosen creature would take half damage from the spell, it instead takes no damage from it.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The guard drake can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the illithilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed illithilich gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The illithilich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The illithilich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

ParalyzingTouch.name: ParalyzingTouch
ParalyzingTouch.description: ms 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 10 (3d6) cold damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 15) and must succeed on a 20 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

ExtractBrain.name: ExtractBrain
ExtractBrain.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the lich. on hit: 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the lich kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

MindBlast{@recharge5}.name: MindBlast{@recharge5}
MindBlast{@recharge5}.description: The illithilich magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence saving throw or take 27 (5d8 + 5) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Displacement(RechargesaftertheIllusionis.name: Displacement (Recharges after the Illusionist Casts an Illusion Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
Displacement(RechargesaftertheIllusionis.description: As a bonus action, the illusionist projects an illusion that makes the illusionist appear to be standing in a place a few inches from its actual location, causing any creature to have disadvantage on attack rolls against the illusionist. The effect ends if the illusionist takes damage, it is incapacitated, or its speed becomes 0.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 15) and must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

ExtractBrain.name: ExtractBrain
ExtractBrain.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the mind flayer. on hit: The target takes 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

MindBlast{@recharge5}.name: MindBlast{@recharge5}
MindBlast{@recharge5}.description: The mind flayer magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

GrimHarvest(1/Turn).name: Grim Harvest (1/Turn)
GrimHarvest(1/Turn).description: When necromancer kills a creature that is neither a construct nor undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, the necromancer regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.

WitheringTouch.name: WitheringTouch
WitheringTouch.description: ms 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (2d4) necrotic damage.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

FoeSmiterofIlneval.name: Foe Smiter of Ilneval
FoeSmiterofIlneval.description: The orc deals an extra die of damage when it hits with a longsword attack (included in the attack).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The orc makes two melee attacks with its longsword or two ranged attacks with its javelins. If Ilneval's Command is available to use, the orc can use it after these attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage when used with two hands.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Ilneval'sCommand{@recharge4}.name: Ilneval'sCommand{@recharge4}
Ilneval'sCommand{@recharge4}.description: Up to three allied orcs within 120 feet of this orc that can hear it can use their reactions to each make one weapon attack.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The orc makes two claw attacks, or four claw attacks if it has fewer than half of its hit points remaining.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

TouchoftheWhiteHand.name: TouchoftheWhiteHand
TouchoftheWhiteHand.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

CorruptedCarrier.name: Corrupted Carrier
CorruptedCarrier.description: When the orc is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes, and any creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 (4d6) poison damage and becomes poisoned. On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned. A creature poisoned by this effect can repeat the save at the end of each of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. While poisoned by this effect, a creature can't regain hit points.

NurturedOneofYurtrus.name: Nurtured One of Yurtrus
NurturedOneofYurtrus.description: The orc has advantage on saving throws against poison and disease.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) necrotic damage.

CorruptedVengeance.name: CorruptedVengeance
CorruptedVengeance.description: The orc reduces itself to 0 hit points, triggering its Corrupted Carrier trait.

CunningAction.name: Cunning Action
CunningAction.description: On each of its turns, the orc can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

HandofShargaas.name: Hand of Shargaas
HandofShargaas.description: The orc deals 2 extra dice of damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack (included in its attacks).

Shargaas'sSight.name: Shargaas's Sight
Shargaas'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the orc's darkvision.

Slayer.name: Slayer
Slayer.description: In the first round of a combat, the orc has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn yet. If the orc hits a creature that round who was surprised, the hit is automatically a critical hit.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The orc makes two scimitar or dart attacks.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Dart.name: Dart
Dart.description: rw 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d4 + 3) piercing damage.

VeilofShargaas(RechargesafteraShortorLon.name: VeilofShargaas(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Veil of Shargaas (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

VeilofShargaas(RechargesafteraShortorLon.description: The orc casts darkness without any components. Wisdom is its spellcasting ability.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

PlantCamouflage.name: Plant Camouflage
PlantCamouflage.description: The thorny has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The thorny regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the thorny's next turn. The thorny dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

ThornyBody.name: Thorny Body
ThornyBody.description: At the start of its turn, the thorny deals 2 (1d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage.

Transmuter'sStone.name: Transmuter's Stone
Transmuter'sStone.description: The transmuter carries a magic stone it crafted that grants its bearer one of the following effects:

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

LowCunning.name: Low Cunning
LowCunning.description: The xvart can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

OverbearingPack.name: Overbearing Pack
OverbearingPack.description: The xvart has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Raxivort'sTongue.name: Raxivort's Tongue
Raxivort'sTongue.description: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Sling.name: Sling
Sling.description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MalisonType.name: Malison Type
MalisonType.description: The yuan-ti has one of the following types:

Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly).name: Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly)
Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly).description: The yuan-ti makes two ranged attacks or two melee attacks.

Bite(SnakeFormOnly).name: Bite(SnakeFormOnly)
Bite(SnakeFormOnly).description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

Scimitar(Yuan-tiFormOnly).name: Scimitar(Yuan-tiFormOnly)
Scimitar(Yuan-tiFormOnly).description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Longbow(Yuan-tiFormOnly).name: Longbow(Yuan-tiFormOnly)
Longbow(Yuan-tiFormOnly).description: rw 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MalisonType.name: Malison Type
MalisonType.description: The yuan-ti has one of the following types:

Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly).name: Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly)
Multiattack(Yuan-tiFormOnly).description: The yuan-ti makes two ranged attacks or two melee attacks.

Bite(SnakeFormOnly).name: Bite(SnakeFormOnly)
Bite(SnakeFormOnly).description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

Scimitar(Yuan-tiFormOnly).name: Scimitar(Yuan-tiFormOnly)
Scimitar(Yuan-tiFormOnly).description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Longbow(Yuan-tiFormOnly).name: Longbow(Yuan-tiFormOnly)
Longbow(Yuan-tiFormOnly).description: rw 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

FormedbytheMists.name: Formed by the Mists
FormedbytheMists.description: When created, the horror's body composition takes one of four forms: Aberrant Armor, Loathsome Limbs, Malleable Mass, or Oozing Organs. This form determines certain traits in this stat block.

Amorphous(MalleableMassOnly).name: Amorphous (Malleable Mass Only)
Amorphous(MalleableMassOnly).description: The horror can move through any opening at least 1 inch wide without squeezing.

BileBody(OozingOrgansOnly).name: Bile Body (Oozing Organs Only)
BileBody(OozingOrgansOnly).description: Any creature that touches the horror or hits it with a melee attack takes 5 (1d10) acid damage.

RelentlessStride(LoathsomeLimbsOnly).name: Relentless Stride (Loathsome Limbs Only)
RelentlessStride(LoathsomeLimbsOnly).description: The horror can move through the space of another creature. The first time on a turn that the horror enters a creature's space during this move, the creature must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The horror makes two Limbs attacks.

Limbs.name: Limbs
Limbs.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

HexBlast{@recharge5}.name: HexBlast{@recharge5}
HexBlast{@recharge5}.description: The horror expels necrotic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (7d12) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The mind flayer can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the mind flayer has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The mind flayer doesn't require air, food, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mind flayer makes two Claw attacks or one Claw attack and one Tentacles attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15).

DrinkSapience.name: DrinkSapience
DrinkSapience.description: The mind flayer targets one creature it is grappling. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 14 (4d6) psychic damage and gain 1 level of exhaustion. The mind flayer regains a number of hit points equal to the psychic damage dealt. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by the psychic damage dies.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The wereraven can use its action to polymorph into a raven-humanoid hybrid or into a raven, or back into its human form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its human form if it dies.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: The wereraven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The wereraven regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the wereraven takes damage from a silvered weapon or a spell, this trait doesn't function at the start of the wereraven's next turn. The wereraven dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack(HumanorHybridFormOnly).name: Multiattack(HumanorHybridFormOnly)
Multiattack(HumanorHybridFormOnly).description: The wereraven makes two weapon attacks, one of which can be with its hand crossbow.

Beak(RavenorHybridFormOnly).name: Beak(RavenorHybridFormOnly)
Beak(RavenorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 piercing damage in raven form, or 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage in hybrid form. If the target is humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wereraven lycanthropy.

Shortsword(HumanorHybridFormOnly).name: Shortsword(HumanorHybridFormOnly)
Shortsword(HumanorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

HandCrossbow(HumanorHybridFormOnly).name: HandCrossbow(HumanorHybridFormOnly)

value.value: Hand Crossbow (Human or Hybrid Form Only)

HandCrossbow(HumanorHybridFormOnly).description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

value.condition: (fly 50 ft. in raven and hybrid forms)

DeathlyStench.name: Deathly Stench
DeathlyStench.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the zombie must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 9 (2d8) poison damage and be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The zombie doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The zombie makes two Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

FleshEntomb{@recharge5}.name: FleshEntomb{@recharge5}
FleshEntomb{@recharge5}.description: The zombie flings a detached clump of corpses at a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or take 16 (3d10) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it becomes entombed in dead flesh.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The zombie doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

ViralAura.name: Viral Aura
ViralAura.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the plague spreader must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is poisoned and can't regain hit points until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this plague spreader's Viral Aura for 24 hours.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The plague spreader makes two Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

VirulentMiasma(1/Day).name: VirulentMiasma(1/Day)
VirulentMiasma(1/Day).description: The plague spreader releases toxic gas in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A Humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies and rises as a zombie (see its stat block in the Monster Manual) 1 minute later. The zombie acts immediately after the plague spreader in the initiative count.

Displacement.name: Displacement
Displacement.description: The displacer beast projects a magical illusion that makes it appear to be standing near its actual location, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn. This trait is also disrupted while the displacer beast is incapacitated or has a speed of 0.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 bludgeoning damage plus 2 piercing damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Elkhorn wields a +1 longsword.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Elkhorn makes two Dagger or +1 Longsword attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage. If the target is a creature that is Large or bigger, it takes an extra 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

+1Longsword.name: +1Longsword
+1Longsword.description: mw  2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d8) slashing damage, or 5 (1d10) slashing damage when used with two hands. If the target is a creature that is Large or bigger, it takes an extra 5 (1d10) slashing damage.

BoonofImmortality.name: Boon of Immortality
BoonofImmortality.description: Endelyn is immune to any effect that would age her, and she can't die from old age.

EclipsedDoom.name: Eclipsed Doom
EclipsedDoom.description: Endelyn can be killed only if she is reduced to 0 hit points during a solar eclipse or while she is within 60 feet of a symbolic representation of one. Otherwise, Endelyn disappears in a cloud of inky smoke when she drops to 0 hit points, along with anything she was wearing or carrying, and reappears 24 hours later in the same location or the nearest unoccupied space.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Endelyn makes two Puppeteer's Lash attacks

Puppeteer'sLash.name: Puppeteer'sLash
Puppeteer'sLash.description: ms,rs 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) psychic damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, Endelyn telekinetically moves it up to 10 feet in any direction horizontally.

TramplingCharge.name: Trampling Charge
TramplingCharge.description: If Envy moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, Envy can make one attack with its claws against it as a bonus action.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

PetrifyingBreath{@recharge5}.name: PetrifyingBreath{@recharge5}
PetrifyingBreath{@recharge5}.description: Envy exhales petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the rocking horse is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the rocking horse move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the rocking horse is animate.

FlyingMount.name: Flying Mount
FlyingMount.description: The rocking horse can serve as a mount for a Medium or smaller creature and can fly only while mounted.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The rocking horse doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep, and it regains no hit points or Hit Dice at the end of a long rest.

HeadButt.name: HeadButt
HeadButt.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

Drone.name: Drone
Drone.description: When it beats its wings, the dragonfly emits a loud droning sound that can be heard out to a range of 120 feet.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

SaltOsmosis.name: Salt Osmosis
SaltOsmosis.description: Whenever the snail starts its turn in contact with a pound or more of salt, it takes 1d4 necrotic damage. Using an action to sprinkle a pound of salt on the snail deals 1d4 necrotic damage to it immediately and another 1d4 necrotic damage to it at the start of its next turn (after which the salt rubs off), provided the snail has not withdrawn into its shell.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

ShellDefense.name: ShellDefense
ShellDefense.description: The snail withdraws into its shell, gaining a +4 bonus to its AC until it emerges. It can emerge from its shell as a bonus action on its turn.

KeenSight.name: Keen Sight
KeenSight.description: The swan has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The swan makes two attacks with its beak.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the golem is embedded in a window and motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the golem move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the golem is animate.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The golem regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the golem takes bludgeoning or thunder damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the golem's next turn. The golem is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The golem makes two Glass Sword attacks.

GlassSword.name: GlassSword
GlassSword.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 slashing damage.

CloudofDust.name: CloudofDust
CloudofDust.description: On its first turn in combat or when it is reduced to 0 hit points, the cat expels a cloud of dust that acts as dust of sneezing and choking

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The harengon has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the harengon's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The harengon's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Sling.name: Sling
Sling.description: rw 5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The harengon's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

LightCrossbow.name: LightCrossbow
LightCrossbow.description: rw 5 to hit (the target gains no benefit from less than Cover||3||total cover), range 320 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage. {@hom}Immediately after making this attack, the harengon can use the Hide action.

BoonofImmortality.name: Boon of Immortality
BoonofImmortality.description: Iggwilv is immune to any effect that would age her, and she can't die from old age.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Iggwilv fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Iggwilv has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. (This trait is bestowed by her robe of the archmagi.)

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Iggwilv wears an amulet of the planes and a robe of the archmagi.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Iggwilv makes two Bewitching Bolt attacks.

BewitchingBolt.name: BewitchingBolt
BewitchingBolt.description: ms,rs 16 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (5d6 + 8) lightning damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by Iggwilv until the start of her next turn.

AbyssalRift{@recharge5}.name: AbyssalRift{@recharge5}
AbyssalRift{@recharge5}.description: Iggwilv opens a momentary Abyssal rift within 120 feet of her. The rift is a 20-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a DC 22 Constitution saving throw, taking 40 (9d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, there is a 50 percent chance that 3 hezrou||hezrous then appear in unoccupied spaces in the sphere. They act as Iggwilv's allies, take their turns immediately after hers, and can't summon other demons. They remain until they die or until Iggwilv dismisses them as an action.

ConfusingBurble.name: Confusing Burble
ConfusingBurble.description: The jabberwock burbles to itself unless it is incapacitated. Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the jabberwock and is able to hear its burbling must make a DC 18 Charisma saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn, and it rolls a d4 to determine what it does during its current turn:

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the jabberwock fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The jabberwock regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the jabberwock takes slashing damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The jabberwock dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

UncannyTracker.name: Uncanny Tracker
UncannyTracker.description: The jabberwock can unerringly track any creature it has wounded in the last 24 hours, and it knows the distance and direction to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The jabberwock makes two Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

FieryGaze{@recharge5}.name: FieryGaze{@recharge5}
FieryGaze{@recharge5}.description: Unless it is blinded, the jabberwock emits a 120-foot-long, 5-foot-wide line of fire from its eyes. Each creature in that line must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

NimbleEscape.name: Nimble Escape
NimbleEscape.description: Jingle Jangle can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of her turns.

FlailofLocks.name: FlailofLocks
FlailofLocks.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (3d4) bludgeoning damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Kelek wears bracers of defense and carries a staff of striking with 10 charges. The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If its last charge is expended, roll a d20; on a 1, the staff becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Kelek makes three attacks using Sorcerer's Bolt, Staff of Striking, or a combination of them. He can replace one of the attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

Sorcerer'sBolt.name: Sorcerer'sBolt
Sorcerer'sBolt.description: ms,rs 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d12) force damage.

StaffofStriking.name: StaffofStriking
StaffofStriking.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, or 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, and Kelek can expend up to 3 of the staff's charges, dealing an extra 3 (1d6) force damage for each expended charge.

FieryExplosion{@recharge4}.name: FieryExplosion{@recharge4}
FieryExplosion{@recharge4}.description: Kelek creates a magical explosion of fire centered on a point he can see within 120 feet of him. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: Kettlesteam can mimic any sounds she has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations only with a successful DC 13 Wisdom (Insight) check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Kettlesteam makes two Dagger attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

TwilightSleep(2/Day).name: TwilightSleep(2/Day)
TwilightSleep(2/Day).description: Kettlesteam targets one creature she can see within 10 feet of her. The target is engulfed in a cloud of magical, sleep-inducing gas and must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious for 1 minute. A creature put to sleep by this gas awakens instantly if it takes damage, or if someone uses an action to shake or slap the sleeper awake.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the doll is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the doll move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the doll is animate.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The doll regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If the doll takes fire or psychic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the doll's next turn. The doll is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The doll doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

GrabbyHands.name: GrabbyHands
GrabbyHands.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 6) and takes 11 (2d10) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns until this grapple ends. The doll can grapple only one creature at a time.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Mercion wields a +1 quarterstaff.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Mercion makes one Divine Radiance attack and one +1 Quarterstaff attack. She can replace one of these attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

DivineRadiance.name: DivineRadiance
DivineRadiance.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

+1Quarterstaff.name: +1Quarterstaff
+1Quarterstaff.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

RadiantFire{@recharge5}.name: RadiantFire{@recharge5}
RadiantFire{@recharge5}.description: Mercion creates a magical explosion of fiery radiance centered on a point she can see within 120 feet of her. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Light has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Light carries and is attuned to the Witchlight vane|WbtW. In Light's hands, the vane is a finesse weapon.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Light makes two Witchlight vane|WbtW attacks.

WitchlightVane.name: WitchlightVane
WitchlightVane.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) radiant damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Witch has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Witch carries and is attuned to the Witchlight watch|WbtW.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Witch makes two Cane attacks.

Cane.name: Cane
Cane.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 6 (1d12) necrotic damage.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: When subjected to an effect that allows a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Molliver takes no damage on a successful save or half damage on a failed one, provided Molliver is not incapacitated.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Molliver wears +1 leather armor and boots of levitation.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Molliver makes two Dagger or Shortsword attacks, or one of each.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage. The attack deals an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage if Molliver has advantage on the attack roll or if the target is within 5 feet of one of Molliver's allies.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. The attack deals an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage if Molliver has advantage on the attack roll or if the target is within 5 feet of one of Molliver's allies.

Levitate.name: Levitate
Levitate.description: While wearing boots of levitation, Molliver casts levitate (self only).

KeenSight.name: Keen Sight
KeenSight.description: The paper bird has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

SharpEdges.name: SharpEdges
SharpEdges.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 slashing damage.

Sting.name: Sting
Sting.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 piercing damage.

CunningAction.name: Cunning Action
CunningAction.description: On each of her turns, Raezil can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Raezil has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

SneakAttack(1/Turn).name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
SneakAttack(1/Turn).description: Raezil deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of hers that isn't incapacitated and Raezil doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Raezil makes two melee attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Ringlerun wields a staff of power. It has 20 charges when fully charged and regains 2d8 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If its last charge is expended, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff retains its +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls but loses its other properties; on a 20, it regains 1d8 + 2 charges.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ringlerun makes three staff of power or Freezing Ray attacks. He can replace one of those attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

StaffofPower.name: StaffofPower
StaffofPower.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, and Ringlerun can expend 1 of the staff's charges to deal an extra 3 (1d6) force damage.

FreezingRay.name: FreezingRay
FreezingRay.description: rs 8 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 27 (6d8) cold damage.

StaffSpell.name: StaffSpell
StaffSpell.description: While holding his staff of power, Ringlerun can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it (spell save DC 14, 8 to hit with spell attacks): cone of cold (8d8 cold damage; 5 charges), fireball (10d6 fire damage; 5 charges), globe of invulnerability (6 charges), hold monster (5 charges), levitate (2 charges), lightning bolt (10d6 lightning damage; 5 charges), magic missile (1 charge), ray of enfeeblement (1 charge), or wall of force (5 charges).

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The Selenelion twins, Gleam and Glister, have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put them to sleep.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: A Selenelion twin regains 5 hit points at the start of her turn as long as both twins are alive and within 60 feet of each other. A twin dies only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

TwinBond.name: Twin Bond
TwinBond.description: While both Selenelion twins are alive and on the same plane of existence, each is aware of the other's emotions.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

MoonRay(GleamOnly;3/Day).name: MoonRay(GleamOnly;3/Day)
MoonRay(GleamOnly;3/Day).description: rs 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) radiant damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be transformed into a bat for 1 minute, as though affected by a polymorph spell. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

SunRay(GlisterOnly;3/Day).name: SunRay(GlisterOnly;3/Day)
SunRay(GlisterOnly;3/Day).description: rs 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) radiant damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

TwinSight(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest.name: TwinSight(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Twin Sight (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

TwinSight(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest.description: In her mind's eye, a Selenelion twin can see what the other twin sees for up to 1 minute, provided both twins are alive and on the same plane of existence. Maintaining this effect requires concentration (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell).

SuperiorInvisibility.name: Superior Invisibility
SuperiorInvisibility.description: As a bonus action, Sir Talavar can magically turn invisible until his concentration ends (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). Any equipment Sir Talavar wears or carries is invisible with him.

LimitedTelepathy.name: Limited Telepathy
LimitedTelepathy.description: Using telepathy, Sir Talavar can magically communicate with any other faerie dragon within 60 feet of him.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Sir Talavar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

+1TinySword.name: +1TinySword
+1TinySword.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 1 piercing damage.

EuphoriaBreath{@recharge5}.name: EuphoriaBreath{@recharge5}
EuphoriaBreath{@recharge5}.description: Sir Talavar exhales a puff of euphoria gas at one creature within 5 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw, or for 1 minute, the target can't take reactions and must roll a d6 at the start of each of its turns to determine its behavior during the turn:

BoonofImmortality.name: Boon of Immortality
BoonofImmortality.description: Skabatha is immune to any effect that would age her, and she can't die from old age.

Forgetfulness.name: Forgetfulness
Forgetfulness.description: The first creature that Skabatha sees after she finishes a long rest is invisible to her. She can't remember seeing the creature or perceive it using her truesight until the end of her next long rest.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Skabatha makes two Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 25 (6d6 + 4) poison damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Skylla carries an Eldritch Staff|WBtW (see appendix A) with 10 charges. The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If its last charge is expended, roll a d20; on a 1, the staff is destroyed.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Skylla makes two Eldritch Staff attacks. She can replace one of the attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

EldritchStaff.name: EldritchStaff
EldritchStaff.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, and Skylla can expend up to 3 of the staff's charges, dealing an extra 4 (1d8) lightning damage for each expended charge.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If Squirt is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed Squirt move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that Squirt is animate.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: Squirt doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

BoggleOil(3Applications).name: BoggleOil(3Applications)
BoggleOil(3Applications).description: Squirt expends 1 application of boggle oil to create a 10-foot-square puddle of slippery, non-flammable oil on the ground within 5 feet of it. The puddle is difficult terrain||3 and lasts for 1 hour. Each creature that enters the puddle's area or starts its turn there must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. Boggles are unaffected by the oil. After it expends all 3 applications, Squirt can't use this action again until its supply of boggle oil is replenished.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Strongheart wields Steel|WBtW, a sentient, lawful good longsword (see appendix A).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Strongheart makes three Steel attacks.

Steel.name: Steel
Steel.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage when used with two hands. Once on each of his turns, Strongheart can also cause the blade to gleam with holy light. If he does so, the target is blinded until the start of Strongheart's next turn.

Revivify(RechargesattheNextDawn).name: Revivify(RechargesattheNextDawn)
Revivify(RechargesattheNextDawn).description: While holding Steel, Strongheart casts revivify.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: Each campestri in the swarm can mimic any voice or song it has heard, albeit in a nasal falsetto.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough to accommodate an individual campestri. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

HeadButts.name: HeadButts
HeadButts.description: mw 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (4d4) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer.

Spores(1/Day).name: Spores(1/Day)
Spores(1/Day).description: A 20-foot radius of spores extends from the swarm. These spores can go around corners, and they have no effect on Constructs, Elementals, Plants, or Undead. Each other creature in the area must make a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is incapacitated and its speed is halved, both for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

AntimagicSusceptibility.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
AntimagicSusceptibility.description: The tin soldier is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the tin soldier must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the tin soldier remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tin soldier makes two melee attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the treant is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the treant move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the treant is animate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The treant makes two Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

AnimateTrees(1/Day).name: AnimateTrees(1/Day)
AnimateTrees(1/Day).description: The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as an awakened tree (see the Monster Manual), except they can't speak. An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies, until the treant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree, or until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Warduke wears a dread helm|XGE (see appendix A) and wields a flame tongue longsword.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Warduke makes three Flame Tongue or Dagger attacks.

FlameTongue.name: FlameTongue
FlameTongue.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 7 (2d6) fire damage if the weapon is aflame.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

SecretExpertise.name: Secret Expertise
SecretExpertise.description: The hand has one of these additional skills: Acrobatics acrobatics 6, Animal Handling animal_handling 5, Arcana arcana 5, Athletics athletics 4, Medicine medicine 5, or Performance performance 5.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

PixieDust(1/Day).name: PixieDust(1/Day)
PixieDust(1/Day).description: The hand sprinkles a pinch of pixie dust on itself or another creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The recipient gains a flying speed of 30 feet for 1 minute. If the creature is airborne when this effect ends, it falls safely to the ground, taking no damage and landing on its feet.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Zarak carries a potion of invisibility.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Zarak makes two Dagger attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, plus an extra 5 (2d4) piercing damage if the target is a creature and Zarak has at least 18 hit points.

Garrote.name: Garrote
Garrote.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Humanoid. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage at the start of each of its turns, and Zarak can't grapple another creature or use Assassin's Whim.

ClingtoLife(RechargesafteraLongRest).name: Cling to Life (Recharges after a Long Rest)
ClingtoLife(RechargesafteraLongRest).description: The first time Zargash would drop to 0 hit points as a result of taking damage, he instead drops to 1 hit point.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Zargash wears a bat-shaped amulet that has the properties of a ring of feather falling.

Warhammer.name: Warhammer
Warhammer.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

DeathlyRay.name: DeathlyRay
DeathlyRay.description: rs 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 25 (4d10 + 3) necrotic damage.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 piercing damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Barnibus carries a wand of magic detection. (spell included in spell list below but does not use a slot when cast from the wand)

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

HalflingNimbleness.name: Halfling Nimbleness
HalflingNimbleness.description: Bepis can move through a space occupied by a creature of a size larger than him

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: Bepis has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

CunningAction.name: Cunning Action
CunningAction.description: On each of her turns, the Black Viper can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If the Black Viper is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails. She can't use this trait if she's incapacitated.

SneakAttack(1/Turn).name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
SneakAttack(1/Turn).description: The Black Viper deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the Black Viper that isn't incapacitated and the Black Viper doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Black Viper makes three attacks with her rapier.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Davil has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

Dagger.name: Dagger
