Dagger.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Adhesive(ObjectFormOnly).name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
Adhesive(ObjectFormOnly).description: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape DC 13). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

FalseAppearance(ObjectFormOnly).name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
FalseAppearance(ObjectFormOnly).description: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

Grappler.name: Grappler
Grappler.description: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mimic can make three attacks; two with its pseudopods and one with its bite

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

Gunslinger.name: Gunslinger
Gunslinger.description: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature or attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on the drow's ranged attack rolls with a pistol. In addition, the drow ignores Cover||3||half cover and Cover||3||three-quarters cover when making ranged attacks with a pistol.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drow makes two shortsword attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

PoisonousPistol.name: PoisonousPistol
PoisonousPistol.description: rw 6 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) poison damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Durnan wields a Greatsword of Sharpness||sword of sharpness (greatsword) called Grimvault. He wears boots of striding and springing, elven chain, and a ring of spell turning.

Indomitable(RechargesafteraLongRest).name: Indomitable (Recharges after a Long Rest)
Indomitable(RechargesafteraLongRest).description: Durnan can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

SpellTurning.name: Spell Turning
SpellTurning.description: While wearing his ring of spell turning, Durnan has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only him (not in an area of effect). If Durnan rolls a 20 for the save and the spell is 7th level or lower, the spell has no effect on him and instead targets the caster, using the slot level, spell save DC, attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the caster.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Durnan makes four melee weapon attacks.

Grimvault.name: Grimvault
Grimvault.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is an object, the hit instead deals 16 slashing damage. If the target is a creature and Durnan rolls a 20 on the d20 for the attack roll, the target takes an extra 14 slashing damage, and Durnan rolls another d20. On a roll of 20, he lops off one of the target's limbs, or some other part of its body if it is limbless.

DoubleCrossbow.name: DoubleCrossbow
DoubleCrossbow.description: rw 6 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

GnomeCunning.name: Gnome Cunning
GnomeCunning.description: The gnome has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against magic.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 2 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Fala has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put them to sleep.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 2 to hit or Melee Weapon Attack 4 to hit with shillelagh, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

AntimagicSusceptibility.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
AntimagicSusceptibility.description: The staff is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the staff must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the staff remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal staff.

Knife.name: Knife
Knife.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

Lance.name: Lance
Lance.description: mw 4 to hit (with disadvantage against a target within 5 ft.), reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage, or 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage while mounted.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

FeatherFall.name: FeatherFall
FeatherFall.description: The rider wears a magic ring with which it can cast the feather fall spell on itself once as a reaction to falling. After the spell is cast, the ring becomes nonmagical.

RelentlessEndurance.name: Relentless Endurance
RelentlessEndurance.description: When reduced to 0 hit points, Grum'shar drops to 1 hit point instead. He can only do this once per long rest.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 2 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If Hlam is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's incapacitated.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While Hlam is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Hlam attacks three times using his unarmed strike, darts, or both.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (1d10 + 7) bludgeoning, magic damage. If the target is a creature, Hlam can choose one of the following additional effects:

Dart.name: Dart
Dart.description: rw 12 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d4 + 7) piercing damage.

QuiveringPalm{@recharge}.name: QuiveringPalm{@recharge}
QuiveringPalm{@recharge}.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: The target must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is reduced to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the target takes 55 (10d10) necrotic damage.

value.value: Wholeness of Body (Recharges after a Long Rest)

Indomitable(2/Day).name: Indomitable
Indomitable(2/Day).description: Hrabbaz can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

RelentlessEndurance(RechargesafteraLongR.name: Relentless Endurance (Recharges after a Long Rest)
RelentlessEndurance(RechargesafteraLongR.description: When Hrabbaz is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, he drops to 1 hit point instead.

ExtraDamage.name: Extra Damage
ExtraDamage.description: As long as Hrabbaz has more than half his hit points left he deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage on all hits.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Hrabbaz makes three attacks with his morningstar.

Morningstar.name: Morningstar
Morningstar.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

DwarvenResilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
DwarvenResilience.description: Istrid has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Istrid makes two melee attacks.

Maul.name: Maul
Maul.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

TreasureSense(3/Day).name: TreasureSense(3/Day)
TreasureSense(3/Day).description: Istrid magically pinpoints precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of her.
